title: 서귀포시, 청소년 주도 도박 예방 캠페인 벌인다
creator: 양영전 기자
content: [제주=뉴시스] 양영전 기자 = 서귀포시가 청소년 도박 위험성에 대한 인식을 높이기 위해 10~11월 '도박은 게임이 아니야, 무서운 범죄야' 캠페인을 벌인다. 10일 서귀포시에 따르면 이번 사업은 동홍청소년문화의집 청소년참여예산위원회 김우진(서귀포중 3) 학생이 제안했다. 최근 날로 심각해지고 있는 청소년 도박 문제의 심각성을 알리고 이로 인해 발생할 수 있는 범죄와 사회적 문제를 예방하기 위해 기획됐다. 동홍청소년문화의집 청소년 주도로 열리는 이번 사업에선 19일 새연교광장에서 열리는 청소년 버스킹 행사를 비롯해 11월 청소년 진로체험 '꿈을 잡다'에서 일반 시민과 도내 청소년을 대상으로 도박 예방 홍보부스 운영 및 캠페인을 진행할 계획이다. 특히 이번 사업은 서귀포시 청소년참여예산제 사업 공모를 통해 지난 7월 우수사업으로 선정돼 추진된다. 온라인 도박의 위험성을 청소년들이 스스로 체감하고 직접 캠페인에 나섰다는 점에서 의미가 있다. 사업을 제안한 김우진 학생은 "도박을 온라인 게임처럼 쉽게 접근해 호기심이나 재미로 경험해 보려는 청소년들이 없도록 또래의 입장에서 도박의 위험성을 알리고 싶었다"고 말했다. 서귀포시 관계자는 "앞으로도 지역사회와 협력해 청소년 유해환경 개선 및 건강한 성장 환경 조성에 최선을 다하겠다"고 밝혔다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: 임종룡 "책임질 일 있으면 책임...지금은 조직안정에 우선"
creator: 김형섭 기자
content: [서울=뉴시스] 김형섭 우연수 기자 = 손태승 전 회장의 친인척 부당대출 사건으로 사퇴 압박을 받고 있는 임종룡 우리금융그룹 회장이 10일 "책임을 질 일이 있다면 책임을 지겠다"면서도 지금 당장은 조직안정과 내부통제 강화 등이 우선이라는 입장을 밝혔다. 임 회장은 이날 국회 정무위원회의 금융위원회 국정감사에 증인으로 출석한 자리에서 '조만간 사퇴할 것이냐'는 이강일 더불어민주당 의원 질의에 "친인척 부당대출 등으로 우리금융의 신뢰를 떨어뜨린 점에 대해서 책임감을 느낀다"며 "지금은 조직의 안정, 그리고 내부통제 강화와 기업문화 혁신을 추진할 때"라고 밝혔다. 이복현 금감원장이 경영진 책임을 거론한 것이 사실상의 사퇴압박으로 해석되고 있는 것과 관련해 '우리금융에 대한 부적절한 영향력 행사 아니냐'는 지적에는 "인사개입이 아니라고 생각한다"고 했다. 임 회장은 이 의원 질의 후에 별도의 발언 기회를 얻어 "금감원장이 우리금융에 대해 지적하신 사안과 관련해서 저는 금감원장이 우리금융 인사에 개입한다고 전혀 생각하지 않는다"고 부연했다. 그는 "다만 최근에 금감원장의 우리금융에 대한 언급은 이번 부당대출 사건을 계기로 해서 기업 문화를 근본적으로 바꾸고 내부통제가 필요하다는 점을 강조했으며 이에 대한 경영진의 각성과 쇄신이 필요하다는 점을 강조하신 것으로 이해하고 있다"며 "저는 이에 전적으로 공감한다"고 말했다. 그러면서 "제가 잘못해서 책임져야 할 일이...

title: 고려아연 다음 ‘경영권 분쟁’?... 티웨이항공 17.8% 상승 [특징주]
creator: 매일경제
content: 저비용항공사(LCC) 티웨이항공 경영권 분쟁에 다시 불이 붙었다는 소식이 전해지면서 관련주(株) 주가가 10일 급등하고 있다. 이날 한국거래소에 따르면 티웨이항공 주가는 전 거래일 대비 570원(17.81%) 오른 3770원에 거래를 마쳤다. 예림당(29.95% 상승한 2165)과 대명소노시즌(29.99% 상승한 958원) 역시 이날 상한가를 기록했다. 앞서 일부 언론서 대명소노그룹 계열 호텔·리조트 운영사인 소노인터내셔널(구 대명호텔앤리조트)이 공개매수를 통해 티웨이항공 경영권 인수에 나선다고 보도하면서 주가가 이 같이 뛰었다. 티웨이항공은 최대주주인 예림당측(29.97%)과 대명소노그룹(26.77%)의 지분 격차가 3.20%포인트에 그쳐 경영권 분쟁 가능성이 높은 상황이다.

title: Parbhani Assembly Election : वंचित बहुजनची माजूलाला यांना उमेदवारी
creator: पुढारी वृत्तसेवा
content: परभणी, पुढारी वृत्तसेवा वंचित बहुजन आघाडीने मंगळवारी जिल्ह्यातील चारही विधानसभा मतदारसंघातील इच्छुक उमेदवारांच्या मुलाखतीचा सोपस्कार तर पार पाडला मात्र दुसऱ्याच दिवशी बुधवारी (दि.९) परभणी मतदारसंघातून माजी उपमहापौर सय्यद समी साहेबजान लाला ऊर्फ माजूलाला यांना उमेदवारी जाहीर करीत आश्चर्याचा धक्का दिला. वंचित बहुजन आघाडीचे राष्ट्रीय अध्यक्ष अॅड. प्रकाश आंबेडकर यांनी बुधवारी १० उमेदवारांची दुसरी यादी जाहीर केली. या यादीतील सर्व उमेदवार हे मुस्लिम समाजातील आहेत. परभणीतही मुस्लिम प्राबल्य लक्षात घेऊन सक्षम उमेदवार देण्याच्या दृष्टीने व वंचित बहुजन आघाडीने माजूलाला यांना उमेदवारी बहाल केली आहे. परभणी मतदारसंघात प्रत्येक निवडणुकीत तिसरा पर्याय हा निवडणुकीची चुरस वाढविण्यात महत्त्वपूर्ण ठरलेला आहे. त्यामुळे या मतदारसंघात तिरंगी लढत ही सातत्याने पहावयास मिळते. याही वेळी वंचित बहुजन आघाडीकडून व एमआयएमकडून या मतदारसंघात उमेदवार दिला जाईल, हे अपेक्षितच होते. वंचितने राज्य पातळीवर कोणाशीही आघाडी न करण्याचे जाहीर केले होते. त्याप्रमाणे वंचितचे राष्ट्रीय अध्यक्ष अॅड. आंबेडकर यांनी पहिल्या टप्प्यानंतर जाहीर केलेल्या दुसऱ्या टप्प्यात मराठवाड्यातील तीन मतदारसंघात मुस्लिम उमेदवारांची नावे समाविष्ट आहेत. परभणी मतदारसंघात उमेदवारी दिलेले माजूलाला हे अलीकडेच काँग्रेसमधून शिवसेना शिंदे गटात दाखल झाले होते. तत्पूर्वी ते काँग्रेसमध्ये राहिलेले आहेत काँग्रेसमध्ये असताना २०१७ ते २२ च्या दरम्यान त्यांनी उपमहापौर म्हणूनही काम पाहिले आहे. सभागृह नेता म्हणूनही काम पाहिले होते. माजी उपनगराध्यक्ष कै. सज्जूलाला यांचे ते कनिष्ठ बंधू होत. सज्जूलाला यांनी एमआयएमच्या तिकिटावर २०१४ मध्ये निवडणूक लढविली होती....

title: 순찰차 가는데 꽁초 '틱~'...딱 걸렸네, '벌금 미납 수배자'
creator: 박기웅 기자
content: [광주=뉴시스]박기웅 기자 = 벌금 미납으로 수배 중이던 50대가 순찰차 앞에서 무심코 담배꽁초를 버렸다가 경찰에 붙잡혔다. 10일 광주 북부경찰서 용봉지구대에 따르면 지난달 30일 오후 2시께 광주 북구 용봉동 일대를 순찰하던 경찰은 전남대학교 인근 주택가 골목에 들어섰다. 골목길에서 담배를 피우고 있던 A(50대 후반)씨는 순찰차가 자신의 옆을 지나가던 순간 손에 들고 있던 담배꽁초를 길바닥에 버렸다. 계도 차원에서 순찰차에서 내린 경찰은 A씨에게 다가갔다. A씨는 경찰이 인적사항을 묻자 답변을 회피하려는 등 상황을 모면하기 위해 애쓰는 모습이 역력했다. 안 그래도 A씨의 수상한 거동을 눈 여겨봤던 경찰은 수상함을 느꼈다. 경찰이 A씨의 신원을 조회한 결과 과거 음주운전 등으로 벌금형을 선고 받고 납부하지 않아 수배 명단에 오른 것으로 확인됐다. 경찰은 A씨를 현장에서 검거해 조사를 마친 후 그의 신병을 검찰에 인계했다. 용봉지구대 관계자는 "질서 위반 행위에 대해 경범죄라는 이유로 지나치지 않고 적극 계도해 수배 사실을 확인하게 됐다"며 "세심한 지역순찰과 단속 등 기초질서 확립을 위해 노력하겠다"고 말했다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: Nigeria: South Korean Investors to Construct 4 Refineries in Nigeria - Govt
content: THE Minister of State for Petroleum Resources (Oil), Senator Heineken Lokpobiri has disclosed that a consortium of investors from South Korea has concluded plans to build four 100,000-barrel capacity refineries in Nigeria. The minister started this at the Crude Oil Refineries Owners Association of Nigeria submit in Lagos, stressing that government would continue to create enabling environment for investment in the industry. He said: "We encourage investors to build limited refineries by providing an open environment. A recent approval was granted to invite to Nigeria a consortium of investors from South Korea, which intends to establish four 100,000 barrels-model refineries in four different locations in Nigeria. "We have adopted the public-private partnership model to unlock investment in the midstream and downstream segments of the oil and gas sector, which will lead to the establishment of more modular and mega refineries. "The Nigerian Upstream Petroleum Regulatory Commission has developed and published the domestic crude supply obligation guidelines to ensure transparency in the oil industry and ensure access to feedstock by our local refineries. "In addition, we prioritise and work with stakeholders to ensure effective implementation of the recommendations of the Modular Refinery Committee to give special concession to local refineries' owners, thereby guaranteeing feedstock to their refineries." The minister that harped on complete deregulation of the sector, saying:...

title: Nigeria: 3rd Time in 2 Months - Howls of Anguish As Petrol Price Goes Up
content: Lagos — IT was anguish, yesterday, as the Nigerian National Petroleum Company Limited, NNPCL, raised the pump price of Premium Motor Spirit (PMS), also known as petrol, by 15 per cent across the country. The development confirmed Vanguard's earlier exclusive report that plans were underway to fully deregulate the sector and that subsidy would no longer apply this week. However, the complete deregulation effect, yesterday, pushed the price of the product to N1,030 per litre, from N897 per litre in Abuja, while the price rose to N998 per litre, from N855 per litre in Lagos. Checks by Vanguard indicated that the Dangote Petroleum Refinery price also increased by 8.8 per cent to N977 per litre, from N898 per litre, yesterday. The latest price increase makes it the second time the petrol price has been hiked in the past month. This showed that the pump price of petrol has risen by more than 411 per cent since President Bola Tinubu came into office in May 2023. Specifically, from N195 per litre before the President assumed office on May 29th, 2023, the price of the product was increased to N448 (Lagos) and N460 (Abuja) in May 31, 2024; N557 (Lagos) and N617 (Abuja) in September 2024; N610 (Lagos) and N897 (Abuja) in September 2024 before the latest increase to N998 (Lagos) and N1,030 (Abuja) in October 2024. The latest increase, which came against expectations that the crude-for-Naira deal between the Federal Government and Dangote Refinery might lead to a reduction in the pump...

title: Un equipamiento innovador y propulsores de alta tecnología
creator: Manu Cortés
content: Copiar enlace WhatsApp Facebook X (antes Twitter) LinkedIn Telegram Threads Desde el lanzamiento del pionero de los SUV Nissan Qashqai en 2007, han pasado tres generaciones. Ahora el nuevo Qashqai recibe una actualización estética, importantes avances tecnológicos y una mayor calidad de acabados. El nuevo Qashqai es el primer vehículo de la gama europea de Nissan que incorpora el conjunto de aplicaciones de Google, que permite acceder a las ubicaciones o puntos de interés favoritos. Las actualizaciones se hacen de manera automática y garantizan que la información del mapa esté siempre al día. Los conductores también pueden escuchar música, podcasts o utilizar el control de voz. En el exterior, la parrilla delantera de Qashqai ha sido rediseñada y consta de docenas de elementos tridimensionales con forma de «coma», entre el borde del capó y el soporte de la matrícula. Disponibles con tecnología matricial adaptativa en los acabados superiores, los nuevos faros ofrecen una distribución de luz más amplia, muy útil para una mayor visibilidad en condiciones de poca luz y niebla. Debajo de los faros principales, cinco pequeños leds de la misma forma que las «comas» de la parrilla principal ayudan a componer la iluminación del nuevo Qashqai. El nuevo Qashqai sobresale por su tecnología e-POWER, exclusiva de Nissan, mediante la cual las ruedas solo son impulsadas por el motor eléctrico. Se trata de una tecnología electrificada que ofrece las ventajas de la...

title: 삼성전자, 5만8900원 마감...1년9개월 만에 '최저'(종합)
creator: 배요한 기자
content: [서울=뉴시스] 배요한 기자 = 삼성전자의 주가가 5만9000원선을 하회하며 1년9개월 만에 최저가를 기록했다. 3분기 실적 부진에 따른 후폭풍이 지속된 영향으로 해석된다. 10일 삼성전자는 전 거래일 대비 1400원(2.32%) 내린 5만8900원에 거래를 마감했다. 이는 지난 2023년 1월5일(5만8200원) 이후 1년9개월 만에 최저가다. 이날 삼성전자는 0.33% 하락한 6만100원에 출발해 장 초반 6만300원까지 반등했지만, 이후 5만8900원까지 떨어지며 저가로 마감했다. 반면 SK하이닉스는 전 거래일 대비 4.89% 오른 18만6700원을 기록했다. 삼성전자의 주가 하락세는 3분기 실적 부진에 따른 여파가 지속된 영향으로 풀이된다. 지난 8일 삼성전자는 잠정실적 발표를 통해 3분기 매출액이 전년 동기 대비 17.21% 증가한 79조원, 영업이익은 274.49% 늘어난 9조1000억원을 기록했다고 공시했다. 영업이익은 기준으로는 시장 기대치를 크게 밑돌았다. 서승연 DB금융투자 연구원은 10일 삼성전자에 대해 "3분기 매출액은 컨센서스(증권사 추정치 평균)에 부합했으나 영업이익은 최근 낮아진 시장 눈높이를 15% 하회해 분기 감익을 기록했다"며 "세트(DX) 실적은 선방했으나 부품(DS·SDC) 실적은 일회성 비용, 고객사재고 조정, 경쟁 심화로 시장 예상을 하회해 목표주가를 기존 10만원에서 9만원으로 내린다"고 밝혔다. 한동희 SK증권 연구원도 "거시 경제 부진에 따른 세트의 더딘 회복과 이로 인한 메모리 사이클 단기 둔화를 반영해 목표주가를...

title: Hurricane Milton: Deaths reported and two million people without power
creator: Gianni Marini
content: Hurricane Milton has made landfall in Florida, bringing tornadoes and causing an unknown number of deaths. Emergency services in a number of counties across Florida were forced to suspend operations until it is safe for workers to be on the ground. More than two million homes and businesses are now without power in Florida. Tornadoes, whipped up before Milton made landfall, have killed several people at the Spanish Lakes Country Club near Fort Pierce, on Florida’s Atlantic Coast. Milton is expected to make landfall on the west coast of Florida on Wednesday night. A number of people were also feared dead after a tornado ripped through a mobile home retirement community in St. Lucie County on the east coast. The storm sustained winds of 120 mph as it hit Siesta Key, Florida at 8.30 pm local time, the National Hurricane Centre said on Thursday. A “flash flooding emergency” has been issued for parts of Tampa. The storm hit the land as a Category 3 hurricane has since downgraded to a Category 1 storm. Authorities have warned storm surges along some parts of the coastline could reach up to 13 feet (four metres), flooding entire houses. On Wednesday, Deanne Criswell, from the US Federal Emergency Management Agency FEMA, said Floridians need to prepare for “catastrophic impacts” and that the storm would be deadly. The storm’s outer bands began impacting Florida on Wednesday, as the storm closed in on Tampa’s coast. TORNADO crossing I-75 as we speak! Seek shelter NOW! Ahead of...

title: Nick Sirianni, Eagles look to continue post-bye success at Browns
content: Two head coaches try to cool down their hot seats and two quarterbacks try to regain their successful form when the Cleveland Browns visit the Philadelphia Eagles on Sunday. Fourth-year coach Nick Sirianni looks to improve to 4-0 after a bye week with the Eagles (2-2), who alternated wins and losses in September. Since losing six of their last seven games in last season's collapse, Philadelphia has yet to get back on track. The Eagles are just 13-10 (including the postseason) since Sirianni and Jalen Hurts won the NFC Championship Game in their second season together in 2022. Hurts turned the ball over 28 times in those 23 games, including seven times (four interceptions, three fumbles) already this season. Asked about the New York Jets' firing this week of head coach Robert Saleh, Sirianni said he isn't listening to the outside noise about his own job security. "Anything out of your control or anything that consumes your mind that's not focused on not getting better is a waste of time," Sirianni said Wednesday. "It only clouds the process. ... If you're focused on things that you can't control, that's gonna cloud that hunger and drive to get better." Philadelphia has been idle since a 33-16 defeat at Tampa Bay on Sept. 29. Playing without leading receivers A.J. Brown (hamstring) and DeVonta Smith (concussion) and All-Pro right tackle Lane Johnson (concussion), the Eagles quickly fell behind 24-0 and were outgained 445-227 by the Buccaneers. Brown, Smith and Johnson were...

title: תפסיקו להמציא: אוסקר גלוך הוא כוכב וצריך לקבל את המפתחות לנבחרת בכל מצב
content: הכדורגל הישראלי חיכה לא מעט שנים לכוכב כמו אוסקר גלוך, זאת עובדה וזוהי גם המסקנה של הכתבה הזאת עוד לפני שנגיע לסיומה. כמכלול, זה אמור להספיק כדי שקשר רד בול זלצבורג יקבל את המושכות של נבחרת ישראל, את הבמה, וכן, גם את זה שהנבחרת תיבנה סביבו וסביב היכולות והאיכויות החזקות שלו. כל השנים לימדו אותנו שצריך להתאים את המערך והשיטה לסגל השחקנים שיש למאמן, האם זוהי לא הקלישאה הכי חבוטה שיש אשר כולם הולכים אחריה בעיניים עצומות? אם כך, איך זה יכול להיות שנבחרת ישראל, הלא הישגית, המושפלת תמידית, המאכזבת הנצחית, לא פועלת לפיה כבר שנתיים? האירוע הזה מתעצם עוד יותר כאשר מסתכלים על הבית שקיבלה הנבחרת בליגת האומות. צרפת, איטליה, בלגיה. טוב שלא הוסיפו גם את ריאל מדריד, מנצ’סטר סיטי, באיירן מינכן ושיקגו בולס של מייקל ג’ורדן. אם אחרי כל הגרלה של מוקדמות מונדיאל או יורו הפרשנים ממהרים לצעוק “אין יותר נוח מזה”, אז הפעם קיבלנו את ה”אין יותר קשה מזה”. הגדילו בישראל, תקשורת, התאחדות ונבחרת כאחד, להסביר לנו במשך חודשים ארוכים שאין מה להשיג מהבית הזה. אין סיכוי. מאבק אבוד מראש, לא ננצח את צרפת או איטליה, אם נגנוב תיקו נגד בלגיה צריך לחגוג, ולכן (!) ננצל את זה כדי לבנות את הסגל שאמור לקחת את נבחרת ישראל ליורו 2028, ואז מתחילים המשחקים בקמפיין של רן בן שמעון, ושוב מתחילות ההמצאות. הנבחרת משחקת במערכים משתנים ונראה שאין מקום לגלוך כי “הוא לא מספיק פיזי”, או כל מיני שטויות אחרות שאוהבים להחזיק מעל הראש של כוכב בן 20 עוד מאז שהוא קטן יותר. זה הופך פתטי במיוחד כאשר נזכרים בקמפיין הקודם של הנבחרת, אותה ניהל מקצועית יוסי בניון, מי שקיבל את המפתחות של ישראל בהיותו השחקן הכי לא פיזי שיש, ואשר בנבחרת שלו אוסקר...

title: האזינו לפודקאסט: מה באמת קרה באותו לילה? מאחורי הקלעים של עזיבת לויד
content: אחרי ההפסד במחזור השני ביורוליג , 85:79 למונאקו, פודקאסט מכבי ת "א מסכם את המשחק עם מבט להמשך הדרך ביורוליג. על הפרק העזיבה של ג’ורדן לויד, האם מכבי יכולה להרוויח מהסיטואציה הזאת, מה צריך לעשות עכשיו ואילו שחקנים יכולים להגיע במקומו? סיפרנו גם על מאחורי הקלעים של עזיבת לויד ומה באמת קרה באותו הלילה שגרם לו להחליט שהוא לא חוזר לישראל? וגם : הרכש הקרוב של מכבי ת”א, סייבן לי, שאמור להגיע על המשבצת של דריל מייקון ואיך הוא יצליח להתחבר לשיטה של עודד קטש ? דיברנו גם על רומן סורקין והעובדה שלמכבי אין את הלוקסוס שהגבוה הבכיר שלה לא יפתח את העונה בצורה טובה עונה שלישית ברציפות . עוד בפרק : החזרה לישראל , העובדה שמכבי ת"א תרשום את אלפא קאבה ו״תבזבז״ על כך רישום של זר לליגה . וגם בחירת הרגע הכי זכור בקריירה של עודד קטש שחוגג יום הולדת 50 והכנה למשחקים מול אנדולו אפס ופרטיזן בלגרד ביורוליג.

title: "עוזב את המקום שהלב שלי רצה להיות בו": לויד נפרד ממכבי ת"א
content: לאחר שנפרד ממכבי תל אביב בעקבות המצב הביטחוני, ג'ורדן לויד שהגיע לקבוצה במהלך הקיץ וסיים את הפרק שלו תוך זמן קצר כתב מסר לאוהדים. "אחד הדברים הקשים שעשיתי בקריירה היה לעזוב את המקום שהלב שלי רוצה להיות בו", כתב לויד, “התקרבתי מאוד לשחקנים ולצוות האימון. נהניתי להיות איתכם באווירה שיצרתם ותודה שקיבלתם אותי. לאוהדים, הראיתם לי כל כך הרבה אהבה במספר חודשים ואני לא יכול להיות יותר אסיר תודה”. “כשחתמתי כאן הקיץ הלכתי נגד הדאגה של המשפחה שלי מכיוון שמאוד רציתי לשחק עבור הקבוצה והאנשים פה. עם המידע שקיבלתי, לקחתי הימור ועזבתי את המשפחה מתוך מחשבה שהמצב ישתפר. קיוויתי שיהיה לזה סוף ושנוכל להיות יחד בתל אביב (עם המשפחה), אבל נראה שהמצב החמיר אחרי המתקפה ההיסטורית מוקדם יותר החודש, שחוויתי באופן אישי, וזה היה יותר מדי עבור המשפחה שלי ועבורי”. “אני עוזב בלב כבד, אבל גם יודע שהיה לי מזל לשחק כדורסל כמקצוע לחיי. אנשים עוברים קשיים גדולים לפעמים ואני רק יכול לקוות שזה יסתיים. אני מחבק הכל, התגובות, גם השליליות, ומעל הכל יודע שאלוהים מוביל את הדרך, לא אני. תודה לך מכבי ואני מקווה שנוכל להיפגש שוב יום אחד. מאחל לכם את הטוב ביותר", סיכם.

title: האיגודים והאגודות קיבלו רק 60% מהתקציב השנתי ומתקשים לתפקד
content: הספורט הישראלי מתקשה לתפקד. עד כה האיגודים והאגודות קיבלו עד כ-60% מסך תקציב התמיכה השנתי שמגיע להם ממשרד התרבות והספורט, בעוד שהשנה בדרך לסיומה. הסיבה לעיכוב נובעת מכך שהמשרד עדיין לא סיים את אישור המודל לאיגודים-אגודות. בינתיים, אתמול (רביעי) מנכ״ל משרד התרבות והספורט כפיר כהן סיכם מול האוצר על הזרמת מקדמה נוספת לגובה של 70% ואף יותר. בשלב זה של השנה, האיגודים והאגודות כבר ביצעו את רוב הפעילות השנתית שלהם, אם לא כולה, ובספורט הישראלי מודאגים מכך שהגופים הללו נותרו עם בור כלכלי וחובות לספקים, כאשר גם האיגודים המובילים בארץ לא מסוגלים לשלם משכורות לעובדיהם. הסיבה לעיכוב נובעת מכך שמשרד התרבות והספורט עדיין לא אישר את המודל לחלוקת הכספים לאיגודים-אגודות. המודל עדיין לא אושר אחרי קבלת הערות הציבור. בגלל זה, אף על פי שיש תקציב מדינה, המשרד העביר תקציבים לגופים הנתמכים במקדמות על בסיס התקציב הקודם במספר פעימות, כאשר לאחרונה האיגודים והאגודות קיבלו השלמה רק ל-60% מסך תקציב התמיכה השנתי שמגיע להם. תקציב התמיכה זהו התקציב הבסיסי ממנו הספורט הישראלי אמור להתקיים, כך שזה תמוה כי עד כה הועברו רק 60% מהכספים בעוד ששנת 2024 בדרך להסתיים, מה שמקשה על האיגודים והאגודות, שצברו חובות ומנסים להימנע מעצירת הפעילות. באיגודים ובאגודות טוענים כי הם מתקשים להעביר משכורות ופועלים תחת אי ודאות. מעבר לכך, בספורט הישראלי מעוניינים כבר להיערך לשנה הבאה, אך בשלב זה הם לא יודעים מה גובה התקציב שיקבלו ב-2025, כאשר ברקע מתנהלות שיחות בין משרדי הממשלה וישנו חשש מקיצוצים בתקציב המדינה בגלל המלחמה. “אי אפשר להתנהל ככה”, הבהירו גורמים בכירים בספורט הישראלי. עד כה במשרד התרבות והספורט לא יודעים לומר מתי...

title: "Abençoaste o meu mundo há 21 anos. Orgulhoso do homem que te tornaste"
creator: Notícias ao Minuto
content: L andon Barker está de parabéns e a data não ficou esquecida. O pai, Travis Barker, dedicou uma publicação no Instagram ao filho mais velho para assinalar a chegada ao 21.o aniversário. Ao destacar um conjunto de imagens (com várias antigas), o músico começou por escrever: "Feliz aniversário, Landon. Abençoaste o meu mundo há 21 anos e sou eternamente grato. Tão orgulhoso do homem que te tronaste". "És o melhor filho e irmão que alguém poderia pedir. Amo-te sempre e para sempre, meu miúdo, e aprecio todos os momentos contigo", completou. De recordar que Travis é ainda pai de Alabama, de 18 anos, e da enteada Atiana, de 25, fruto da relação terminada com Shanna Moakler. O músico tem ainda o filho Rocky, do atual casamento com Kourtney Kardashian. Leia Também: Barker revela por que mantém filho com Kardashian longe dos holofotes

title: Flores em viagem? Eis as plantas proibidas que os portugueses mais trazem
creator: Cátia Carmo
content: I r de férias para fora do país e tentar trazer para casa aquela flor, fruto ou semente de que tanto se gostou para plantar e ter sempre à mão pode não ser boa ideia. Por desconhecimento pode trazer para o território nacional uma planta que propagará doenças e fará surgir novas pragas que podem tem consequências económicas, ambientais e sociais. A subdiretora geral da Direção-Geral de Alimentação e Veterinária (DGAV), Paula Cruz Garcia, garante ao Notícias ao Minuto que as pragas dos vegetais não trazem “riscos diretos para a saúde pública”, mas há perigo de “desaparecimento de culturas”. “Essencialmente pelo crescendo de utilização de produtos fitofarmacêuticos aos quais podem estar associadas, e, em particular, para os que vivem da atividade agrícola e florestal, pela diminuição da qualidade de vida em resultado da perda dos seus meios de subsistência. Veja-se as consequências da fome da batata na Irlanda ou da introdução da filoxera que dizimou vinhas por toda a Europa ”, explica Paula Cruz Garcia. Entre as plantas proibidas que os portugueses mais trazem do estrangeiro , segundo a DGAV, estão as sementes de milho, de hortícolas, plantas ornamentais e fruteiras . Na maioria das situações são para uso pessoal, mas também há muitos casos de “operadores profissionais relacionados com as atividades de produção ou comercialização de sementes ou plantas” que tentam importar de países terceiros. As plantas que representam maior risco e...

title: Kylie Jenner mostra bolo inspirado no seu glamoroso desfile em Paris
creator: Notícias ao Minuto
content: D epois de ter encerrado o desfile da Semana da Moda de Paris na Disneyland , pela marca de luxo Coperni, no passado dia 1 de outubro, Kylie Jenner mostrou aos seguidores um bolo inspirado nesse momento. Nas stories da sua página de Instagram, a celebridade publicou, esta terça-feira, dia 8 de outubro, um fotografia do referido bolo que era uma réplica do Castelo da Bela Adormecida da Disneyland. O bolo incluía todos os detalhes do seu desfile, incluindo um boneco trabalhado que representava o momento em que Kylie passou pela passerelle (com o mesmo look). © Kylie Jenner/Instagram Leia Também: Kylie Jenner já começou com as decorações de Halloween

title: Hoje é notícia: Triplo homicida estava com o pai; OE castiga combustíveis
creator: Lusa
content: B om dia! Está na hora de ficar a par de todos os destaques da imprensa nacional desta quinta-feira, 10 de outubro, dia marcado pela entrega e divulgação da proposta de Orçamento do Estado para 2025 (OE2025). O Correio da Manhã , por exemplo, é um dos jornais que dedica a primeira página à proposta orçamental, adiantando algumas medidas do documento, nomeadamente "Orçamento castiga gasolina e gasóleo". Quinta-feira é também dia de revistas. A Visão dá destaque ao secretário-geral da ONU, descrevendo-o como "Guterres, o combatente solitário", enquanto a Sábado destaca "Duques de Palmela. A saga da família mais rica de Portugal". "Governo já criou mais grupos de trabalho do que Costa em dois anos", lê-se na primeira página do Público . Já o Jornal de Notícias escreve sobre o triplo homicídio da Penha de França e a detenção do suspeito: "Triplo homicida estava com o pai em casa de familiares". Destaque para uma sondagem no Diário de Notícias : "Montenegro mais confiável que Marcelo [sondagem]". Olhando para os económicos, o OE também entra no centro da discussão. O Negócios dá conta de "17 medidas do OE 2025 que vão mexer com empresas e famílias" e O Jornal Económico escreve "UTAO aplaude Orçamento sem 'cavaleiros' orçamentais". Confira as capas na íntegra na galeria acima e leia os títulos completos dos jornais na lista que se segue, incluindo os da imprensa desportiva. Correio da Manhã: - "Orçamento castiga gasolina e gasóleo" -...

title: Volkswagen apresenta o novo SUV Tayron
creator: Notícias ao Minuto
content: O Volkswagen Tayron é o novo SUV da marca alemã, que se vai posicionar abaixo do Touareg. Este modelo que chegará à Europa, América do Norte e China conta com oferece sete lugares no seu interior e diferentes tipos de motorização. No total são sete, começando por duas híbridas plug-in com 100 km de autonomia elétrica e um máximo de 272 cv, duas a gasolina, duas a diesel e uma outra híbrida leve com um sistema elétrico de 48V. Todos os modelos vêm equipados de série com caixa automática de embraiagem dupla (DSG). Fique com as imagens do novo Tayron, que será dado a conhecer no Salão Automóvel de Paris, de 14 a 20 de outubro.

title: Depois do noivado, Sandra Silva celebra o seu 28.o aniversário
creator: Notícias ao Minuto
content: D epois de anunciar o noivado, no dia 8 de outubro, Sandra Silva celebrou o seu 28.o aniversário, no dia seguinte. "28. Na melhor companhia", escreveu a influencer numa publicação partilhada na sua conta de Instagram, com 12 fotografias da celebração. Nelas é também possível ver João Borges e o filho de ambos, o pequeno Vasco. O bolo de aniversário também está em destaque no carrossel de imagens. "Chata e estressada, porém linda e coerente", pode ler-se no bolo rosa e com muito glitter. Sandra Silva e João Borges ficaram noivos numa estadia a dois pelas Termas São Pedro do Sul. Leia Também: "Não consigo esconder o quanto estou feliz". Sandra Silva está radiante

title: Agarre no casaco. Quinta-feira traz chuva e descida de temperaturas
creator: Notícias ao Minuto
content: A s temperaturas vão descer, esta quinta-feira, com períodos de céu muito nublado e chuva, de acordo com a previsão do Instituto Português do Mar e da Atmosfera (IPMA). Segundo o IPMA, esperam-se "períodos de muita nebulosidade" e "aguaceiros em geral fracos". O vento vai ser "fraco, tornando-se moderado (20 a 30 km/h)"”, com descida em especial das temperaturas mínimas. Em Lisboa, a temperatura máxima deve chegar aos 22oC, enquanto que a mínima deve atingir os 14oC. No Porto, os termómetros podem marcar 19oC de máxima e 12oC de mínima. As mínimas vão variar entre os 15oC em Faro e os 6oC, em Guarda. Já as temperaturas máximas podem oscilar entre os 23oC, em Santarém, Évora e Beja, e os 14oC, no distrito da Guarda, em Portugal Continental. Nas ilhas, o arquipélago da Madeira pode contar com "céu muito nublado" e "períodos de chuva". O vento vai ser "fraco a moderado (10 a 30 km/h) de oeste/sudoeste" e "moderado a forte (30 a 45km/h) nas terras altas da ilha da Madeira a partir da tarde". No arquipélago dos Açores está previsto "céu muito nublado com boas abertas" e "aguaceiros". Leia Também: Diminui para 10 mil o número de clientes sem energia devido ao mau tempo

title: "Samu Omorodion leva o golo dentro dele. Tem condições para o topo"
creator: Notícias ao Minuto
content: K ike García partilhou balneário com Samu Omorodion no Alavés (por empréstimo do Atlético de Madrid) na temporada passada e, depois de saber que o antigo colega de equipa ia deixar Espanha para rumar ao FC Porto, não escondeu a sua felicidade, tendo deixado vários elogios ao goleador dos dragões. "Os golos que marcou por nós refletiram as condições que tinha, a sua vontade. Ele leva o golo dentro dele. Tem tudo e os golos que vai marcando transmitem-lhe mais confiança. Tem de continuar a assim, a acreditar muito nele, a fazer-se líder e goleador num clube grande. Tem condições para chegar ao topo", começou por dizer, em declarações ao jornal O Jogo, na edição impressa desta quinta-feira. "Estamos perante alguém que pode chegar muito longe. Já atingiu uma equipa de topo e pode também pensar na seleção (...) Quando soube que ia para o FC Porto falei logo com ele. Não vai parar de dar alegrias. O físico dele é brutal, mas também se move muito bem na área", vincou de seguida. "Desejo-lhe o melhor. Ficou um contacto amigo. Aqui sentimos muito o que está a fazer, oxalá triunfe com tudo. No Alavés somo todos FC Porto. É um grandíssimo jogador", realçou ainda o experiente defesa. Recorde-se que Samu Omorodion leva um registo de sete golos em sete jogos, desde que chegou ao Dragão. Leia Também: Por cá: Foco em Samu e as mudanças no Benfica com três anos de Rui Costa

title: Lai defende que China não tem direito de representar Taiwan
creator: Lusa
content: "A República da China [nome oficial de Taiwan] enraizou-se em Taiwan, Penghu, Kinmen e Matsu. A República da China e a República Popular da China não estão subordinadas uma à outra", afirmou, sob aplausos, durante um discurso, proferido em frente ao palácio presidencial de Taipé, nas celebrações do Dia Nacional. Lai sublinhou que, enquanto presidente, a sua responsabilidade é "salvaguardar a sobrevivência e o desenvolvimento" de Taiwan, unindo o povo e defendendo a soberania da ilha contra qualquer tentativa de "invasão ou anexação". "Taiwan está determinada a manter a paz e a estabilidade no estreito de Taiwan, contribuindo para a segurança e a prosperidade globais. Estamos igualmente dispostos a trabalhar com a China para fazer face às alterações climáticas, prevenir doenças infecciosas e garantir a segurança regional", afirmou o líder taiwanês. Sublinhou ainda que, no meio das crescentes tensões globais, a China deve exercer a sua influência diplomática e trabalhar com outros países para "acabar com as guerras na Ucrânia e no Médio Oriente". "Esperamos também que a China se junte a Taiwan para assumir responsabilidades internacionais e contribuir para a paz, a segurança e a prosperidade na região e no mundo", afirmou. Nos últimos dias, as ruas de Taipé e de várias cidades da ilha encheram-se de bandeiras para celebrar o Dia Nacional da República da China, uma data que comemora o início da Revolução Xinhai, a 10 de outubro de 1911,...

title: Rendas aumentam 4,3% na Europa, mas valor de apartamentos desce em Lisboa
creator: Notícias ao Minuto
content: O s preços das rendas em toda a Europa aumentaram 4,3% no terceiro trimestre de 2024, quando comparados com os valores praticados no mesmo período do ano passado. Ainda assim, e apesar de Lisboa continuar entre as 10 cidades mais caras no que toca ao mercado de arrendamento de apartamentos, os preços desceram ligeiramente. As conclusões são do HousingAnywhere International Rent Index by City, que apontou, em comunicado, que este "aumento é consistente com a tendência ascendente registada ao longo do ano, com o segundo trimestre a registar também um aumento de 4,3% em relação ao ano anterior e o primeiro trimestre a registar um aumento de 3,8%". A plataforma europeia de arrendamento de médio prazo analisou os dados de arrendamento de apartamentos, quartos e estúdios mobilados de um a três quartos em 28 grandes cidades europeias, tendo salientado que "o terceiro trimestre do ano é tradicionalmente marcado pelos estudantes que procuram alojamento para o início dos seus programas de estudo". "Os preços dos quartos divergiram do trimestre anterior, com um aumento trimestral de 2,4% e um aumento anual de 3,8%. Em muitas cidades europeias, onde a escassez de oferta está a criar desafios significativos para os inquilinos, os estudantes enfrentam dificuldades ainda maiores durante esta época do ano, o que coloca em risco as suas experiências educativas ou os seus percursos profissionais", disse o CEO da HousingAnywhere, Djordy Seelmann. Se os preços dos quartos...

title: Luisão avalia Benfica de Bruno Lage à distância: "Está a voar"
creator: Notícias ao Minuto
content: A pesar de se encontrar no Brasil há várias semanas, alegadamente a resolver problemas pessoais, Luisão, diretor técnico do Benfica, analisou de forma breve os mais recentes resultados das águias, sobretudo desde a entrada de Bruno Lage para o lugar de Roger Schmidt. "A equipa está a boar. Estou a ajudar naquilo que posso e vibro com cada vitória", começou por dizer num direto gravado na rede social Instagram. "O último jogo [4-0 frente ao Atlético de Madrid] foi espetacular, tirando a deslocação ao reduto do Nacional [suspenso devido ao forte nevoeiro] e todo este novo cenário deixa-me feliz", acrescentou o antigo defesa. Recorde-se que, ainda antes de rumar ao Brasil, há sensivelmente quatro meses, o diretor técnico dos encarnados foi 'apanhado' a agredir um adepto do Sporting na sequência de insultos ao Benfica, tendo colocado baixa mais tarde para regressar ao seu país. Leia Também: Por cá: Foco em Samu e as mudanças no Benfica com três anos de Rui Costa

title: Conrad Harder elogiado na Dinamarca: "O Sporting acredita muito nele"
creator: Notícias ao Minuto
content: S teffen Hojer, selecionador dos sub-21 da Dinamarca, não fechou os olhos ao que Conrad Harder tem feito no Sporting e, na edição impressa desta quinta-feira do jornal O Jogo, explicou o motivo pelo qual resolveu promovê-lo nas camadas jovens dos nórdicos, com muitos elogios (e promessas) à mistura. "Pode até dizer-se que esta não é a altura certa para chamar o Harder, mas quando olho para o que tem feito no Sporting, consigo ver que é um jogador que cria oportunidades. Um jogador muito direto e muito confiante. Esteve bem no Nordsjaelland e agora no Sporting. Tem aproveitado todos os minutos no novo clube", começou por dizer. "Deu um passo em frente. Está num grande clube. Está a somar minutos e estou muito satisfeito com os minutos que já teve. Está a aprender a jogar com jogadores muito bons. Tem um bom treinador, foi uma mudança muito boa para ele. O Sporting acrescida muito nele. Tenho a certeza que vai encaixar bem e pode valer muito mais daqui a dois anos", atirou de seguida. Recorde-se que Conrad Harder apontou um golo e uma assistência, em cinco jogos, desde que chegou à equipa de Rúben Amorim. Leia Também: Hugo Viana mais perto do City? "Quem anda no futebol quer competência"

title: Puerpério e 'baby blues'. Que sinais e como ajudar uma mamã em pós-parto?
creator: Adriano Guerreiro
content: N o final de setembro, a criadora de conteúdos Júlia Mantero Belard partilhou um vídeo nas suas redes que se tornou viral. A pressão que, muitas vezes, a mulher sofre do grupo de amigos, família e pela sociedade em geral foi o mote. "Ainda a amamentar?", "tanto colo?", "dorme com o bebé?", foram algumas das frases que colou na zona por cima do peito. "O peso do nosso mundo, por inteiro", escreveu na publicação. Toda esta pressão pode ser desencadeadora de depressão e ansiedade, o que acaba por ser mais desafiante para uma mãe, numa altura quem que está a lidar com alterações no corpo, nas hormonas, tem um ser a crescer dentro de si ou já a lidar com todos os desafios da maternidade . Neste Dia Mundial da Saúde Mental, que se assinala esta quinta-feira, 10 de outubro, o Lifestyle ao Minuto falou com a psicóloga clínica Cláudia Alves para perceber os problemas e as questões pelas quais as mulheres passam na gravidez e no pós-parto. Existem situações que as mães devem procurar ajuda, mas também é importante o papel de toda a família e dos que a rodeiam para evitar casos mais graves . Cláudia Alves é psicóloga clínica © Clínica Pediátrica de Caldas da Rainha "Os familiares deverão, não só, estar atentos ao bebé pela novidade de acolher e participar nos cuidados do novo elemento da família, mas também estar atentos à adaptação da nova fase da vida dos pais", explica a psicóloga. A grande especificidade da depressão na gravidez e no...

title: دیپلمات سابق: ایران و ترکمنستان دو کشور خویشاوند و جدایی‌ناپذیرند
대한상의 “퇴직연금 소득대체율 12% 불과...연금 수령시 세제혜택을”
creator: 매일경제
content: 경제계가 근로자 노후 보장 강화와 퇴직연금 시장 활성화를 위해 현행 퇴직연금 제도 전반에 대한 개선을 제언했다. 10일 대한상공회의소는 “퇴직연금 가입부터 상품 운용과 수령에 이르기까지 가입자의 선택 폭을 넓혀서 수익률을 제고해야 한다”며 8대 정책 개선과제를 정부와 국회에 건의했다고 밝혔다. 대한상의에 따르면 3대 연금(국민·퇴직·개인)의 소득대체율이 OECD(경제협력개발기구) 권고치에 못 미치고 있다. 특히 퇴직연금은 소득대체율이 가장 낮다. 지난해 맥킨지 한국사무소가 발표한 자료에 따르면 2023년 기준 퇴직연금의 소득대체율은 12%로, 경제협력개발기구(OECD) 권고치인 20∼30%의 절반 수준인 것으로 나타났다. 이날 상의는 건의서에서 퇴직연금 투자 가능 상품을 현행 포지티브 방식에서 네거티브 방식으로 전환할 것을 요청했다. 현재는 퇴직연금 투자 가능 상품이 예·적금, 금융위원회가 고시하는 증권 등으로 나열돼 있고 그 외 상품에는 투자할 수 없는 만큼, 투자 가능 상품을 폭넓게 열어두는 방향으로 제도 개선이 필요하다는 것이다. 대한상의는 “퇴직연금 가입을 저해하는 요소로 작용할 수 있다”며 “투자 가능 상품을 폭넓게 열어두는 방향으로 네거티브 방식의 제도개선이 필요하다”고 밝혔다. 퇴직연금 적립액과 가입자를 늘리기 위해 경영성과급을 퇴직연금 계좌에 적립할 수 있도록 경영성과급 DC(확정기여형 퇴직연금) 제도를 개선해달라는 내용도 포함됐다. 근로자가 경영성과급을 수령하는 대신...

title: NHL-toimittajalta kova väite: Suomen tähdeltä jäi miljoonia euroja saamatta
content: Suomalaismaalivahti Juuse Saros , 29, solmi 1. heinäkuuta kahdeksanvuotisen, 61,94 miljoonan dollarin eli noin 56,4 miljoonan euron arvoisen jatkosopimuksen Nashville Predatorsin kanssa. Nashvillen palkkakatosta 7,74 miljoonaa dollaria kaudessa vievä sopimus voi osoittautua lopulta lottovoitoksi seuran kannalta. Kun Sarosta verrataan juuri hiljattain kahdeksanvuotisen, 66 miljoonan dollarin arvoisen sopimuksen Boston Bruinsin kanssa tehneeseen Jeremy Swaymaniin , 25, voidaan todeta, kuinka suomalaismaalivahdilta jäi mahdollisesti useita miljoonia pöydälle. Jopa The Athletic -sivuston tunnettu sisäpiiritoimittaja Pierre LeBrun toteaa Saroksen hätäilleen jatkosopimuksensa kanssa. – Kahdeksan vuotta ja 7,74 miljoonan dollarin keskipalkka kaverille, jolla on enemmän ykkösvahdin näyttöjä kuin Swaymanilla. Vaikeaa olla toteamatta sitä, etteikö Predatorsilla ole hallussaan todellinen alediili, LeBrun kirjoittaa artikkelissaan . Kolmen edelliskauden aikana Saros on pelannut 195 NHL:n runkosarjaottelua torjuntaprosentilla 91,4. Swayman on vuorostaan pelannut edellisen kolmen kauden aikana 122 runkosarjaottelua, joiden yhteenlaskettu torjuntaprosentti on 91,7. – Miettikää hetki miltä numero näyttäisi nyt, jos Saros olisi odottanut kauden alkuun asti, kun Swayman ja mahdollisesti Igor Shestjorkin olisivat tehneet jatkosopimuksensa. Shestjorkinin tuleva palkka tulee olemaan 11-12 miljoonaa dollaria kaudessa, LeBrun jatkoi. – Ei voi kuin hattua nostaa Predatorsin...

title: 5 triệu người vào xem nơi trốn siêu bão “quái vật” Milton, giật mình khuyên chủ nhà: Ôi làm ơn, chạy ngay đi
content: Được dự đoán là cơn bão mạnh nhất toàn cầu năm 2024, bão “quái vật” Milton đang là chủ đề khiến cư dân mạng quan tâm hơn bao giờ hết. Người dân ở Florida (Mỹ) - nơi bão quét qua cũng cập nhật tình hình hiện tại lên MXH. Trong đó, nhiều người tiết lộ đã chuẩn bị căn phòng trú ẩn trong nhà cho bản thân và gia đình. Mới đây, một người mẹ sống ở Florida đã đăng tải clip ứng phó với bão Milton cho gia đình, đặc biệt là 2 con. Cô cho biết mình đã dọn một không gian ấm áp cho các con ở dưới gầm cầu thang trong nhà. Cô còn khẳng định đây là nơi an toàn nhất với có chăn ấm nệm êm và cũi, em bé cũng nằm rất ngoan trong căn phòng nhỏ. Nhưng ngay sau khi xuất hiện, đoạn clip đã thu hút cư dân mạng, nhận về 5 triệu lượt xem sau 1 ngày. Cùng với đó là rất nhiều ý kiến trái chiều, phần lớn khuyên người mẹ nên chuyển các con sang nơi cao hơn ngay lập tức. Những người này khẳng định gầm cầu thang không phải an toàn nhất để trú ẩn, nếu không muốn nói là tệ nhất. Bởi lẽ nước có thể dâng cao, cánh cửa dẫn vào căn phòng có thể bị đóng chặt do áp lực nước. Khi đó gầm cầu thang sẽ trở thành không gian kín, hoàn toàn ngập nước và 2 đứa trẻ sẽ mắc kẹt phía trong. “Gầm cầu thang không phải...

title: 국방위 국감서 대북 정책 공방...여 "굴종 안돼" 야 "전쟁 위험"
creator: sean@sbs.co.kr(김수형)
content: 국회 국방위원회 여야 의원들은 오늘(10일) 합동참모본부 등을 대상으로 국정감사를 열고 윤석열 정부의 대북 정책을 두고 공방을 벌였습니다. 국민의힘 한기호 의원은 최근 북한의 남북 단절 조치가 내부 결속을 위한 것이라며 "앞으로 북한은 대한민국 안보 약화를 초래하고 남남갈등을 유발할 것"이라고 전망했습니다. 이어 "베냐민 네타냐후 이스라엘 총리가 하마스와 헤즈볼라를 제압해 헤즈볼라가 휴전을 요청했다"며 대북 강경 대응을 주문했습니다. 같은 당 강선영 의원도 "싸우지 않고 평화를 유지하는 것이 군의 목적이지만, 상대가 감히 넘보지 못하게 하는 능력을 갖춰야 한다"고 강조하며 정부의 대북 기조에 힘을 실었습니다. 반면, 더불어민주당 추미애 의원은 "윤석열 정부는 전쟁을 준비해야 평화가 지켜진다고 자주 말하고 있다"며 "미국 내 한반도 전문가들은 한국전쟁 위험이 그 어느 때보다 높아졌다고 우려하고 있다"며 정부의 태도를 비판했습니다. 민주당 허영 의원도 윤석열 정부에서 추진 중인 한미일 안보협력 프레임워크에 대해 "미국과 일본의 이익은 극대화되었으나 우리나라는 북·중·러를 견제하는 최전선에 놓이게 된다"며 "한미일 협력이 제도화되면 북한의 전쟁 도발 가능성을 더 자극할 수 있다"고 우려했습니다. (사진=국회사진기자단, 연합뉴스)

title: ФНС ликвидирует бизнес рэпера Сереги
content: Как сообщает Телеграм-канал SHOT, Федеральная налоговая служба ликвидирует компанию "ЛБВМС" белорусского рэп-исполнителя Сергея Пархоменко (творческий псевдоним Серега), занимавшуюся изготовлением и продажей готовых наборов еды. Как уточняет канал, основанной в 2017 году фирме уже трижды грозила ликвидация из-за неверно указанного при регистрации юридического лица адреса. Известно, что на фоне нарушений в 2020-м году "ЛБВМС"была исключена из российского реестра малого и среднего предпринимательства. "У компании накопились внушительные долги по обязательным пенсионным взносам... Теперь же фирму полностью ликвидируют", - говорится в сообщении. Ранее рэпер Серега в беседе с журналистами рассказал, в чем, по его мнению, заключается польза несчастной любви.

title: 검찰, '외국 장관에 뇌물' 건설·감리업체 임원 기소
creator: 하종민 기자
content: [서울=뉴시스] 하종민 기자 = 검찰이 해외 진출 과정에서 외국 장관에게 뇌물을 건넨 혐의를 받는 건설·감리 업체와 해당 회사 임원들을 불구속 상태로 재판에 넘겼다. 10일 서울중앙지검 국제범죄조사부(부장검사 홍용화)는 토목설계·감리 기업 A사와 A사 상무 이모(60)씨, A사 부장 양모(42)씨를 국제뇌물방지법 위반 혐의로 불구속 기소했다고 밝혔다. A사 및 해당 회사 임원들은 지난 2019년 5월 인천 소재 한 음식점에서 B국가 장관에게 '고속도로 건설 감리업체로 선정될 경우 20만 달러(한화 약 2억3500만원)를 주겠다'는 의사를 밝힌 혐의를 받는다. 또 해당 자리에서 129만원 상당의 휴대전화를 건넨 것으로도 의심받고 있다. 검찰은 지난 2019년 11월 대검찰청을 통해 해당 사건 첩보를 입수했고, 이후 국제수사 및 국내외 기관 협력을 통해 수사를 진행했다. 올해 4~9월에는 해당 회사에 대한 압수수색과 더불어 휴대전화 포렌식 등 압수물 분석, 사건 관계인 조사 등을 통해 최종적으로 관련자들에 대한 기소를 결정했다. 이와 함께 검찰은 공장자동화 소프트웨어 개발회사 C사와 해당 회사 대표이사 김모(65)씨, 부사장 김모(57)씨도 국제뇌물방지법 위반, 배임증재, 범죄수익 은닉 규제법 위반 등의 혐의로 불구속 기소했다. C사는 지난 2018년 12월경 D국가 디스플레이 제조 국유기업에 소프트웨어를 수출하며 단독입찰을 대가로 211만 달러(약 23억원) 지급을 약속하고, 외국 페이퍼컴퍼니 계좌로 2회에 걸쳐 158만 달러(약...

title: Shinsegae, Paramount Global to build theme park in Korea
creator: yonhap@koreatimes.co.kr(KoreaTimes)
content: This computer graphic image provided by Hwaseong City shows the Hwaseong International Theme Park to be built in Hwaseong, Gyeonggi Privince. Yonhap Shinsegae Group said Thursday it has partnered with U.S. media group Paramount Global to build a large-scale theme park in Korea. Shinsegae and Paramount Global plan to build the Hwaseong International Theme Park in Hwaseong, 45 kilometers south of Seoul, which will accommodate entertainment facilities, hotels, resorts, and apartment complexes, the group said in a statement. Shinsegae said it will obtain approval for the construction of the "Star Bay City" project from the Gyeonggi provincial government, with an aim to open the 4.2 million-square-meter theme park in 2029. Paramount Global, which owns CBS, cable channel MTV, and movie studio Paramount Pictures in the U.S., will participate in the planning of the theme park, the statement said. (Yonhap)

title: S. Korea, ASEAN start new era of comprehensive strategic partnership
creator: annajpark@koreatimes.co.kr(KoreaTimes)
content: President Yoon Suk Yeol holds hands with leaders of ASEAN member countries during the 25th ASEAN-Republic of Korea Summit at the National Convention Center in Vientiane, Laos, Thursday. From left are Myanmar's Deputy Foreign Minister Moe Zaw Oo, Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr., Singapore's Prime Minister Lawrence Wong, Thailand's Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra, Vietnam's Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh, Yoon, Laos' Prime Minister Sonexay Siphandone, Malaysia's Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim, Sultan of Brunei Hassanal Bolkiah, Cambodia's Prime Minister Hun Manet, Indonesia's Vice President Ma'ruf Amin and East Timor's Prime Minister Xanana Gusmao. Yonhap Highest level of bilateral ties forged at 25th ASEAN-Republic of Korea Summit By Anna J. Park VIENTIANE, Laos — South Korea and the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) have elevated their relationship to a comprehensive strategic partnership (CSP), the highest level of diplomatic ties that ASEAN establishes with its dialogue partners. This elevated level of cooperation was formalized when President Yoon Suk Yeol attended the 25th ASEAN-Republic of Korea (ROK) Summit in Vientiane, Laos, Thursday. The summit took place alongside the 44th ASEAN Summit, chaired by Laos. "Based on this highest level of partnership, South Korea and ASEAN will write a new chapter in the history of their shared future," Yoon said at the ASEAN-ROK Summit. title: За минувшие сутки в Тамбовской области не произошло ни одного ДТП
content: В Тамбовской области за 9 октября не было ДТП с пострадавшими. Такие данные приводит Госавтоинспекция региона. При этом сотрудники дорожно-патрульной службы отстранили от управления семь нетрезвых водителей и пять человек, севшими за руль без прав. Сообщить о водителях, которые – предположительно – едут в нетрезвом состоянии, можно ближайшему наряду ДПС, в дежурную часть по телефону 8 (4752) 53-40-67 или по единому номеру телефона полиции 102 . Это может спасти чью-то жизнь! Ранее «МК Тамбов» писал , что водитель в пьяном состоянии устроил ДТП в Тамбове и оказался в больнице.

title: Tamworth FC tribute to 'brilliant' George Baldock after ex-player found dead at 31
creator: newsdesk@birminghamlive.co.uk (Harry Leach)
content: Tamworth Football Club have paid tribute to George Baldock after their "brilliant" former player was found dead in a swimming pool at just 31. The Greece international, who went on to play in the Premier League for Sheffield United, was found at his home in Glyfada, southern Athens. Police reportedly attempted to resuscitate Baldock at the scene but he could not be saved. Baldock, born in England, had joined Greek side Panathinaikos in the summer after seven years at the Blades. The defender also had a spell on loan at Tamworth FC in 2012 at at the start of his career. The Lambs described him as a "brilliant character and person". READ MORE: Confirmed: Birmingham City strike deal with attacker A family statement last night confirmed the news. It read: "We can confirm that George has sadly passed away. As a family we are in shock at this terrible loss." Tributes continued to pour in from the world of football overnight. Tamworth FC said: "We're deeply saddened by the sudden passing of our former player George Baldock. "George joined Tamworth FC in 2012 at the start of his career from MK Dons on loan and made 18 appearances for the Lambs and also made his way onto the scoresheet. A brilliant character and a brilliant person, George went on to fulfill his potential and will always be remembered by everyone associated with Tamworth Football Club. "Tamworth Football Club send our sincere condolences to George Baldock’s family, friends and everyone associated with him. A Lamb...

title: Public views sought on new-look development for Glasgow’s Clydeside
creator: Kevin Scott
content: The project aims to create a “unique destination” at Custom House Quay and Carlton Place as part of the Glasgow City Region Deal project. Consultation sessions on the proposals took place on Wednesday. The design will focus on the north and south banks of the city centre waterfront, addressing the structural integrity of the quay walls and enhancing green space. Councillor Susan Aitken, leader of Glasgow City Council and chair of the Glasgow City Region Cabinet, said: “The Custom House Quay and Carlton Place project will transform a historic part of the waterfront in Glasgow city centre. “These are very exciting proposals for a new and unique city destination, and the consultation sessions will give those taking part the chance to both learn much more about them and give their views on what they would like from the final design and masterplan. The Glasgow City Region City Deal will see both the Scottish and UK Governments each provide £500m of funding for infrastructure projects. More detail on the sessions, the online survey and the project is available at: Get all the latest news from around the country Scan the QR code on your mobile device for all the latest news from around the country

title: Краеведы Липецкой области реставрируют балконы жилых домов XIX века
content: В городе Лебедяни Липецкой области краеведы реставрируют балконы жилых домов девятнадцатого века. О кропотливой работе руководитель Лебедянского фонда культуры Валерий Акимов рассказал в беседе с «Вести Липецк». Сегодня в Лебедяни сохранилось лишь 11 домов с уникальными террасами. Акимов вместе с неравнодушными лебедянцами отреставрировал балконы двух старинных домов. Средства на это были выделены из фонда президентских грантов в рамках господдержки. Краевед отметил, что через балконы он старается изменить отношение жителей к своему городу. Чтобы любить родные места, важно знать их историю. Дома с восстановленными балконами, как ожидается, позже войдут в туристический маршрут по Лебедяни.

title: Hatay'da hasarlı binanın yıkımı sırasında başka bir bina zarar gördü
content: Bu videoyu izlemek için lütfen JavaScript'i etkinleştirin Kahramanmaraş merkezli depremlerde en fazla hasarı alan Hatay’da ağır hasar alan ve mahkeme süreci tamamlanan binaların yıkımları sürüyor. İskenderun ilçesi Kurtuluş Mahallesi'nde ağır hasar alan 5 katlı binanın yıkımı için polis güvenlik önlemi aldı, çevre binalardaki vatandaşları tahliye etti. Ardından iş makineleriyle yıkımına başlanan binanın duvarı, yan tarafında bulunan 6 katlı apartmana çarparak duvar ve kolona hasar verdi. HASAR ALAN BİNADA İNCELEME İhbar üzerine olay yerine gelen ekipler, hasar alan binada inceleme başlatıldı. "EVİMİZE GİREMİYORUZ" Apartmanın sakinlerinden Seyfi Boran, binanın yıkımı esnasında evlerine zarar verildiğini belirterek, "Yan binayı yıkarken bizim binaya duvar düşmüş. Mağduruz, bütün apartman sakinleri olarak dışarıdayız. Evimize giremiyoruz. Yetkililerden bir an önce mağduriyetimizin giderilmesini istiyoruz" ifadelerini kullandı. İskenderun Kaymakamlığı, binanın hasar alması nedeniyle evlerine giremeyen bina sakinlerinin talep edilmesi halinde konteynerlere yerleşebileceklerini duyurdu.

title: Maalaala Mo Kaya: Show Of Charo Santos Will Return?
creator: Jhen G. Lim
content: The Kapamilya drama anthology Maalaala Mo Kaya hosted by seasoned showbiz personality Charo Santos is indeed a television icon and a rumor recently circulated that it will return on air. MMK, the weekly drama show that featured real-life stories of Filipinos from different walks of life, was on air for three decades. It became a big part of many people’s weekly TV viewing routine. The show big goodbye to the viewers in 2022. This broke the hearts of many avid viewers. In a past statement, Charo shared what she thought was the reason why the show lasted for 30 years . She said that it was because of the show’s genuineness and sincerity. In a recent article released by PEP, it was said that Maalaala Mo Kaya will return on air. It was said that talks have started regarding MMK’s return. Reportedly, this will air on TV5. As of this writing, ABS-CBN has not released yet a statement regarding this. Aside from MMK, it was also rumored that a new game show featuring a Kapamilya contract star is already in the planning stage. The said show’s title has something to do with “barangay” and this is intended to be for “masa.” This show will be the new chapter in the Kapamilya star’s career. It was said that this Kapamilya star was prepared for the temporary exit of Kapamilya host Luis Manzano who filed his certificate of candidacy for vice governor of Batangas. Meanwhile, Maalaala Mo Kaya was also recognized by Magpakailanman host Mel Tiangco. For many years, Charo and Mel had been rivals...

title: 日증시, 엔화 약세에 자동차주 등 상승...닛케이지수 0.26%↑
creator: 박준호 기자
content: [서울=뉴시스] 박준호 기자 = 10일 도쿄 주식시장에서 일본 증시의 대표 지수인 닛케이225지수(닛케이 평균주가)는 강보합 마감했다. 이날 닛케이 지수는 전 거래일 대비 102.93포인트(0.26%) 상승한 3만9380.89로 거래를 마쳤다. 도쿄증권 주가지수(TOPIX)는 전장에 비해 5.43포인트(0.20%) 뛴 2712.67로 폐장했다. JPX 닛케이 인덱스 400지수는 전 거래일 보다 53.85포인트(0.22%) 오른 2만4844.50으로 장을 마감했다. 니혼게이자이신문에 따르면 9일 미국 주식시장에서 주요 3개 지수가 모두 상승한 흐름을 일본 증시도 이어갔다. 외환 시장에서 엔·달러 환율이 한때 1달러=149엔대 중반으로, 2개월만의 엔화 약세·달러화 강세를 기록한 것도 호재로 작용헤 주력 수출 관련주 등이 매수됐다. 이날 오전 닛케이지수의 상승폭은 한때 300포인트를 넘었지만, 그 후로는 이익 확정 등의 매도에 밀리는 모습도 눈에 띄었다. 일본 시간으로 10일 밤에 공개되는 9월 미 소비자물가지수(CPI)의 발표를 앞두고, 일방적인 매수 움직임은 계속 되지 않았다. 요미우리신문은 미국의 금리가 오르면서 달러가 매수되고 엔화가 약세를 보이면서 실적에 힘입은 자동차주가 상승하고, 대출과 운용에 의한 수익 증대를 기대할 수 있는 은행·보험주도 매수됐지만 눈에 띄는 거래 재료가 부족해 상승폭은 제한적이었다고 보도했다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: Survivor: Η ανακοίνωση του Γιώργου Λιανού που ξάφνιασε τους παίκτες κι εκείνοι που πάνε στο Νησί της Εξορίας
content: Μία ανατροπή επιφύλασσε ο στους παίκτες του Στο χθεσινό επεισόδιο, ο παρουσιαστής ενημέρωσε τους παίκτες πως το Νησί της Εξορίας «επιστρέφει», αφήνοντάς τους άναυδους. σημείωσε με τους παίκτες να περιμένουν πώς και πώς να ακούσουν τι είχε να τους πει. Στη συνέχεια, τους εξήγησε πως η κάθε ομάδα θα πρέπει να επιλέξει έναν παίκτη ή παίκτρια που θα σταλθεί εκεί. », ανακοίνωσε ο Γιώργος Λιανός. Τελικά, οι παίκτες επέλεξαν να στείλουν στο Νησί της Εξορίας τον Μιχάλη και τη Γεωργία. Το κλίμα ανάμεσα στους δύο παίκτες ήταν καλό ευτυχώς, με τη Γεωργία να δείχνει να απολαμβάνει την εξορία, σε αντίθεση με τον Μιχάλη. Τελικά, οι δύο αρχηγοί, Νίνο και Γιάννης κάθισαν και διαπραγματεύτηκαν για ένα καλάθι αβγά. Αυτό που έπρεπε να κάνουν ήταν να ορίσουν έναν παίκτη της ομάδας τους που θα αντικαθιστούσε εκείνον που στάλθηκε στην εξορία προηγουμένως. Τελικά, η διαπραγμάτευση δεν κράτησε πολλή ώρα, με τους Πράσινους να παίρνουν το καλάθι με τα αβγά, με αντάλλαγμα μελλοντικές προμήθειες και ο Γιάννης υπέδειξε τον Βλαδίμηρο ως τον παίκτη που θα αντικαθιστούσε τον Μιχάλη.

title: Sinner doping, parla il fisioterapista Naldi: "Vorrei raccontare anche io"
content: Per la prima volta, social a parte, Giacomo Naldi parla di Sinner . Il suo nome è noto: era il fisioterapista di Jannik prima del caso doping . La storia è nota: il numero uno al mondo è stato trovato positivo dopo essere venuto a contatto a Indian Wells, durante un massaggio da parte di Naldi, con il Trofondermin, un farmaco che contiene il Clostebol e che era stato acquistato dall'ex preparatore Ferrara in una farmacia di Bologna per curare una ferita al mignolo della mano sinistra su suggerimento di Umberto. Oggi Naldi e Ferrara non fanno più parte del team Sinner, Jannik è stato assolto ma la Wada ha fatto ricorso e si attende la sentenza del Tas . Il campione azzurro, quando gli viene chiesto, torna sull'argomento, Naldi invece non ne aveva mai parlato. Fino ad ora. Sinner doping, parla il fisioterapista Naldi “ Sto bene – le parole di Naldi durante la presentazione del progetto "Open Food Factory" riportate dal Quotidiano Sportivo–, sono dispiaciuto come tutti. Non posso dire altro, spero solo, prima o poi, di poter raccontare anche io cosa è successo per dare un quadro generale, come sa chi ha letto la sentenza” . Naldi da anni ha uno studio di fisioterapia a Casalecchio di Reno (in provincia di Bologna), frequentato da tanti sportivi. Del resto, fino al 2022 lavorava nello staff della Virtus Bologna: “ Ho lavorato con la Virtus e poi nel 2023 ho iniziato con Sinner. Dal club bolognese sono stati molto gentili nei miei confronti subito dopo quello che è...

title: Может начаться с мелочи: что способно переломить ход войны
content: Необратимые процессы уже запущены. За более чем 2 года войны Россия понесла немало потерь, но не все они очевидны для рядового населения. Зато властная верхушка осталась фактически безнаказанной и до сих пор верит, что страна-агрессор может победить. Россия понесла огромные экономические, человеческих потерь, но зато власть только обогатилась. Такое мнение высказал доктор философии, политический эксперт , отметив, что теперь все пытаются заработать на военно-промышленном комплексе. «Конечно, даже верхушка столкнулась с санкциями, блокировкой, но эти ограничения не являются такими критическими. Поэтому большинство до сих пор думает, что война – это якобы лишь временные неудобства, которые когда-то закончатся. А пока можно обогащаться на ВПК. Если бы эти люди знали, что после войны их ждет трибунал, пожизненные заключения, конфискация всего имущества – они бы задумались, но сейчас этого не происходит», – отметил Андрей Городницкий. Владимир Путин продолжает убеждать всех, что Россия якобы сильнее, чем все другие страны. К сожалению, в Европе и США некоторые политики до сих пор в это верят. Они говорят, что Россию якобы нельзя победить. Хотя Украина на поле боя показывает, что это совсем не так. «После войны россияне в любом случае пожалеют, что все это начали. Необратимые процессы уже запущены, но они пока этого не понимают», – подчеркнул политический эксперт. Часть экспертов считает, что это будет возвращение Крыма. С этого момента для России начнется обратный...

title: PM Modi arrives in Laos to attend ASEAN-India East Asia summits
content: Vientiane, Oct 10 (PTI) Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Thursday arrived in Laos on a two-day visit to attend the ASEAN-India and East Asia summits to further deepen engagement with countries in the groupings. Modi is visiting Lao PDR on the invitation of Prime Minister Sonexay Siphandone. Laos is the current chair of the ASEAN. During the visit, Modi will participate in the 21st ASEAN-India and the 19th East Asia summits. In his departure statement, Modi noted that India is marking a decade of Act East policy this year. "I will join the ASEAN leaders to review progress in our Comprehensive Strategic Partnership and chart the future direction of our cooperation," the prime minister said. The East Asia Summit will provide an opportunity to deliberate on the challenges to peace, stability and prosperity in the Indo-Pacific region, he said. Modi said India shared close cultural and civilisation ties with the region, including with the Lao People's Democratic Republic (PDR), which is enriched by a shared heritage of Buddhism and Ramayana. "I look forward to my meetings with the Lao PDR leadership to further strengthen our bilateral ties," he said. He added, "This is a special year as we mark a decade of our Act East Policy, which has led to substantial benefits for our nation. There will also be various bilateral meetings and interactions with various world leaders during this visit." The Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) was founded in 1967. The member States are...

title: Latham looks forward to giving own spin to Kiwi brand of cricket in India tour
content: Wellington, Oct 10 (PTI) Newly-appointed New Zealand Test captain Tom Latham says he is looking forward to his progression from a "caretaker" to a full-time leader of the side that will allow him to put his "own spin on things" starting with the tour of India this week. Latham, who has captained the Black Caps Test side in nine previous matches, took over as full time captain from Tim Southee, who stepped down last week. He will lead a 15-strong squad, including Southee, to India on Friday for the three-match series starting October 16. "It's obviously a special feeling to be named full-time captain. It's massive honour and a huge privilege. I think in the past, it's always been a little bit of a caretaker role...But I guess, it's a different situation where I would be able to put a little bit of my own spin on things and what that looks like," the 32-year-old Latham said in a short video posted by New zealand Cricket. "I am not 100 per cent sure yet but hopefully we will see where it does look a little bit different. As a Test team, in the past, we have a done huge amount of good things. We have been successful playing a brand of cricket that is true to us as Kiwis," he added. "It's obviously a great group, a bunch of leaders, a bunch of older guys, and also some amazing talent coming through. So it's certainly an exciting time and yeah, it will be a great challenge." The series against India will begin in Bengaluru, followed by games in Pune and Mumbai. Gary Stead will...

title: Odisha govt names senior officers as in charge of 16 aspirational districts
content: Bhubaneswar, Oct 10 (PTI) The Odisha government named 15 senior officers in charge of aspirational districts under a NITI Aayog programme to ensure the development of backward areas in the state. These senior officers will review the progress of the developmental schemes in these districts. In a notification issued on Wednesday, the Planning and Convergence Department said the concerned officer will ensure that the programmes are properly implemented at the ground level. IAS officer Hemant Sharma was named the secretary in charge for Keonjhar district, Sushil Kumar Lohani for Kalahandi, Bishnupada Sethi for Malkangiri, Chithra Arumugam for Koraput, Saswat Mishra for Bargarh, Usha Padhee for Kandhamal and Vir Vikram Yadav for Bolangir. IAS officer Vishal Kumar Dev was named in charge for Nuapada, Sanjay Kumar Singh for Mayurbhanj, Subha Sarma for Gajapati and Bhaskar Jyoti Sarma for Nabarangpur. IAS officer Shalini Pandit was given the responsibility of Rayagada, Aswathy S of Sundargarh, Arvind Agrawal of Sambalpur, N Thirumala Naik of Nayagarh and Sudhansu Mohan Samal of Dhenkanal.

title: काँग्रेसची १२५ जागांची मागणी रोखली !
creator: पुढारी वृत्तसेवा
content: मुंबई : पुढारी वृत्तसेवा हरयाणा विधानसभा निवडणुकीतील काँग्रेसच्या पराभवामुळे महाराष्ट्रातील आगामी विधानसभा निवडणुकीत महाविकास आघाडीच्या जागावाटपात काँग्रेसच्या १२५ जागांच्या मागणीला ठाकरे गट आणि शरद पवार गटाने वेसण घातली आहे. मुंबई आणि विदर्भातील काही जागांवरून काँग्रेसशी ठाकरे आणि शरद पवार गट घासाघीस करत आहे. महाविकास आघाडीची बुधवारी मुंबईत यशवंतराव चव्हाण प्रतिष्ठानमध्ये सात तास बैठक झाली. या बैठकीनंतर राष्ट्रवादी काँग्रेसचे नेते जयंत पाटील, अनिल देशमुख आणि जितेंद्र आव्हाड यांनी पक्षाचे अध्यक्ष शरद पवार यांची भेट घेत त्यांच्यासोबत चर्चा केली. हरियाणात पराभूत झालेल्या काँग्रेसविरुद्ध ठाकरे गट आणि शरद पवार गटाचा आवाज या बैठकीत वाढल्याचे सांगण्यात आले. आतापर्यंत आक्रमक भूमिका घेणाऱ्या काँग्रेसच्या नेत्यांनीही या बैठकीत नमते घेतले. कॉंग्रेस मुंबई आणि विदर्भात जास्त जागा जिंकेल, असे सांगितले जात असताना त्याच भागातील जागांवर ठाकरे गट दावा करत असल्याने तिढा वाढला आहे. शिवाय राष्ट्रवादी काँग्रेसही नागपूर जिल्ह्यातील दोन जागांसाठी आग्रही आहे. २०१९ च्या विधानसभा निवडणुकीत काँग्रेस, शिवसेना आणि राष्ट्रवादी काँग्रेसने जिंकलेल्या जागा कायम ठेवण्याचा निर्णय झाला आहे. मात्र मुंबई आणि विदर्भातील जागांवरून कॉंग्रेस आणि ठाकरे गटात संघर्ष सुरू असतानाच हरियाणा विधानसभा निकालांनी या जागावाटपातही काँग्रेसची पिछेहाट सुरू झाली. परिणामी, दसऱ्याला सगळे जागावाटप जाहीर करू, हा आघाडीच्या नेत्यांचा दावा फोल ठरणार आहे. ११ तारखेला पत्रकार परिषद घेऊन पुढील गोष्टी स्पष्ट करू. आणखी चर्चा बाकी असून २८८ जागांवरची चर्चा सुरू आहे, असे प्रदेश काँग्रेसचे अध्यक्ष नाना पटोले यांनी सांगितले. राष्ट्रवादी, काँग्रेस...

title: Cricket-Shakib apologises for silence during Bangladesh protests
content: (Reuters) - Bangladesh all-rounder Shakib Al Hasan has apologised for his silence during protests in the country and requested fans to be present for his final test match against South Africa in Dhaka from Oct. 21. The 37-year-old was a member of parliament for the Awami League led by Sheikh Hasina, whose 15-year rule as prime minister ended in August with her fleeing to India following deadly protests. Shakib has not been home since protests erupted in July but the Bangladesh Cricket Board has assured him he will not be harassed on his return. "Firstly, I would like to pay my respects to all the students who sacrificed their lives, led the anti-discrimination movement, and were martyred or injured during the people's uprising," Shakib posted on Facebook on Wednesday. "I extend my deepest respect and condolences to them and their families. "While no sacrifice can compensate for the loss of a loved one, nothing can fill the void of losing a child or a brother, to those of you who were hurt by my silence during this critical period, I respect your feelings and sincerely apologise. If I were in your place, I too might have been upset." Shakib is considered the greatest cricketer Bangladesh has produced but his political past places the former captain in a tricky position as an interim government supervises a power transition. Shakib announced his intention to retire from tests in September. He has played 71 tests, 247 One-Day Internationals and 129 Twenty20 Internationals,...
