(Dec. 3) 2 'HEAVY HITTER ' Katie Cotugno's romance about an athlete/pop star couple is based in part on Swift and NFL great Travis Kelce. 3 'POEMS FOR TORTURED SOULS ' This poetry anthology compiled by Liz Ison includes verse from Emily Dickinson, Edna St. Vincent Millay and other alleged kindred souls of Swift's. 4 THE 13 DAYS OF SWIFTNESS' A picture story, written by Tiffany Garland, with art by Brooke O'Neill, will have holiday shoppers chanting "12 strings for strumming" and "11 bracelets beaded. 5 'TAYLOR SWIFT STYLE: FASHION THROUGH THE ERAS ' A fashion anthology by Sarah Chapelle of the Instagram and blog "Taylor Swift Style" documents Swift's fashion evolution. Rolling Stone writer Rob Sheffield delves into Swift's cultural impact. (Nov. 12) Get local news delivered to your inbox!

title: Panthers loss another reminder of botched 2023 trade
creator: STEVE REED AP Sports Writer
content: CHARLOTTE — Sunday's game served as yet another unneeded reminder for the Carolina Panthers of just how badly they botched the trade for Bryce Young in 2023 — and how far back it has set the franchise. Caleb Williams threw for 304 yards and two touchdowns — both of those to former Carolina wide receiver D.J. Moore — as the Bears routed the Panthers 36-10 in Chicago. Moore was part of the deal in which the Panthers also sent four draft picks to the Bears to move up to the No. 1 overall pick to acquire a franchise quarterback. But instead of taking C.J. Stroud, who went No. 2 overall to the Houston Texans and has experienced quick success, the Panthers took Young — and it has been a disaster ever since. Young is 2-16 as an NFL starter and was benched just two games into the Dave Canales era for 36-year-old journeyman Andy Dalton. Williams, meanwhile, displayed good pocket presence in the best game of his young career. Williams, of course, was taken No. 1 overall in this year's draft with a pick the Bears received from the Panthers after Carolina finished with an NFL-worst 2-15 record last season. The Bears also added offensive tackle Darnell Wright and cornerback Tyrique Stevenson — both of whom are now starters — along with punter Tory Taylor as part of that trade haul that could haunt the Panthers for years. Even more concerning is that hindsight is proving the Panthers may not have needed to make the move at all had they been able to develop their own quarterback. The...

title: PRIME TIME
creator: AMANDA LAURENRealSimple.com
content: LIVING SPACE If you're looking for an easy home project that makes a big im-pact, there's nothing quite like painting a room, kitchen cabinets or even just a piece of furniture. When you're doing this yourself, you can expect to do some prep work, and one of the most important steps in paint preparation is applying primer. Or is it? Primer is basically just paint that's (typically) untinted, and it's applied to walls before the paint color of choice is. The texture is usually thicker than traditional paint to smooth out the wall surface and help the top coat stick. In the past, primer has been recommended for a variety of reasons, from helping to mask the existing wall color to covering up cigarette smoke odors. But it turns out you don't always need to prime your surfaces. Here's when you can skip primer, along with the times you absolutely need it. When isn't paint primer necessary? If you've never painted something before, you probably think every surface needs to be primed before painting. This is sort of true, but there are definitely exceptions to this rule. 1 When the surface is super smooth and light "If you are painting over something fl at, matte or in good condition, you don't necessarily need to prime," says Jamie Davis, co-founder of Portola Paints. "Also, if you are painting dark over light, primer is not typically necessary." 2 When the existing paint is the same material or finish Primer also is unnecessary if you're changing colors but sticking to the same...

title: Son visits his in-laws more than his parents
content: Dear Eric: We hardly ever see my son, daughter-in-law and 8-year-old grandson. Their time is very skewed toward my daughter-in-law's family. We get along very well with my daughter-in-law's parents, and we consider ourselves friends. But it very clearly seems we are not on any of their brain waves. We had a discussion about it a few years ago and they were surprised and apologetic that we felt so left out. They had promised to make a better effort at getting together but nothing really changed. I've taken it upon myself to call every so often and invite them over or offer to take my grandson out for the day, but they're always booked up with other activities. I've made sure not to be the kind of mother/mother-in-law that constantly nags their kids that they don't visit enough. So far, I know I get to see them Christmas Eve, Easter and Thanksgiving. I don't know what to do. It's really getting to us. To the point that I just want to move to another state so I'm not around to be left out. — Neglected Grandmother Dear Grandmother: Let's assume the best and chalk a lot of this up to your son and daughter-in-law being caught up with the demands of life and parenting a little one. I know it probably feels personal (and only getting to see them on the three holidays seems low for people who live nearby). But try to put that feeling aside for the time being. You should talk to them about this again but frame the conversation around working together to see each other more. Maybe...

title: Fall garden cleanup doesn't mean what it used to
creator: JESSICA DAMIANO | Associated Press
content: Cleaning up the garden — or "putting the garden to bed" — has traditionally been a fall endeavor. In recent years, however, as information about the migrating or hibernating habits of birds, pollinators and other beneficial wildlife has seeped into the mainstream, many gardeners are postponing their big cleanups until spring. And that's a good thing. But there are quite a few tasks that still should be tended to now. Some are holdovers from the old protocol; others are new ways of tackling conventional chores that have evolved with our better understanding of the ecosystem. 'Leave the leaves' Take leaf removal. Raking (and more recently, blowing) has long been a harbinger of fall. However, bagging and trashing those leaves — and the shelter they would provide for overwintering insects, not to mention the pollinator eggs attached to their undersides — has given way to the "leave the leaves" movement in recent years. Homeowners are realizing that sending a plastic bag of organic matter to a landfill not only ensures it will outlast themselves but also amounts to throwing away free fertilizer. Allowing leaves to remain where they fall around perennials, trees and shrubs and moving them from lawns to beds and borders enriches the soil with plant-boosting nutrients. It also provides shelter and habitat for overwintering pollinators. Prune the plants Instead of cutting every perennial to ground level before the first frost, gardeners are now being selective. Allowing the dried...

title: Stitching in time
creator: YURI KAGEYAMAAssociated Press
content: JAPAN Time seems to stop here. Wo m e n sit in a small circle, quietly, painstakingly stitching patterns on balls the size of an orange. At the center of the circle is Eiko Araki, a master of the Sanuki Kagari Temari, a Japanese traditional craft passed down for more than 1,000 years on the southwestern island of Shikoku. Each ball, or temari, is a work of art, with colorful geometric patterns carrying poetic names like "firefl y fl owers" and "layered stars." A temari ball takes weeks or months to finish. Some cost hundreds of dollars (tens of thousands of yen), though others are much cheaper. These kaleidoscopic balls aren't for throwing or kicking around. They're destined to be heirlooms, carrying prayers for health and goodness. They might be treasured like a painting or piece of sculpture. The concept behind temari is an elegant otherworldliness, an impractical beauty that is also very labor-intensive to create. "Out of nothing, something this beautiful is born, bringing joy," Araki said. "I want it to be remembered there are beautiful things in this world that can only be made by hand." Natural materials The region where temari originated was good for growing cotton — warm with little rainfall — and the spherical creations continue to be made out of the humble material. At Araki's studio, which also serves as head office for temari's preservation society, there are 140 hues of cotton thread, including delicate pinks and blues, as well as more vivid colors and all the...

title: WELCOME BACK
creator: DOUG FERGUSON | Associated Press
content: The late Tom Weiskopf was never one to mince words inside the ropes and in the broadcast booth, or even when he was surveying land for a new golf course. This was no ordinary land in the southwest corner of Utah — a 600acre field of black lava amid red rock mountains about 30 miles from Zion National Park. "We were walking the course and he picked up a rock and he handed it to me," said Patrick Manning, the managing partner of Black Desert Resort. "He said, 'Hey, Patrick, what's this?' I said, 'It's a rock.' He said, 'You're correct, this is a rock.' "But then he puts his arms out and he said, 'This is a desert.' And it became Black Desert at that point." It was the last championship golf course Weiskopf designed before he died in August 2022 of pancreatic cancer. His partner, Phil Smith, finished the project that has been depicted as a landscape where "Kona (Hawaii) meets Sedona (Arizona)." The course is part of a $2 billion resort with an enormous convention center, seven restaurants, eventually 800 guest rooms — and now a PGA Tour event. The Black Desert Championship, which starts Thursday, marks the return of the PGA Tour to Utah for the first time since Tommy Jacobs won the 1963 Utah Open Invitational. And then some six months later, Black Desert welcomes the LPGA Tour to its stunning vistas. It will be the only course that hosts official tournaments for the PGA Tour and the LPGA Tour in the same season (Tiburon Golf Club in Naples, Florida, hosts the LPGA's season...

title: A new chapter
creator: BRUCE R. MILLER Sioux City Journal
content: TELEVISION | 'GEORGIE AND MANDY'S FIRST MARRIAGE' When Montana Jordan shot the first episode of "Georgie and Mandy's First Marriage," he didn't know what to expect. "Young Sheldon" — his first series — didn't feature a live audience. "Georgie" did. "Young Sheldon" wasn't "his" show; "Georgie" is. And hitting marks with a new family of actors? "It was electric, energetic, awesome and really fun," he says. "I'm going to do the best I can to bring it to life." To prove as much, he and costar Emily Osment — the show's Mandy — practiced a tango for the opening credits. "If Montana and I can learn a full tango, I think this marriage is going to work," Osment says. The "first" aspect isn't necessarily a clue as to what lies ahead, but it has given "Big Bang Theory" folks reason to tune in. Family matters In the new comedy, the two are trying out married life and parenthood under the roof of her parents' home. Will Sasso and Rachel Bay Jones play Mandy's parents, and yes, there are issues, particularly with Georgie, who works at the family tire business. When Mandy's mother questions Georgie's intelligence, he doesn't become angry because, creator Chuck Lorre says, "he's always been considered the dumb brother. And he encourages it because people underestimate him, and it gives him an edge." In "Young Sheldon," Georgie knew his brother was the prodigy and destined for great things, but that didn't mean he couldn't achieve, too. "It's undeniable that the passing of his father at the...

title: Top-five matchup
creator: ERIC OLSONAssociated Press
content: A matchup of top-five teams, the Red River Rivalry and a possible College Football Playoff knockout game are the main events on the Week 7 college football schedule. No. 2 Ohio State goes to No. 3 Oregon for the second game between top-five opponents in three weeks. Something amazing would have to happen for the Buckeyes and Ducks to duplicate the drama of Alabama-Georgia. Nevertheless, anyone who predicted Ohio State-Oregon on Saturday would loom larger than the traditional regular season-ending game between Ohio State and Michigan — at least this year — is looking pretty smart right now given the recent performances by the defending national champion Wolverines. This could be the first of as many as three meetings between the Buckeyes and Ducks, with matchups in the Big Ten championship game and playoff possible. No. 1 Texas and No. 18 Oklahoma square off in their annual game in Dallas. The Longhorns returned to the top of the rankings following Alabama's upset loss to Vanderbilt. They're coming off an open date, and it looks as if quarterback Quinn Ewers has recovered from his abdominal injury and is ready to be the starter again. If not, Arch Manning has proved more than capable. OU, meanwhile, will start a true freshman quarterback (Michael Hawkins) against Texas for the first time. The other big Southeastern Conference game is No. 9 Mississippi at No. 13 LSU. Neither team has had a smooth ride this season, and the loser will have two losses and a serious dent put in...

title: Return of the Belgian Bomber
content: Second place can be worthy of a big celebration, and such was the case for Nicolas Colsaerts. Colsaerts, the free-wheeling Belgian best known for single-handedly beating Tiger Woods and Steve Stricker in fourballs at the 2012 Ryder Cup, went toe-to-toe with Tyrrell Hatton in the Dunhill Links Championship before narrowly missing an 8-foot birdie putt on the final hole. Disappointed? Yes. But consider that it was nearly three years ago when Colsaerts went to a hospital in Dubai with swollen ankles and discovered he had blood clots and fl uid in his lungs from a rare kidney disease called primary membranous nephropathy. He once told of looking out the hospital window thinking, "Is this where I'm going to die?" Colsaerts recovered. His game did not. He made two cuts in 2022. The European tour gave him a full medical exemption in 2023 and he had one top 10. He was leaning on sponsor exemptions this year and it paid off with his runner-up finish that will secure a card for 2025. "This has been my life for over 20 years now," Colsaerts said. "I don't know, it looks like we're going to go back on the merry-go-round." Most happily, for sure. Divots: The Black Desert Championship in Utah will use robotic fairway mowers, the first time for any PGA Tour event. ... Farmington Country Club in Charlottesville, Virginia, will get the 2027 U.S. Women's Amateur Four-Ball. It last hosted a USGA championship in 1993 for the U.S. Senior Amateur. — Associated Press Get local news delivered to...

title: Gold prices dip for second day in India: Is a further drop likely?
content: Gold prices in India declined for the second straight day on Thursday, October 10, 2024, while international markets saw a slight uptick. Traders are focused on key US inflation data expected later today, which will help gauge the Federal Reserve’s next monetary policy move. In India, 24-carat gold fell by ₹50 to ₹76,640 per 10 grams. This marks a consistent dip in gold prices following a broader trend of correction in the global markets. Global gold prices edge higher Globally, spot gold inched up 0.2% to $2,614 per ounce, after a six-day losing streak. US gold futures also gained 0.2%, reaching $2,631.40. Gold had recently reached record highs but is currently under pressure due to a stronger US dollar and speculation about future interest rate cuts. Factors driving the fall in gold prices The gold price in India is influenced by multiple factors, including: US interest rate outlook: Minutes from the September Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meeting revealed that most members favored a 50-basis-point rate cut, which contributed to a rise in the US dollar. This made gold less attractive as a safe-haven investment. Geopolitical tensions: Although rising tensions between Israel and Iran are a concern, investors remain cautious. Renisha Chainani, Head of Research at Augmont, noted that gold has broken key support at $2,650 per ounce and may aim for $2,600 per ounce (₹73,500 per 10 grams). Upcoming US CPI data: The US Consumer Price Index (CPI) for September, due today, is...

title: Catawba County man to fight for bare knuckles title in Spain
creator: JASON KOON jason.koon@lee.net
content: Tony "Loco" Soto is trying to approach his next bare knuckles fight like it is just another fight. "It's crazy when you think about it from an outer perspective," Soto said. "But at the end of the day, I'm going to be in that ring ... and nothing matters except who is in front of me ... I've got a job to do. It's strictly business." In truth, though, it's more than just another fight. On Oct. 12, the Brooklyn-native who has lived in Catawba County for the last 10 years will step into a bullfighting arena in Marbella, Spain to fight for the Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship lightweight world title. It is the main event and one of three title fights slated for the evening. It is also being hailed as the biggest event in the history of the promotion, coming less than six months after UFC star Conor McGregor became part owner of the organization. Across the ring from Soto (6-0) will be Franco Tenaglia. Tenaglia is also undefeated but has only three BKFC fights under his belt. He does have previous bare knuckles MMA experience, though. The event will begin at 1 p.m. Eastern time on Saturday. Romeo and Brewliet Taproom in Hickory will be hosting an official watch party. Bare knuckles rules are patterned after the Broughton Rules which governed English boxing in an earlier era. All fights consist of five two-minute rounds. One of the key stipulations forbids fighters from using wraps, tape or gauze within one inch of their knuckles. By Broughton Rules, fighters must "toe the line"...

title: Oakwood Elementary fifthgrade teacher receives award
creator: FROM STAFF REPORTS
content: Oakwood Elementary fifth-grade teacher Dorothy Dalton has been selected as the 2024-2025 North Carolina Council of Teachers of Mathematics ( NCCTM ) and North Carolina Department of Public Instruction Outstanding Elementary School Mathematics Teacher for Hickory City Schools. Dalton will be formally recognized at the NCCTM 2024 annual conference in Winston-Salem Nov. 14 at an awards ceremony. Outstanding mathematics teachers from around the state will be celebrated. In addition to receiving statewide recognition, Dalton will enjoy a complimentary one-year membership to NCCTM. Her selection for the award underscores her commitment to excellence in teaching and her dedication to fostering a strong foundation in mathematics for her students. "We are thrilled that Ms. Dalton's hard work and passion for education are being acknowledged with this prestigious award," Hickory City Schools Superintendent Jennifer Griffin said. "Her leadership and dedication to her students serve as an inspiration to all of us." Get local news delivered to your inbox!

title: Man charged in slaying of former Clemson receiver
creator: ASSOCIATED PRESS
content: GREENSBORO — A 20-year-old man was arrested in Michigan and charged with first-degree murder in last month's fatal shooting of former Clemson receiver Diondre Overton, police in North Carolina said Tuesday. Jeremiah Diago Blanks is believed to have slain Overton at a gathering in the former player's hometown of Greensboro last month, the Guilford County Sheriff's Office said in a news release. Guilford County Sheriff Danny H. Rogers said detectives traveled to Michigan and got help from the U.S. Marshals Service in arresting Blanks. Police did not disclose further information about Blanks or a potential motive for the slaying. He was being held in the Oakland County Jail in the Detroit suburb of Pontiac, Michigan, pending extradition to North Carolina. Overton, 26, was found on the morning of Sept. 7 after deputies responded to reports of a loud party. He was given medical care but died at the scene. Overton played for Clemson from 2016-2019 and was part of national title teams after the 2016 and 2018 seasons. He had 52 catches for 777 yards and seven touchdowns for the Tigers. News of Overton's death came a few hours before the Tigers' 66-20 victory over Appalachian State. Clemson coach Dabo Swinney stopped to pay tribute at Overton's plaque during the team's entrance to the stadium. "He truly was one of the sweetest, spirited kids that we've had come through here and, again, truly a great teammate," Swinney said that night. Get local news delivered to your inbox!

title: Caldwell, Catawba blood drives set
creator: SPECIAL TO THE RECORD
content: The American Red Cross continues to work to restock critically needed blood products uncollected due to the ongoing impact of Hurricane Helene's devastation in the Southeast. Donors outside of affected areas are encouraged to make an appointment to give now and help keep the blood supply stable in the weeks to come. Since making landfall, the storm and its aftermath have led to the cancellation of more than 100 blood drives, causing thousands of blood and platelet donations to go uncollected. For so many people living with urgent medical care needs, blood transfusions are essential, and donations in the Southeast are key to keeping our nationwide network stocked. The Red Cross operates through a national inventory with the ability to move blood wherever and whenever it is needed most. The time to give blood or platelets is now. Bring hope to those in need by visiting RedCrossBlood.org , calling 1-800-RED CROSS or by using the Red Cross Blood Donor App. As the Red Cross continues to urge people to give blood or platelets now, our teams are also on the ground providing vital relief — like food, water, shelter and support — in communities devastated by Hurricane Helene. Anyone able to help those impacted by disasters big and small across the country, like Helene, consider making a gift of any amount. All who come to give blood, platelets or plasma Oct. 1-31 will receive a $10 Amazon.com gift card by email, plus be automatically entered for a chance to win one of three $5,000...

title: Virginia Crump Sherrill
content: Virginia (Jenny) Sherrill died peacefully at home in Leland on October 2, 2024. She was one month short of 91 years old. She was born November 8, 1933 in Hartwell, Georgia to Thornton Jonah Crump and Ruby Lucile Bailey. She is also preceded in death by her husband of 66 years, Jack Delano Sherrill and her son, David Forrest Sherrill. She is survived by a daughter and son-in-law, Karen and Adrian Sanders and a daughter-in-law, Karen Youngblood. She has one granddaughter -Jordan and three grandsons Joshua (Michelle), Ivan (Schylene), and Henry, plus 4 great grandchildren Edin, Jackson, Nikolai, and Branwen. Jenny was an avid golfer who played in many North Carolina, Georgia, and Virginia state tournaments and many local tournaments throughout the southeast. She was an accomplished artist and produced oil landscapes and still-life paintings. Services and final resting place will be with her husband, Jack, at Arlington National Cemetery in Arlington, Virginia. Date to be announced. Get local news delivered to your inbox!

title: Alex Lee donating $500K to hurricane relief
content: Alex Lee, the parent company of Lowes Foods, Kj's Market, MDI, W. Lee Flowers, Souto Foods, and Import Mex, announced that it will be donating $500,000 to agencies actively responding to those affected by Hurricane Helene. These agencies include Feeding America affiliates serving the impacted areas in the Carolinas and Georgia, and the Red Cross. "As a company based in the Carolinas, we see the need firsthand," Brian George, president and CEO of Alex Lee, said in a news release. "We have worked with our vendors and partner agencies to get urgent supplies to the affected areas, but we know that a monetary donation is the most efficient way for these agencies to have the biggest impact. We also know our guests want to make a difference, so we are accepting donations for the Red Cross at our registers. These organizations are equipped with the experience and infrastructure to most effectively help those in need." Founded in 1931, Hickory-based Alex Lee is a family-owned and operated company that employs approximately 15,000 people. It serves as the parent company of Merchants Distributors, LLC, which provides full-service, wholesale distribution to supermarkets; Souto Foods, a distributor of authentic Hispanic foods; and Import Mex, a distributor of Mexican and Central American products. Alex Lee is also the parent company of Lowes Foods, which includes 82 full-service grocery stores in North Carolina, South Carolina and Georgia. In addition, Alex Lee, Inc. is the parent...

title: HICKORY'S OKTOBERFEST RETURNS
creator: BILLY CHAPMAN wchapman@hickoryrecord.com
content: Oktoberfest will return to downtown Hickory Oct. 11 through 13. Oktoberfest is a large fall event for downtown Hickory. This year's event is the 37th Oktoberfest. Hickory Downtown Development Association Director Amy Fauquet said 29 of 35 food vendors from last year are returning. Vendors will off er foods such as bratwursts, strudel and German potato salad as well as pizza, hot dogs and barbecue. Fauquet said more than 130 craft and commercial vendors will participate in Oktoberfest. Fauquet also said the footprint of the festival will be the same as last year. Kidsfest, food and beer sales areas will remain in the same locations as last year. "This is the first year in four years the footprint is staying the same," Fauquet said. Growing up near downtown, Fauquet has enjoyed Oktoberfest since she was a child. She remembers working as a high schooler at The Old Heidelberg Restaurant stand during Oktoberfest. She is participating in at least her 20th Oktoberfest and fifth as executive director of the downtown development association. "I'm personally excited (for this year's event) because Sol Driven Train is coming back," Fauquet said. "They were here, probably, 10 years ago. I'm excited to see Sol Driven Train, I'm excited to see the Tan and Sober Gentlemen. I think the entertainment lineup looks great in general. "I enjoy seeing the vendors I've known for years, especially the food vendors that keep coming back," Fauquet continued. "There's some that have come for 30-plus...

title: Man charged in fatal shooting
creator: CHRISSY MURPHYcmurphy@morganton.com
content: A man was charged with murder Monday night after a shooting at a Connelly Springs home. Teddy Rathbone, 34, was charged after Joel Lynn McNabb, 69, was shot and killed at his home on Mountain View Boulevard off Laurel Haven Avenue in Connelly Springs, said Burke County Sheriff Banks Hinceman. Hinceman said the shooting happened just before lunchtime Monday. A child was present at the time of the shooting, he said. Rathbone fled the scene but was arrested by McDowell County deputies on Monday afternoon. Jamie Hoyle, one of McNabb's neighbors, said McNabb was a Godly man who would give you the shirt off his back. "He was better than gold," Hoyle said. As he was walked out of the sheriff's office Monday night just before 10 p.m., Rathbone said he was sorry for his actions and told a woman he loves her. "I never meant to do that," Rathbone said. He said things "got out of hand." "I regret what I did," Rathbone said. "I ruined not only my life, my kids' life." Rathbone was held without bond at the Burke County Jail. The McDowell County Sheriff's Office, North Carolina Department of Public Safety, Burke County EMS and Salem Fire Rescue responded along with the Burke County Sheriff's Office. Rathbone is innocent until proven guilty in a court of law. Chrissy Murphy is a staff writer and can be reached at cmurphy@morganton.com or at 828-432-8941. Get local news delivered to your inbox!

title: Republican Party will survive if Trump loses this election
content: If Donald Trump loses the presidential election, to hear him and his campaign tell it, the fate of the Republican Party should be the least of our concerns: his defeat would spell the end of the nation itself and all that we hold dear. But let's assume that Trump and company are exaggerating, and that the country continues to exist. What would the GOP look like after he loses — again? This scenario seems to be getting a lot of attention lately, perhaps because Trump has been emphasizing that if he loses — again — it will be because of fraud — again. Such rhetoric does not exude confidence in his prospects. Some observers seem to think the GOP might not survive a Trump defeat. Under the headline "Potential Trump loss threatens destruction of modern GOP," Axios predicted the party would be plagued by an "identity crisis," a "brutal power struggle" and "years in the wilderness." Why? Because "Never before has a party's identity been so deeply entwined with the fate, fortunes and fl aws of one man." Color me skeptical. Oh, I agree with the power struggle part. But we're already almost a full decade into the Republican identity crisis. And as for years in the wilderness — maybe. But America's major parties don't tend to spend that much time in the wilderness because of the way our system works. If Kamala Harris turns out to be an unpopular president — which is hardly inconceivable given that she has been an unpopular vice president — voting her out would, almost by definition,...

title: A Medicare election bribe for older voters
content: ANOTHER VIEW | WALL STREET JOURNAL 'Tis the season for election handouts. The Biden administration recently announced lower Medicare prescription drug premiums, which will naturally be paid for by taxpayers. The political irony is that Biden officials are increasing subsidies to insurers they otherwise vilify to mitigate pre-election harm from the Infl ation Reduction Act. The Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) touted in a press release that average Part D premiums will decline by about $90 next year while benefits will improve "thanks to the Infl ation Reduction Act and other new enhancements." P.S.: Seniors can show their gratitude by voting for Democrats. Recall how Democrats sought to reduce Medicare drug spending by capping patient out-ofpocket costs at $2,000 annually and shifting more of the entitlement's cost to insurers. CMS also sweetened benefits with regulatory tweaks. But Democrats failed to appreciate that there's no such thing as a free entitlement expansion. Insurers projected that Part D premiums would balloon next year, when the $2,000 cap and other freebies kick in. Providing basic Part D benefits next year is estimated to cost $179.45 a month on average, up from $64.28 this year and $34.71 in 2023, according to CMS. CMS uses a complicated formula to subsidize premiums, but healthcare analysts projected that premiums would rise by hundreds of dollars. Some insurers warned they might exit the market to avoid losing money. Seniors are notified...

title: 'Just came to learn, an era has ended': Amitabh Bachchan pays tribute to Ratan Tata after early morning trolls
content: Bollywood icon Amitabh Bachchan has finally expressed his condolences following the passing of renowned industrialist Ratan Tata, describing the event as "the end of an era." In a heartfelt message shared on the social media platform X, Bachchan reflected on Tata's legacy, stating, "T 5159(i) - just came to learn of the passing of Shri Ratan Tata... An era has ended. A most respected, humble yet visionary leader of immense foresight and resolve. Spent some wonderful moments with him during several campaigns we were involved in together. My prayers." The news of Ratan Tata's death has prompted an outpouring of grief from various public figures, including the President, Prime Minister, and numerous Bollywood stars, all of whom have taken to social media to share their tributes. However, Bachchan's subsequent post on Instagram, which featured a photo of him dancing, drew criticism from fans and followers. In the Instagram post, Bachchan appeared stylish and carefree, captioning the image with "Time to take off..." This post was met with backlash, as many users felt it was inappropriate to share such content in the wake of Tata's passing. Comments flooded in, with one user stating, "The whole internet is in shock due to the death of Ratan Tata Sir... You should not post anything like this, Sir." Another remarked, "I thought you would post for Sir Ratan Tata." A third user criticized the timing of the post, saying, "What a distasteful post, Big B. The whole country of India and...

title: Maiden man dies in crash
creator: SARAH C. JOHNSONsjohnson@hickoryrecord.com
content: A Maiden man died in a crash along U.S. Highway 321 Business south of Newton on Monday. Jimmie Earl Yancey, 83, died at the scene, N.C. State Highway Patrol Trooper Christopher Casey said in a news release. Shortly before 9 a.m., the N.C. State Highway Patrol investigated a fatal collision in Catawba County on U.S. 321 Business near Smyre Farm Road. A 2018 Nissan Rogue traveling south on U.S. 321 Business drove off the right side of the road and collided with a tree, Casey said. Yancey was the driver of the Nissan Rogue, Casey said. The road was closed in the area for approximately two hours, Casey said. Sarah Johnson is the courts and breaking news reporter for the hickory daily record. Get local news delivered to your inbox!

title: Betty Kistler
content: Mrs. Betty Jean Kerley Kistler, 94, of Granite Falls, passed from her earthly home into the loving arms of her Lord and Savior, Jesus Christ on Saturday, October 5, 2024, at Frye Regional Medical Center following a short period of declining health. Mrs. Kistler, was born January 27, 1930, in Caldwell County to the late Fennie Marce Kerley and Mattie Mae Starnes Kerley. She was an active member of Grace Chapel Global Methodist Church, serving faithfully in the women's ministries of the Women of Grace, the United Methodist Women, and the Women's Society of Christian Service going back to 1968. In 2019, she was awarded the Laity Service Award of the Year for the Appalachian District UMC/Grace Chapel United Methodist Church. Always showing up for Sunday School, she served as Sunday School Superintendent for several terms and also served in other church leadership areas. Previously she sang in the choir and participated in Epiphany Prison Ministry, a youth prison ministry, at Foothills Correctional Institution of Burke County. The boys in the prison were quick to call her "Granny" shortly after meeting her. She would say about her "Stars", as she called her boys, "They just need to be loved!" She served on the team and sponsored many pilgrims in the spiritual leadership retreat, Walk to Emmaus and behind the scene, she supported the Kairos and Forgiven prison ministries because her children were involved in serving in these ministries. Betty Jean was a beloved wife, mom, nanny,...

title: Eric Church to donate royalties of new song
creator: LISA O'DONNELL WinstonSalem Journal
content: Country star Eric Church said Thursday that he is giving away the publishing rights to a new song to help with relief efforts in North Carolina. A native of Granite Falls in Caldwell County, Church said in a social media post that he felt helpless after seeing the widespread devastation in the North Carolina mountains. "I spend half my year in the mountains of North Carolina. It's a refuge for me," Church said in a post on Instagram. "It's a place where I've always said my soul is at rest." Church has organized some supply efforts but wanted to do more. "I was in the studio, working on a project for next year, and I had a song that I had just finished that just fit the moment, it fit right now," he said. The song, "Darkest Hour," features Church singing in falsetto, with strings, horns and gospel-like backing vocals. It was released on streaming platforms on Friday. Church is a graduate of Appalachian State University. Another North Carolina country star with ties to App State, Luke Combs, said on social media that he has "something really special lined up to help the Carolinas as much as we can." He said details would be coming soon. Get local news delivered to your inbox!

title: 5 things to do in Hickory
creator: MIYA BANKS mbanks@hickoryrecord.com
content: Celebrate Oktoberfest in downtown Hickory Head over to Union Square for Hickory's Oktoberfest on Friday, Saturday or Sunday. Oktoberfest will feature live music, beer tents, food vendors, craft vendors and Kidsfest. On Friday, the event will run from 5-11 p.m. On Saturday, the event runs from 10 a.m. to 11 p.m. On Sunday, the event runs from noon to 5 p.m. The address is Union Square NW, Hickory. See Diamonds and Whiskey at Hickory Premier Also on Friday night, Diamonds and Whiskey will be performing at the Hickory Premier venue. Tickets cost $10 in advance and $15 at the door. A four-pack of general admission tickets can be purchased for $35 online. Tickets can be purchased online by visiting www.hickorypremier.com and scrolling down to the Diamonds and Whiskey event. Doors open at 7 p.m. and the show begins at 8 p.m. The Premier is at 109 11th St. NW, Hickory. Enjoy a spooky story time with kids at Barnes & Noble Head over to Barnes & Noble on Saturday afternoon for a reading of "Trick or Treat on Spooky Street" by Lance Bass in the children's department. The event begins at 2 p.m. After the reading, kids can enjoy more spooky events in the children's department. Barnes & Noble is at the Gateway Plaza Shopping Center at 2405 U.S. Hwy. 70 SE, Hickory. Participate in a yoga session at City Walk Brewing On Sunday, City Walk Brewing & Distilling will host a yoga class at 10:30 a.m. For $15, participants get a workout and either a beer or glass of wine. Participants should...

title: Hurricane Milton offers a catastrophic reminder
content: Less than two weeks ago, Hurricane Helene rav-aged southern Appalachia with unprecedented fl oods and claimed hundreds of lives. Now Hurricane Milton has targeted the west coast of Florida, which is still cleaning up from Helene's glancing blow. And less than a month from now, voters will choose between Democrats who accept the reality of climate change and Republicans who do not. These are not the "normal" hurricanes of the past. Hurricanes are not supposed to retain catastrophic power as they race far inland from the Gulf of Mexico, dumping a Noah's fl ood of rainfall all the way to Tennessee, the way Helene did. Hurricanes are not supposed to grow from newly formed tropical storm to Category 5 monster in less than two days, the way Milton did — intensification so lightning-fast that it stunned experts. "I can't even find the right adjective," University of Pennsylvania climate scientist Michael Mann said Monday about Milton. And Mann — author of the famous "hockey stick" graph showing the human-induced rise in global temperatures — pointed me to a Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory study reporting that rainfall from Helene was boosted 50% by climate change. Understanding why hurricanes now behave diff erently is a matter of "basic physics," Mann said. Warmer temperatures provide more energy and moisture to serve as fuel for hurricanes, making them bigger and wetter. It's not that there are more hurricanes. Rather, the ones that do form tend to be stronger and release...

title: Medical center names chief medical officer
creator: FROM STAFF REPORTS
content: Frye Regional Medical Center recently welcomed Dr. Michael Cratty, M.D., Ph.D., SFHM, FACP, as chief medical officer of Frye Regional Medical Center. Cratty comes into Frye Regional Medical Center with 20 years of clinical experience and administrative experience, including eight years of experience as a CMO. "I am very pleased to welcome Dr. Cratty as our new chief medical officer," Dr. Philip Greene, MD, chief executive officer of Frye Regional Medical Center, said. "He brings valuable experience and expertise to Frye Regional Medical Center and will be a great asset to our organization." "I look forward to collaborating with senior leadership, physicians, and team members as we continue to strive for exceptional patient care, both in quality and compassion," Cratty said. "Frye Regional's commitment to serving the health care needs of their community is admirable and I am honored to join the continued effort of making our communities healthier." In addition to previous CMO experience, Cratty has served as a director of hospitalist services and hospital care management, medical director, associate director, and an assistant professor of medicine at Drexel University College of Medicine. Most recently, he served as CMO in the Heritage Valley Health System. Cratty completed his residency in internal medicine/pediatrics at Pennsylvania State University College of Medicine in Hershey, Pennsylvania. He completed his doctorates at West Virginia University School of Medicine in...

title: Lindy Hudson
content: Mr. Harry Lindy Hudson, Sr., 93, of Connelly Springs, passed away on Monday, October 7, 2024, at his residence after a period of declining health. Mr. Hudson was born November 23, 1930, in Burke County, a son of the late J.E. and Cesarine Ribet Hudson. He was the owner and operator of Lindy's Furniture in Connelly Springs and Hickory, working and interacting with his friends and customers, even past his 92nd birthday. Lindy was a faithful member of the Waldensian Presbyterian Church having served as a deacon and on numerous committees. He served his country as a member of the US Army and was a 50 year member of the Lovelady Masonic Lodge 670, Valdese, NC. In addition to his parents, he was preceded in death by a brother, Ed Hudson, Jr. and wife, Betty. Those left to cherish his memory are his wife, Imogene Pons of the home, a son, H. Lindy Hudson (Lisa) of Valdese, three daughters, Katie Purgason (Bobby) of Taylorsville, Cessy Smith (Phillip) of Cornelius, and Julie Hudson of Cornelius. Also surviving are the apples of his eye, his grandchildren, Lexi Purgason, Hudson Smith, Ashtyn Smith. Graveside Services for Harry Lindy Hudson, Sr. will be at 2 p.m., Saturday, October 12, 2024, in the Waldensian Presbyterian Church Cemetery with Rev. Matt Mathews and Rev. Rachel Matthews officiating. Masonic Rites by Lovelady Lodge 670 will follow. Memorials may be made to Amorem, Burke Hospice and Palliative Care, 1721 Enon Rd. Valdese, NC 28690 or the Waldensian Presbyterian Church, 109...

title: Hickory's Dillingham impresses in T'wolves preseason opener
creator: JASON KOON jason.koon@lee.net
content: Rob Dillingham scored 21 points and handed out four assists in the Minnesota Timberwolves preseason opener on Oct. 4 to lead the team to a 127-104 win over the Los Angeles Lakers. Dillingham grew up in the Mountain View area and played for the Hickory Rec and Jacob's Fork Middle School before moving on to Lincolnton's Combine Academy and then Donda Academy and Overtime Elite for his high school basketball. He declared for the 2024 NBA draft after one year at Kentucky and was taken by San Antonio with the No. 8 overall pick. He was traded to Minnesota on draft night. Minnesota is expected to rely heavily on a group of young players coming off the bench this season, including Dillingham. This has become even more apparent after the organization traded veteran Karl-Anthony Towns to the Knicks last week. Those young players — Dillingham, Terence Shannon Jr., Luka Garza and Josh Minott — accounted for 77 of the T-wolves 127 points on Friday. They are all 25 years of age or younger. Dillingham is just 19. Dillingham came off the bench to play 25 minutes. He shot 9-of-20 from the field, including 3-of-6 from beyond the arc. The performance went a long way towards answering some questions about the T-wolves young star after he faced some criticism for poor shooting in his summer league games in July. Dillingham and the T-Wolves also held Los Angeles rookie guard Bronny James to just two points on 1-of-6 shooting in his NBA preseason debut. Jason Koon is the Sports Editor for the...

title: Harrison Blount Weathers
content: Harrison Blount Weathers, 55, of Roswell, GA, died peacefully in his sleep on Wednesday, October 2, 2024, from congenital heart failure following a long illness. Born May 21, 1969, in Hickory, NC, to Barbara Cantrell Weathers and Carroll Wayland Weathers, Jr., Harrison grew up in Hickory and graduated from Hickory High School in 1988. After high school, Harrison studied business at NC State University before transferring to Appalachian State University, where he graduated with a B.S. in History with a Minor in Political Science in 1994. Harrison spent his entire professional career in the furniture industry, where he served in sales positions with Bassett Furniture industries, Magnussen Furniture and spent more than thirteen years with Alabama-based Harden Manufacturing. Blessed with natural athleticism, Harrison grew up on the playing fields of Hickory's recreation leagues in baseball, football, and basketball, as well as the corresponding organized team opportunities his elementary, middle, and high schools provided. Once named, "The Home Run King" by the Hickory Daily Record's Sports Editor after yet another effortless night at bat while playing for Hickory High, Harrison took the praise in stride, barely noticing the accolades that came so frequently to him. In addition to his love of team sports, Harrison was just as often found swimming or water skiing on Lake Hickory, or playing a round of golf at Lake Hickory Country Club. It was more the norm, rather than the...

title: David Starnes
content: David Ross Starnes, 84, of Hickory, passed away on Sunday, October 6, 2024, at his residence. Born August 3, 1940, in Catawba County, he was the son of the late Keener Vance Starnes and Delia Miller Starnes. He was also preceded in death by this brothers, Donald Starnes, Ted Starnes, Floyd Starnes, and Keener Vance Starnes, Jr; sisters, Lovenia Guthrie, Mildred Tolbert, and Patsy Hendricks. A member of St. Peter's Lutheran Church, David was an upholsterer in the furniture industry and also a plant manager prior to his retirement. David is survived by his wife, Carolyn Smith Starnes; son, David Eric Starnes; and sister, Linda Brown. Funeral services will be held at St. Peter's Lutheran Church in Conover, at 2 p.m., on Thursday, October 10, 2024, with the Pastor Peter Frank officiating. The family will receive friends from 1 to 1:45 p.m. prior to the service. Burial will follow in the church cemetery. Condolences may be sent to the Starnes family at www.drumfh-hickory.com . Drum Funeral Home in Hickory is honored to be serving the Starnes family. DRUM FUNERAL HOME 940 29th Avenue, NC Hickory, NC 28601 Get local news delivered to your inbox!

title: Wararkii ugu dambeeyay dagaal dhex-maray ciidanka SSC iyo kuwa Somaliland
creator: Jamaal Maxamed
content: Buuhoodle (Caasimada Online) – Warar kala duwan ayaa kasoo baxaya khasaaraha ka dhashay dagaal xalay ciidamada Soamliland iyo kuwa SSC-Khaatumo ku dhex-maray duleedka magaalada Buuhoodle ee gobolka Togdheer. Dagaalka ayaa yimid kadib markii ciidamada milatariga Somaliland ay isku dayeen inay gudaha u galaan deegaanka Qorilugud oo hoostaga Buuhoodle, balse waxaa ka hortegay ciidamada SSC oo halkaas difaac adag uga jiray. Wararka ayaa intaasi kusii daraya inuu jiro khasaare kala duwan oo isugu jiro dhimasho iyo dhaawac soo kala gaaray, waxaana haatan xaaladdu ay tahay mid deggan. SSC oo ka hadashay dagaalkan waxa ay sheegtay inay ka hortegtay weerar uga yimid dhanka Somaliland, isla markaana ay haysat xogtiisa, sidaasina ay ku fashilisay. Dhanka kale ma jiro illaa iyo hadda wax hadal ah oo kasoo baxay Somaliland, kuna daadan dagaalkaas iyo eedeynta ay u jeedisay SSC-Khaatumo. Maalmihii lasoo dhaadafay Somaliland iyo SSC-Khaatumo ayaa dhaq-dhaqaaqyo iska soo horjeedo ka waday aagga magaalada Buuhoodle oo ah halka uu xalay ka dhacay dagaalka. Si kastaba, dagaalka u dhexeeya SSC iyo Somaliland ayaa in muddo ah hakad ku jiray, balse labada dhinac ayaa hadallo kul-kulul isku marinaya dhanka warbaahinta.

title: "애민 정신 기리자" 밀양시 예림서원·표충사 추계 제향 봉행
creator: 안지율 기자
content: [밀양=뉴시스] 안지율 기자 = 경남 밀양시는 10일 부북면 예림서원과 단장면 표충사에서 점필재 김종직 선생과 사명대사 등 선현들을 기리는 추계 제향을 거행했다. 예림서원 추계향사는 매년 음력 9월 상정일에 추대된 헌관이 예림서원 육덕사에 봉안된 점필재 김종직, 오졸제 박한주, 송계 신계성 선생을 유교의 예로 제향하는 행사다. 이날 안병구 시장이 초헌관, 손병돈 밀성손씨 종손이 아헌관, 김국명 광주김씨 대사파종회장이 종헌관으로 참여했다. 또 단장면 표충사에서는 임진왜란 당시 큰 공을 세운 서산, 사명, 기허대사를 기리는 추계향사가 진행됐다. 표충사 추계향사는 1744년 왕명에 의해 시작된 국가 제향으로 이날은 200여 명이 참석한 가운데 불교 의례와 유교 제향이 함께 진행됐다. 성균관유도회 밀양시지부 주관으로 진행된 유교 제향에는 밀양시의회 허홍 의장이 초헌관, 성균관유도회 정주식 상남지회장이 아헌관, 손영혁 경찰서장이 종헌관으로 참여했다. 시 관계자는 "이번 행사를 통해 김종직 선생과 선현들의 정신을 되새기는 시간이었다"며 "예림서원 인근에 선비문화체험관이 완공되면 청소년들이 도덕과 정신적 가치를 배울 수 있도록 할 계획"이라고 밝혔다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: जब तक मर नहीं गई तब तक पति ने दबाया पत्नी की गला, बोला- फोन हर दम बिजी आता था
creator: Zee News Hindi
content: Crime News: राजस्थान के सीकर जिले में 5 दिन पहले एक महिला की संदिग्ध परिस्थितियों में मौत हो गई थी. वहीं, जब पुलिस ने मामले का खुलासा किया तो इसमें सबसे पहले महिला के पति को ही गिरफ्तार किया. Sikar News: जिससे आप प्यार करते हैं, उसे एक खरोंच तक आ जाए तो प्रेमी का दिल तक रो पड़ता है. वहीं, बात जब पति-पत्नी के प्यार की आती है तो दोनों सात जन्मों तक एक-दूजे का साथ निभाने का वादा करते हैं लेकिन राजस्थान के सीकर जिले से दिल को दहला देने वाली खबर सामने आई है, जिसमें पति की करतूत सुनकर आपके होश उड़ जाएंगे. दरअसल, राजस्थान के सीकर जिले में 5 दिन पहले एक महिला की संदिग्ध परिस्थितियों में मौत हो गई थी. वहीं, जब पुलिस ने मामले का खुलासा किया तो इसमें सबसे पहले महिला के पति को ही गिरफ्तार किया. जानकारी के अनुसार, लगबग 5 दिन पहले खंडेला इलाके के भदवाड़ी गांव में मनीषा वर्मा नाम की महिला का शव बरामद हुआ था. इस मामले में महिला के परिवार वालों ने मृतका के पति राकेश के साथ-साथ सात अन्य लोगों पर भी केस दर्ज करवाया. पुलिस ने जब छानबीन शुरू की तो पुलिस को कुछ खास क्लू मिले. इसके बाद पुलिस ने मृतका के पति राकेश को राउंडअप किया और उससे पूछताछ की. सख्ती से पूछताछ करने पर उसने खुद ही पत्नी का गला घोंटकर हत्या करना स्वीकार कर लिया. बीवी को क्यों उतारा मौत के घाट पुलिस छानबीन में मृतका के पति ने बताया कि उसे पत्नी पर शक था कि शादी के बाद ही उसका किसी से अफेयर चल रहा है. यही कारण रहा कि उसने पत्नी की हत्या कर दी. उसने पुलिस को बताया कि जब भी वह घर से बाहर जाता तो उसकी पत्नी का फोन हमेशा बिजी आता था. किसी से करती थी बातचीत इतना ही नहीं, मृतका के पति ने यह भी बताया कि उसके घर पर होने के बाद भी वह अक्सर...

title: 中國財政部記者會將登場 分析指不應預期過高
content: 中國民眾期待能挽救經濟的「財政大招」沒有在8日的發改委 記者會 出現,因此12日登場的財政部記者會受到關注。有分析認為不應預期過高,即使有超預算的財政政策也須經 全國人大 的審批。 國務院新聞辦公室昨天發布消息,財政部長藍佛安12日將介紹「加大財政政策逆周期調節力度、推動經濟高質量發展」有關情況,並答記者問。 有券商認為,這場記者會很大機率將會推出「增量」(即新增)財政政策,但財政政策不像貨幣政策,後者央行說了算,涉及財政預算調整的政策,則必須經過全國人民代表大會常委會會議的審批。 所以這場發布會有幾種可能:一是提前預告相關的謀劃,待人大審批後執行,但具體數額會在審批後公布;二是在權限內推出政策,比如利用尚未使用的地方債限額;三是介紹現有政策的落實情況,並積極表態。 第一財經引述多名專家看法,認為預期不應過高,當前首要是用好現有積極財政政策,加快財政支出進度,並考慮適度增發國債或特別國債,以保障必要財政支出。但增發國債和特別國債取決於經濟狀況和財政需求,按程序要等到10月下旬,看全國人大常委會會議是否有相關部署。 在市場預期財政會加大國債發行規模之時,中國人民銀行(中國央行)昨天宣布和財政部建立聯合工作組並已召開會議,雙方一致認為,央行國債買賣是豐富貨幣政策工具箱、加強流動性管理的重要手段。下一步將會為央行國債買賣操作提供適宜的市場環境。 財達證券副總經理胡恒松認為,在當前經濟形勢下,央行和財政部可能會通過增加國債發行來支持增量政策的實施,如支持地方開展債務置換,化解債務風險,加大對 經濟發展 的積極促進作用等。 華爾街日報報導,許多經濟學家預測,中國財政部最終將推出總額在人民幣1兆到3兆元(下同,約新台幣4.5兆到13.5兆元)的刺激計畫。還有些人認為,刺激計劃的規模可能達到10兆元,相當於中國去年GDP的約8%。 這些資金將用於幫助地方政府解決債務問題並維持運轉;解決房地產「保交樓」問題或收購空置住宅;向家庭提供補貼,並向國有銀行注資等。 當前中國民眾、特別是股民對於政府提振經濟的期待很高,中國發改委8日召開新聞發布會沒有提出新的措施讓投資人失望,並促使股市大跌。有鑒於此,這次財政部的新聞發布會更受到關注,如果其公布的財政措施不能滿足民眾預期,可能導致市場作出負面反應。 不過,按照往例,即使是公布了增發國債等政策,具體數額也會在全國人大常委會會議審批後才公布。

title: Burza wokół Kingi Gajewskiej i Arkadiusza Myrchy. Senator KO: jestem zdumiony
content: Posłowie Kinga Gajewska i Arkadiusz Myrcha, zgodnie z ich własnymi deklaracjami, pobierają łącznie blisko 8 tys. zł miesięcznie z Kancelarii Sejmu na pokrycie kosztów wynajmu mieszkania w Warszawie . Zdaniem wielu osób na opłacenie czynszu wystarczyłaby im jedna zapomoga. Kontrowersje wzbudzają także wydatki małżeństwa wyposażenie biur poselskich. Ponadto do Sejmu wpłynął nowy dokument, w którym posłanka przyznaje się do uzyskania dwóch darowizn, m.in. domu w podwarszawskiej miejscowości Błonie. O sprawie mówił premier Tusk. Schetyna: muszą to przeżyć Jak mówił senator KO, na wyjazdowym posiedzeniu klubu Koalicji Obywatelskiej do sprawy odniósł się premier Donald Tusk. — Była rozmowa o tym i wprost pokazanie tej sytuacji jako ofiar tego, że możemy mniej, że szczególnie teraz wszystko będzie obserwowane i nawet nadinterpretowane. Trudno, muszą to przeżyć i sami o tym mówią — mówił polityk. Sejmowa para na ustach polityków. W koalicji pojawia się krytyka. "Ekstrawagancja" — My musimy tych standardów dotrzymywać, a te przepisy, jeżeli trzeba je doprecyzować, to niech to zrobi Kancelaria Sejmu, żeby w przyszłości nie było takich historii — dodał Schetyna. — Czasami posłowie z Warszawy też dysponują mieszkaniami czy pokojem w hotelu sejmowym. Mieszkają w Warszawie, ale są wybrani skądinąd. To jest jeszcze trudniejsze — stwierdził gość "Onet Rano.".

title: На полигоне «Завеличье» снова проводят учения
content: Псковичам не стоит паниковать из-за звуков выстрелов из технических орудий. Как сообщили "МК в Пскове" в правительстве региона, сегодня на полигоне «Завеличье» Псковского района проводятся практические занятия. Отметим, в учениях задействован личный состав 76-й ДШД. Псковичей и гостей города просят не волноваться, мероприятия плановые.

title: Ratan Tata once called Hindi movies ‘violent’ in old Simi Garewal interview
creator: IANS
content: Home | Entertainment | Ratan Tata Once Called Hindi Movies Violent In Old Simi Garewal Interview Ratan Tata once called Hindi movies ‘violent’ in old Simi Garewal interview In a lengthy interview with Simi Garewal, Ratan Tata discussed his early days, the Tata Group, and his personal life. When Simi asked, "How do you unwind?" Tata replied, "For the past 10-12 years, unwinding has mostly meant taking my dog for a run, getting out, and having a change of scenery." By IANS Published Date - 10 October 2024, 12:20 PM Mumbai: In an old interview with Simi Garewal, Ratan Tata once shared his thoughts about Hindi movies and called them ‘violent’. He added, “I think there is more catchup spread in Hindi movies than there are in all restaurants of Bombay”. Also Read Indian celebrities Akshay Kumar, Priyanka Chopra, Salman Khan mourn Ratan Tata’s loss It was a long interview between Simi Garewal and Ratan Tata, in which Simi asked him about his early days, Tata Group, and questions pertaining to his personal life. Simi asked him, “How do you unwind?” Ratan Tata answered, “Most of the time unwinding for 10-12 years has been taking my dog for a run, getting out, and having a change of place.” Simi continued to ask about his choice of music. To which he replied that he likes all kinds of music including jazz and classical. On being asked if he watches Television, Ratan Tata replied “Quite a bit of late.” Simi also questioned if he watches Hindi movies. Ratan Tata quipped “You can’t help...

title: TRAGEDIJA KOD VISOKOG: Automobilom sletjeli u rijeku Bosnu, jedna osoba se spasila, ima poginulih
content: Jedna osoba povrijeđena je u saobraćajnoj nesreći koja se dogodila u mjestu Dobrinje, na regionalnoj cesti Visoko - Kakanj. Prema informacijama koje je za potvrdila glasnogovornica MUP-a ZDK u nesreći ima i poginulih. U nesreći je učestvovalo jedno vozilo koje je sletjelo u rijeku Bosnu. - Sinoć oko 1:30 sati policija je obavještena da je u mjestu Buzić Mahala nađena jedna osoba sa vidljivim povredama i u teškom komunikativnom stanju, rekla nam je Ahmić. No, naknadno se ispostavilo da je u pitanju slijetanje vozila s ceste u rijeku, te da je sa njim u automobilu bilo još nekoliko osoba. / Viber Iako nam to nije zvanično potvrđeno, povrijeđena osoba je navodno policajcima rekla da su sa njim u automobilu bile još tri osobe. - Odmah je upućena policijska ekipa, na mjestu događaja su uoćini tragovi slijetanja auta, a angažovana je i Specijalna jedinica MUP-a ZDK. U toku je izvlačenje vozila, kazala je Ahmić za Oslobođenje. Ona je, također, potvrdila da u ovoj nesreći ima poginulih osoba, ali zasad nije mogla precizirati koliko je smrtno stradalih.

title: کراچی: گلبرگ میں 3 سالہ بچی کا زیادتی کے بعد قتل، رکشہ ڈرائیور قاتل نکلا، اعتراف جرم کرلیا
content: کراچی(ڈیلی پاکستان آن لائن )گلبرگ میں تین سالہ بچی کی پھندا لگی لاش ملنے کے واقعے میں گرفتار ملزم نے اعتراف جرم کرلیا۔ پولیس کے مطابق واقعے کے بعد گرفتار کئے جانے والے ملزم رکشہ ڈرائیور نصیر نے بچی کو گلے میں پھندا لگاکر قتل کیا جس کا اس نے اعتراف کیا ہے۔ پولیس کے مطابق بچی کو قتل کرنے کے بعد لاش بوری میں ڈال کر گلی میں پھینک دی، گرفتار ملزم کی سی سی ٹی وی تصویر بھی ملی ہے جس میں ملزم کو بچی کو بورے میں لے جاتے ہوئے دیکھا جاسکتا ہے۔ پولیس حکام نے بتایا کہ پوسٹ مارٹم میں بچی سے زیادتی کی تصدیق ہوئی ہے اور ملزم سے مزید تفتیش جاری ہے۔ واضح رہے کہ کراچی کے علاقے گلبرگ سے 9 اکتوبر کی صبح 3 سالہ بچی کی لاش ملی تھی جو گھر سے کچھ فاصلے پر ہی ملی، بچی صبح سکول جانے کے لئے نکلی تھی جسے ملزم نے زیادتی کا نشانہ بناکر قتل کردیا۔

title: Tennis : Richard Gasquet annonce sa fin de carrière après Roland-Garros 2025
creator: La rédaction (20 Minutes)
content: Le tennisman français Richard Gasquet, âgé de 38 ans, prendra sa retraite après le tournoi de Roland-Garros en mai ou juin 2025, annonce-t-il dans une interview publiée dans le journal L’Equipe jeudi. « Je vous annonce que j’arrêterai à Roland-Garros (25 mai - 8 juin 2025) l’an prochain. Je pense que c’est le meilleur moment pour moi de le faire. C’est le meilleur tournoi pour le faire. C’est magnifique, on a de la chance en étant Français de pouvoir arrêter dans ce genre d’endroits incroyables », explique Gasquet. Première victoire à 15 ans « J’aurai presque 39 ans, un âge canonique, je n’aurais jamais imaginé jouer autant en commençant aussi jeune », ajoute le Français qui arrêtera donc après 23 ans de carrière, lui qui était passé professionnel en 2002 à seulement 15 ans. Ce génie de la raquette, à la Une de Tennis Magazine à 9 ans, avait fait sensation en remportant son premier match sur le circuit principal à Monte-Carlo à 15 ans contre l’Argentin Franco Squillari. Avec son revers à une main soyeux, Richard Gasquet a remporté 16 tournois sur le circuit principal, le dernier à Auckland (Nouvelle-Zélande) en janvier 2023. Il avait atteint le 7e rang mondial en 2007. A l’image des trois autres « mousquetaires » du tennis français (Gaël Monfils, toujours joueur, Gilles Simon et Jo-Wilfried Tsonga, retraités), Gasquet n’aura pas réussi à soulever un trophée du Grand Chelem. Il a atteint trois demi-finales en Majeur : à Wimbledon en 2007,...

title: पंजाब यूनिवर्सिटी की वर्ल्ड रैंकिंग में सुधार:​​​​​​​शोध की गुणवत्ता में गिरावट; 601-800 ब्रैकेट में जगह बनाई
content: पंजाब यूनिवर्सिटी (पीयू) ने 2025 टाइम्स हायर एजुकेशन (THE) वर्ल्ड यूनिवर्सिटी रैंकिंग में अपने समग्र स्कोर में सुधार करते हुए 601-800 ब्रैकेट में स्थान हासिल किया है, जो पिछले साल के 801-1,000 ब्रैकेट से बेहतर है। हालांकि, इस साल शोध की गुणवत्ता के स पीयू के कुल स्कोर में सुधार का श्रेय शिक्षण और अनुसंधान वातावरण में बेहतर प्रदर्शन को दिया जा सकता है। शिक्षण श्रेणी में इस बार पीयू ने 35.7 अंक हासिल किए, जबकि पिछले साल 32.6 अंक थे। वहीं, अनुसंधान वातावरण में भी 16.2 से बढ़कर 18 अंक हो गए। उद्योग से जुड़े प्रदर्शन में पीयू ने 39.2 से बढ़कर 41.06 अंक प्राप्त किए, जिससे यह साफ होता है कि विश्वविद्यालय का उद्योग के साथ सहयोग भी बेहतर हुआ है। पंजाब यूनिवर्सिटी में 1% विदेशी छात्र पीयू को अंतर्राष्ट्रीय छात्रों की संख्या में चुनौती का सामना करना पड़ा है, क्योंकि केवल 1% छात्र ही अंतर्राष्ट्रीय हैं। इसके बावजूद, विश्वविद्यालय ने अंतर्राष्ट्रीय दृष्टिकोण श्रेणी में 23.5 से बढ़कर 23.9 स्कोर किया है। पीयू की कुलपति प्रोफेसर रेणु विग ने कहा, "हमें खुशी है कि अधिकतर मापदंडों में हमारे स्कोर में 60% का सुधार हुआ है। शोध प्रकाशन और पेटेंट प्रदान करने में समय लगता है, और हमें उम्मीद है कि अगले साल हमें इसका लाभ मिलेगा।" पीयू ने अपने स्कोर में सुधार के बावजूद, शोध प्रकाशनों की गति और गुणवत्ता में सुधार की आवश्यकता को महसूस किया है। इस साल रैंकिंग में शोध के चयनित पेपरों का प्रकाशन कुछ समय लगने के कारण, स्कोर में गिरावट आई है।

title: گرمی سے ستائے پاکستانیوں کیلئے خوشخبری آ گئی
content: مانسہرہ (ویب ڈیسک) ملک بھر کے بالائی علاقوں میں برفباری کے سلسلے کا آغز ہو گیا ہے جس کے باعث موسم سرد ہونے لگا ہے۔ نجی ٹی وی آج نیوز کے مطابق مانسہرہ میں بابو سر ٹاپ پر برف باری کے بعد سیاح پہنچ گئے ہیں۔ برفباری کا سلسلہ تھمنے کے بعد موسم سرد ہوگیا ہے جبکہ لوگوں نے گرم لباس بھی پہننا شروع کردیا ہے۔ وادی کاغان میں بارش اور مشہور سیاحتی مقام بابو سر ٹاپ پر گزشتہ رات سے صبح تک وقفہ وقفہ سے برفباری کا سلسلہ جاری ہے ہرطرف بکھرے سفید موتیوں نے وادی کاغان کے حسن میں مزید اضافہ کردیا ہے۔ بابو سر ٹاپ میں برفباری کا سنتے ہی برفباری کے شوقین سینکڑوں سیاح بابو سر ٹاپ پہنچ گئے جہاں ٹھنڈے موسم اور ہر طرف بکھری سفید کارپٹ نے سیاحوں کو اپنی جانب کھینچ لیا ہے۔ انتظامیہ کے مطابق شاہراہ کاغان بحال ہے سیاح و مقامی افراد بابو سر ٹاپ کے راستے گلگت تک سفر جاری رکھ سکتے ہیں۔ دیربالا کے بالائی علاقوں وادی جہاز، بانڈہ سیدگئی، جھیل اوراتن درہ کے پہاڑوں پر ہلکی برفباری سے موسم سرد ہونے لگا ہے۔

title: सड़क हादसे में एक व्यक्ति की मौत:लोक कलाकारों का वाहन डिवाइडर से टकराया, 4 लोग घायल, अस्पताल में भर्ती
content: कोटा जिले के चेचट हाईवे पर लोक कलाकारों का वाहन डिवाइडर से टकरा गया। हादसे में एक युवक की मौत हो गई और 4 लोग घायल हो गए। घायलों को इलाज के लिए झालावाड़ जिला अस्पताल में भर्ती कराया गया है। घायलों ने बताया कि वह एमपी के खांचरोद से गरबा प्रोग्राम करने के बाद उदयपुर कार्यक्रम में शामिल होने जा रहे थे। ऐसे में जाते समय ड्राइवर को नींद की झपकी लगने के कारण कार डिवाइडर से टकरा गई। कार सवार सभी लोग देर रात को गरबा के प्रोग्राम के बाद उदयपुर में एक प्रोग्राम में शामिल होने जा रहे थे। मृतक बाबूलाल डीडवाना का निवासी था, जबकि अन्य 4 घायल जोधपुर और नागौर के रहने वाले हैं। घायलों में दो सगे भाई शामिल हैं।

title: В России предложили увеличить штрафы за один вид финансовых преступлений
creator: Вячеслав Агапов
content: Центробанк предложил повысить штрафы за манипулирование на фондовом рынке. О необходимости изменить систему наказаний за этот вид финансовых преступлений заявил заместитель председателя регулятора Филипп Габуния , его цитирует «Интерфакс» . По словам представителя ЦБ, действующая система наказания не отвечает духу времени. В случае нанесения ущерба до 3,75 миллиона рублей физлиц ждет штраф в три тысячи. При преодолении указанной планки наступает сразу уголовная ответственность. «Явно с точки зрения применения — не самые эффективные меры, с одной стороны, где-то очень мягко, с другой, наоборот сразу очень жестко. Я уж молчу о том, что сам уголовный процесс тяжелый для всех сторон», — пояснил Габуния. В связи с этим ЦБ предлагает пересмотреть параметры ответственности и пороги, с которых она наступает. На первый план должна выйти экономическая составляющая: ответственность за разрушение рынка должна быть материальной, а штрафы — кратными нанесенному ущербу. Под манипулированием понимаются такие действия, которые на короткий период существенно искажают стоимость актива, после чего организатор атаки получает прибыль. Недобросовестные участники торгов могут влиять на спрос, предложение и объем торгов за счет распространения недостоверной информации или сговора и совместных действий. О необходимости усилить ответственность за подобные преступления ранее заявляла и глава регулятора Эльвира Набиуллина . Текущий размер штрафов за манипулирование фондовым рынком...

title: Norme Oficiale de ULTIM MOMENT ale Simonei Bucura-Oprescu si Hotararile de Guvern Adoptate
creator: Redactia iDevice.ro
content: a dezvaluie in mod oficial faptul ca Guvernul Romaniei a adoptat o noua Hotarare cu o importanta masura menita sa ofere sprijin parintilor care au suferit pierderea unui copil in timpul sarcinii, la nastere sau pana la varsta de 18 ani. spune ca acestia vor primi gratuit 10 sedinte de consiliere psihologica, ce trebuie efectuate in termen de sase luni de la data decesului copilului, indiferent daca sunt sau nu asigurati in sistemul de asigurari sociale de sanatate. “Orice persoana care trece printr-o asemenea trauma are nevoie de sprijin specializat si este important sa stie si sa simta ca nu este singura”, a declarat ministrul Muncii si Solidaritatii Sociale, Simona Bucura-Oprescu. Simona Bucura-Oprescu confirma ca masura vine in urma aprobarii normelor metodologice de aplicare a prevederilor Legii nr. 186/2024, care instituie ziua de 15 octombrie ca Ziua nationala de comemorare a copiilor decedati, cunoscuta si ca “Ziua Parintilor de Ingeri”. Aceste norme stabilesc modalitatea de decontare a sedintelor de consiliere psihologica. Pentru a beneficia de sedintele de consiliere, parintii trebuie sa obtina o recomandare de la medicul de familie si sa prezinte raportul de evaluare intocmit de psiholog la prima sedinta. Atat mama, cat si tatal pot participa la sedinte, fie individual, fie impreuna. Simona Bucura-Oprescu subliniaza ca decontarea sedintelor se va realiza la solicitarea psihologilor, prin intermediul agentiei teritoriale pentru plati si inspectie sociala, in termen...

title: Qëndroi i pajetë 5 orë në pishinë, detaje nga vdekja e futbollistit të Kombëtares greke! Bashkëshortja tentoi të kontaktonte, por... Si u zbulua ngjarja tragjike
content: Zi në futbollin grek për ndarjen e parakohshme nga jeta të 31-vjeçarit George Baldock, i cili u gjet i vdekur mbrëmjen e së mërkurës në pishinën e shtëpisë së tij në Glyfada. Ende nuk dihet shkaqet e vdekjes së futbollistit, ndërsa mësohet se prej disa orësh familjarët kishin humbur kontaktin me të. Gruaja 31-vjeçarit, e cila ishte në Angli së bashku me vajzën e tyre, po përpiqej të kontaktonte me lojtarin grek, por s’kishte arritur. Ajo telefonoi pronarin e shtëpisë që Baldock kishte marrë me qira, në mënyrë që ai të mund të shkonte dhe zbulonte se çfarë po ndodhte. Pronari shkoi në banesë dhe gjeti futbollistin 31-vjeçar të vdekur në pishinën e tij. Sipas informacioneve të protothema.gr, Baldock kishte të paktën 5 orë që qëndronte i vdekur në pishinë, ndërsa më shumë të dhëna që pritet të dalin pas autopsisë. Policia ka sekuestruar kamerat e sigurisë, ndërsa janë marrë edhe gjurmët e gishtërinjve në shtëpinë ku humbi jetën 31-vjeçari. Në trupin e tij raportohet se nuk ka shenja dhune. Në vendngjarje, pas zbulimit të lajmin tragjik, kanë mbërritur menjëherë drejtori teknik i Panathinaikos, Yiannis Papadimitriou, si dhe Giorgos Tzavellas, drejtori i departamentit të futbollit të klubit dhe ish-shoku i tij i skuadrës në Kombëtaren Greke. Shumë lojtarë të skuadrës, si Zeka, Senkefeld, Magnusson, Vilena dhe Perez, qëndronin të pikëlluar jashtë shtëpisë.

title: أول تعليق من إنجي علي على «فيديو خالد سليم»
creator: العين الإخبارية
content: بعد أكثر من شهر من انتشار شائعة زواجهما، ردّت الفنانة والإعلامية المصرية إنجي علي، على ظهورها في مقطع فيديو بجوار الفنان خالد سليم في الساحل الشمالي. وعبّرت إنجي عن استيائها من بعض التعليقات التي تلقتها بعد نشر فيديو لها مع الفنان خالد سليم، حيث ادعى البعض وجود علاقة بينهما، مؤكدة أن علاقتهما هي مجرد صداقة طويلة الأمد. وعلّقت قائلة: "لا أبالغ إذا قلت أنني شعرت بالدهشة من تعليقات الجمهور على فيديوهاتي مع خالد سليم. الناس كبّرت الموضوع، وخالد صديق قديم جدًا منذ بداية مشوارنا الفني، وزوجته صديقتي أيضًا". ومؤخرًا، وجهت الإعلامية إنجي علي رسالة خاصة للنساء، تحثهن فيها على تجاوز الأزمات التي يمررن بها، وذلك خلال مشاركتها في إحدى الفعاليات الخاصة بالمرأة. وفي تصريحاتها الإعلامية، قالت: "رسالتي للمرأة أن تحب نفسها، وأن تكون دائمًا قوية وتهتم بنفسها، ولا تنسى أنها دائمًا جميلة". aXA6IDE1OS42NS4xNzYuMTQ2IA== جزيرة ام اند امز US

title: Kahvaltıya 10 dakikada hazırlayabileceğiniz enfes lezzet: Pizza tadında gözleme krep tarifi
content: Pizza tadında gözleme krep tarifi, klasik pizzadan ilham alınarak hazırlandığı için özellikle pizza severlerin damak tadına hitap edecektir. Üstelik krep hamuru sayesinde hem hafif hem de pratik bir şekilde hazırlanabilir. Peki, kahvaltıya 10 dakikada hazırlayabileceğiniz bu enfes lezzet nasıl yapılır? İşte, pizza tadında gözleme krep tarifi... PİZZA TADINDA GÖZLEME KREP TARİFİ Malzemeler: 2 su bardağı un 2 adet yumurta 2 su bardağı süt 1 yemek kaşığı zeytinyağı 1 çay kaşığı tuz 1 çay kaşığı kabartma tozu 1 yemek kaşığı yoğurt (isteğe bağlı) İç harcı için: Rendelenmiş kaşar peyniri Dilimlenmiş sucuk, salam ya da sosis Dilimlenmiş zeytin (yeşil veya siyah) İnce doğranmış domates ve biber Mantar (isteğe bağlı) Kekik, pul biber, karabiber gibi baharatlar Pizza sosu (domates salçası, zeytinyağı, sarımsak) PİZZA TADINDA GÖZLEME KREP YAPILIŞI Bir karıştırma kabında yumurtaları çırpın. Süt, un, tuz, kabartma tozu ve yoğurdu ekleyip pürüzsüz bir hamur elde edene kadar çırpmaya devam edin. Hamurun kıvamı boza kıvamında olmalı. Kıvamı çok yoğun olursa, biraz daha süt ekleyebilirsiniz. Karışıma zeytinyağını da ekleyip tekrar karıştırın ve yaklaşık 10-15 dakika dinlenmeye bırakın. title: Las motorizaciones
content: Copiar enlace WhatsApp Facebook X (antes Twitter) LinkedIn Telegram Threads El CUPRA Terramar está disponible con tres tecnologías diferentes de propulsión: TSI de gasolina, eTSI de hibridación ligera y la nueva generación de tecnología híbrida enchufable, con potencias de desde 150 a 272 CV. Todos los motores incorporan la caja de cambios automática DSG de doble embrague. Los motores híbridos enchufables de nueva generación ofrecen etiqueta CERO emisiones, hasta 272 CV, más de 100 km de autonomía totalmente eléctrica y son compatibles con cargadores rápidos de alta potencia. El acceso a la gama es un motor eTSI que combina la eficiencia de la tecnología de hibridación ligera de 48V con el propulsor de gasolina 1.5 TSI de 150 caballos de potencia. La tecnología híbrida está compuesta por un generador y una batería de iones de litio de 48V. El sistema logra una elevada eficiencia gracias, en parte, a que permite que el Terramar avance con el motor de combustión apagado en algunos escenarios. También hace que sea posible recuperar energía en las frenadas y aporta cierta asistencia eléctrica al motor térmico. En cuanto a la gama de gasolina TSI, está formada por dos motores de 2.0 litros. El primero, con una potencia de 204 CV cuenta con el sistema de tracción total 4Drive. El segundo, disponible para la versión VZ, destaca por su potencia; con 265 CV y se asocia también a la tracción integral 4Drive, lo que le confiere un gran rendimiento. Esste...

title: Women's National Chess: Padmini beats Sarayu to take sole lead
content: Defending champion IM Padmini Rout of Petroleum Sports Promotion Board (PSPB) shot into sole lead with 6.5 points at the end of the seventh round of the 50th National Chess Championship for Women being held at Managiri, near Karaikudi town in Tamil Nadu. On Wednesday, Padmini defeated fellow overnight leader Velpula Sarayu (5.5 points) of Telangana in the seventh round as she maintained her chances of going all the way to the title. She is being followed in joint second position by four Tamil Nadu players — PV Nandhidhaa, Rakshitta Ravi, J Saranya and K Priyanka — all of whom moved to six points by winning their respective games. Advertisement In the top board clash on Wednesday, Padmini Rout opted for Alapin Variation against Velpula Sarayu’s Sicilian Defense. An error in the opening by Sarayu allowed Padmini to sacrifice a pawn on the 7th move and gain a decisive advantage. Padmini invaded the black’s king side and finished with a rook sacrifice. The game ended in 31 moves with Padmini taking full points with white pieces. Following in close pursuit are Nandhidhaa, Rakshitta Ravi, Priyanka and Saranya, who all defeated their opponents on the second, third and fourth boards. Nandhidhaa, the former Asian Continental Champion, opted for an Advanced Variation of Caro Kann defense against Chitlange Sakshi of Maharashtra. Though both went for the opponent’s king, Nandhidhaa was threatening mate with her Queen and knight. The game ended in 48 moves when Sakshi missed a backrank...

title: Após dúvidas devido ao furacão Milton, Argentina já está na Venezuela
content: Alerta na Florida pôs em risco a viagem da ‘albiceleste’, que estagiou em Miami, mas os campeões do Mundo já se encontram em Maturín A seleção da Argentina já está na Venezuela, depois de a viagem ter estado em risco devido ao furacão Milton, que acabou, nas últimas horas, por atingir o litoral do sudeste dos Estados Unidos, provocando algumas mortes e deixando mais de 1,5 milhões de casas e empresas sem eletricidade. 10 outubro 2024, 07:26 Furacão Milton provoca mortes e deixa mais de 1,5 milhões de casas e edifícios sem eletricidade nos EUA «Perdemos algumas vidas», afirmou o xerife da área de St. Lucie, Keith Pearson, sobre o impacto dos tornados em Fort Pierce, na costa atlântica da Florida, à televisão 'WPBF News' A albiceleste , de Messi e Otamendi, preparou o encontro frente à Venezuela, a contar para as eliminatórias de qualificação do Mundial 2026, em Miami. O alerta na Florida pôs em dúvida a viagem para a Venezuela e especulou-se acerca da possibilidade de o encontro ser adiado. 9 outubro 2024, 16:24 Vídeo: Furacão Milton gera tornado a norte de Miami, Argentina em alerta Seleção ‘apanhada’ no caminho do furacão que se dirige para a Florida Contudo, os campeões do Mundo já estão em Maturín.
