title: CreditAccess Grameen assets under management up 12% in September quarter
content: CreditAccess Grameen on Thursday, October 10, reported a 12% growth in assets under management (AUM) at ₹25,133 crore in the September quarter compared to the previous year's ₹22,248 crore. NSE However, sequentially, its AUM witnessed a 4% decline from the June quarter's ₹26,304 crore, the lender said in the stock exchange filing. The lender’s disbursements dropped by 19% to ₹4,004 crore in the quarter under review from ₹ 4,966 crore in the previous year. Additionally, the disbursements were down 11% to ₹4,476 crore in the June quarter. There was a noticeable decline in the company’s asset quality during the quarter. Portfolio at Risk (PAR) levels rose sharply across the board. The PAR 0+ increased to 4.9% in the September quarter, compared to 2.5% in the first quarter. Similarly, PAR 30+ rose to 3.3% from 1.8%, PAR 60+ climbed to 2.4% from 1.4%, and PAR 90+ increased to 1.7%, up from 1.1% in the previous quarter. The collection efficiency, including arrears, dropped to 96.2% in the second quarter, compared to 97.9% in the June quarter, indicating some challenges in repayment collections. Despite the asset quality concerns, CreditAccess Grameen reported a strong capital adequacy ratio (CRAR) of 26.4% in the second quarter, up from 25.2% in the first quarter. This capital buffer positions the company well to absorb potential credit losses and manage financial stress. CreditAccess Grameen shares were trading 1.07% lower at ₹1,141.2 apiece on the BSE at 10:35 am. Also Read:...

title: Κραυγή αγωνίας από τους Έλληνες της Φλόριντα: «Αν βγούμε έξω θα σκοτωθούμε»
creator: newsroom@dnews.gr (Newsroom)
content: Οι Έλληνες της Φλόριντα παραμένουν σε επιφυλακή για το πέρασμα του τυφώνα Μίλτον που πλέον σαρώνει την ενδοχώρα. Άλλοι έχουν καταφέρει να εκκενώσουν τη δυτική ακτή, ενώ άλλοι βρίσκονται κλεισμένοι στα σπίτια τους περιμένοντας να περάσουν οι πιο δύσκολες ώρες. Σύμφωνα με την Γιώτα Αργυροπούλου, δεν ήταν εύκολο να εγκαταλείψουν όλοι τα σπίτια τους, καθώς ακόμη και για εκκένωση λίγων χιλιομέτρων χρειάζονταν 7-8 ώρες. Ο Φίλιππος Κελάρης, κάτοικος Μείμπλ μίλησε επίσης στον ΑΝΤ1 σχετικά με την κατάσταση που επικρατεί στην περιοχή: «Δεν είμαστε κοντά στα παράθυρα γιατί πριν 10 μέρες είχε περάσει ένας άλλος τυφώνας και κατέστρεψε τα πάντα. Υπάρχει δυνατός αέρας». «Τις ειδήσεις τις παρακολουθώ από το τηλέφωνό μου καθώς δεν έχουμε ρεύμα. Υπάρχουν νεκροί αλλά ο αριθμός τους είναι ακόμα άγνωστος». «Γίνεται χαμός, ο αέρας έχει πέσει αλλά ίσως να χειροτερέψει η κατάσταση λίγο αργότερα. Έξω από κάθε σπίτι έχει ένα βουνό από σκουπίδια. Κανείς δεν μπορεί να κυκλοφορήσει έξω. Αν σε πετύχει κάτι θα σε σκοτώσει καθώς οι άνεμοι πνέουν με 160 χιλιόμετρα την ώρα» είπε κλείνοντας ο Φίλιππος Κελάρης. Στο Action24 μίλησε η Ιωάννα Λαζάρου, κάτοικος της Φλοριντα, που παραμένει στο σπίτι της περίπου δύο ώρες από την Τάμπα που δέχτηκε νωρίτερα το σκληρό χτύπημα του Μίλτον. «Προσπαθούμε να ασφαλίσουμε τα παράθυρα και να λύσουμε κάθε θέμα του σπιτιού», σημείωσε. Όπως...

title: Ratan Tata यांनी का सुरु केली होती टेलीकॉम कंपनी? 3G सर्व्हिस देणारी पहिल्या खाजगी कंपनीनं जिंकली होती तरुणांची मने
content: उद्योगपती रतन टाटा यांचे निधन झाले आहे आणि त्यांच्या अंत्यविधीची तयारी सुरु झाली आहे. बुधवारी रात्री त्यांनी ब्रिच कँडी रुग्णालयात अखेरचा श्वास घेतला. त्यांचे पार्थिव अंत्यदर्शनासाठी एनसीपीए इथे ठेवण्यात येईल. तिथून पार्थिव वरळीला नेण्यात येईल आणि पारशी प्रथेनुसार अंत्यसंस्कार केले जातील. रतन टाटा यांनी इतक्या उद्योगांमध्ये गुंतवणूक केली आहे की अनेकांना त्यांच्या टेलीकॉम कंपनीचा विसर पडला आहे. अनेकांना या क्रांतिकारी टेलीकॉम कंपनीचा विसर पडला आहे. तुम्हाला या कंपनी बद्दल जाणून घ्यायचं असेल तर आज आपण या कंपनीचा निर्मिती पासून शेवटपर्यंतचा इतिहास जाणून घेऊया. आणि कशाप्रकारे ही कंपनी तरुणांमध्ये लोकप्रिय झाली होती हे डॆहील पाहूया. भारतातील टाटा टेलिकॉम आणि जापनीज कंपनी एनटीटी डोकोमो यांनी भागेदारी करून ही कंपनी सुरु केली होती म्ह्णून हिला टाटा डोकोमो हे नाव देण्यात आले होते. जापानी कंपनीनं टाटा ग्रुपच्या टेलिकॉम बिजिनेसमध्ये 26 टक्के शेयर खरेदी कला. यासाठी जापनीज कंपनीनं 2.7 बिलियन डॉलरची गुंतवणूक केली होती. टाटा आणि एनटीटी डोकोमो यांचा उद्देश ग्राहकांना परवडणारे टॅरिफ प्लॅन्स उपलब्ध करवून द्यायचे होते म्हणून या दोन्ही कंपन्यांनी भागेदारी केली होती. तेव्हा कार्यरत असलेल्या खाजगी कंपन्या खूप महागडे टॅरिफ प्लॅन्स देत होत्या. ज्यावेळी कॉलिंगचा दर 1 रुपया प्रति मिनिट होता तेव्हा टाटा डोकोमो कंपनीनं जून 2009 मध्ये कॉलिंगसाठी एक पैसा प्रति सेकंद दर असलेले प्लॅन प्लॅन सादर केले होते. प्रति सेकंद दर आकारणाऱ्या या प्लॅन पूर्वी कमीत कमी वेळ मर्यादा एक मिनिटाची होती. याचा अर्थ असा की युजर्सनी जरी 10 सेकंद बोलले तरी त्यांना प्रति मिनिटांच्या हिशोबाने पैसे द्यावे लागत. या प्लॅन मुळे...

title: 뮤직카우, 10월 옥션 낙찰 시 최대 1만 포인트 제공
creator: 오동현 기자
content: [서울=뉴시스] 오동현 기자 = 음악투자 플랫폼 뮤직카우가 10월 옥션 낙찰자를 대상으로 최대 1만 포인트를 제공한다고 10일 밝혔다. 10월 옥션은 이날 9시에 종료되는 티삼스의 ‘매일 매일 기다려’를 포함해 11일 오픈하는 김민종 ‘착한 사랑’, 18일 오픈하는 유빈 ‘숙녀’, 25일 오픈하는 권진아 ‘이별 뒷면’까지 총 4번 진행된다. 뮤직카우는 10월 옥션 미션을 진행하고 포인트의 혜택을 제공한다. 1곡 낙찰 시 기본으로 1000 포인트를 지급하며, 2곡 낙찰 시 2000 포인트, 3곡 낙찰 시 3000 포인트, 4곡 낙찰 시 4000 포인트를 추가로 지급해 낙찰곡 수에 따라 최대 1만 포인트를 지급한다. 11일 정오에 오픈 예정인 두 번째 옥션은 김민종 ‘착한 사랑’의 저작재산권을 기초자산으로 한 음악수익증권 5001주를 대상으로 진행된다. 17일까지 진행되는 옥션의 시작가는 9500원으로, 상한가인 1만2300원으로 모든 수량이 낙찰될 경우 예정된 일정보다 조기 마감될 수 있다. 18일부터 24일까지는 유빈의 ‘숙녀’ 옥션이 진행될 예정이다. ‘숙녀’ 저작재산권을 기초자산으로 한 음악수익증권 2500주에 대한 모집을 진행한다. 해당 곡은 원더걸스 출신 유빈의 솔로 데뷔곡이다. 2021년 한 웹 예능을 통해 재조명 받으며 유튜브 누적 조회수 1000만뷰를 돌파했다. 25일부터 31일까지는 권진아 ‘이별 뒷면’ 옥션이 예정돼 있다. 웹드라마 OST로 발매된 해당 노래는 특유의 이별 감성으로 꾸준히 사랑받는 노래다. 국내 음원 차트 아카이빙 사이트인...

title: В Новгородском кремле для посетителей впервые открыли церковь XV века
content: Церковь Сергия Радонежского Новгородцы открыл для посетителей Новгородский государственный музей-заповедник. Об этом сообщили в пресс-службе культурного учреждения. «Этот кремлевский храм наш музей впервые открыл для горожан и туристов», — рассказали в музее. Храм был возведен в 1459-1460 годах. Это была первая на Руси церковь, посвященная святому Сергию Радонежскому Здание получило повреждения в годы Великой Отечественной войны. Однако там сохранились жертвенник, дьяконник и фрески с фрагментами жития святого, надалтарная арка. Все это можно будет увидеть при посещении святого места. Тем временем в Великом Новгороде установят архитектурную подсветку двух храмов XIV века. Темными вечерами жители и гости города смогут полюбоваться световым оформлением церквей святого Федора Стратилата и Спаса Преображения на Ильине улице. Подробнее в нашем материале .

title: मर्सिडीज डील के लिए गए थे रतन टाटा... लौटे तो JRD ने कहा- 'आज मेरे पास तुम्हारे लिए कुछ नया है...'
content: Feedback Ratan tata news: अफसोस की टाटा ग्रुप की उस बोर्ड मीटिंग को रिकॉर्ड करने के लिए उस दिन कोई कैमरा नहीं था. जिस दिन जेआरडी ने बोर्ड ऑफ डायरेक्टर के सामने घोषणा की थी कि वे टाटा समूह की चेयरमैनशिप से इस्तीफा दे रहे हैं और अब ये कुर्सी रतन टाटा की दी जा रही है. बकौल रतन टाटा उस दिन Jay यादों के आर्काइव फिर से सबके सामने सजीव कर दिया था. वे गुजरे आदी सदी की कहानी कह रहे थे. रतन टाटा जब भी JRD टाटा से मिलते तो JRD का पहला वाक्य होता- Well... what's new? रतन उन्हें कंपनी की और इंडस्ट्री की नई बातें बताते फिर चीजें आगे बढ़ती. बात एक ऐसे ही मुलाकात की है. रतन टाटा उस दिन का काम शुरू होने से पहले JRD से मिलने गए. JRD यानी कि जहांगीर रतनजी दादा भाई टाटा. इन्होंने ही टाटा मोटर्स की स्थापना की. ये वाकया तब का है जब जेआरडी टाटा ग्रुप के चेयरमैन थे. तो किस्सा यूं है कि रतन टाटा जेआरडी से मिलने गए. हमेशा की तरह जेआरडी ने रतन टाटा से पूछा- Well... what's new? यहां हम आपको बता दें कि रतन टाटा अपने मेंटॉर और बॉस JRD को सिर्फ Jay कहकर बुलाते थे. जेआरडी के सवाल के जवाब में रतन ने कहा- Jay मैं आपसे रोज मिलता आ रहा हूं, लेकिन जब से मैं आपसे आखिरी बार मिला तब से लेकर अभी तक कुछ भी नया नहीं है. इसके बाद जेआरडी ने कहा- वेल मेरे पास कुछ है जो नया है. इसके बाद जेआरडी ने रतन टाटा से जो कुछ कहा उसने आधुनिक भारत के सबसे बड़े औद्योगिक साम्राज्य में तरंगें ला दी. सम्बंधित ख़बरें पद्म विभूषण रतन नवल टाटा आज हमारे बीच नहीं रहे. 86 साल की उनकी जिंदगी भारत के एक सुस्त कृषि प्रधान देश से तेज रफ्तार औद्योगिक राष्ट्र बनने का कालखंड है. भारत की इस ग्रोथ स्टोरी में टाटा समूह की भागीदारी स्टील के फ्रेम की तरह...

title: Tommy Fury branded 'toxic' by ex in brutal rant before surprise Molly-Mae Hague split
creator: staronline@reachplc.com (Jack Wetherill, Susan Knox)
content: In August, Love Island enthusiasts were heartbroken by the unexpected news that and had called time on their five-year romance. The power duo, both 25, who became parents to their daughter Bambi in January 2023, decided to end their love affair just a year after Tommy proposed to Molly-Mae. This was followed by a surprising string of explosive allegations against Tommy, with infidelity rumours swirling around the split. Boxer Tommy, the younger sibling of heavyweight champ Tyson Fury, has consistently refuted all accusations of infidelity. As the news of his and Molly-Mae's shocking split hit the headlines, old stories resurfaced of Tommy's ex-girlfriend labelling him as "toxic". Tommy was first accused of being toxic by his long-term ex when he entered the Love Island villa in 2019. It was there that he fell madly in love with Molly-Mae and romantically asked her to be his girlfriend. However, before the public could fall for Tommy's romantic side, his ex-girlfriend tried to damage his reputation by suggesting that Love Island viewers would witness his "true colours" in the villa, reports . Tommy's ex, Millie Roberts, didn't hold back when she unleashed on Instagram in what's now a vanished post, hitting out with: "If this is his dream and he wants to go follow it, then all the best! What is toxic to me might not be to someone else. I am going to concentrate on me now." While Love Island hunk Tommy insisted he'd been single for 10 months before his TV romance island...

title: Taiwan celebrates its National Day holiday against background of Chinese threats
creator: AP
content: TAIPEI: Taiwan celebrated its National Day holiday Thursday against the background of threats from China, which claims the self-governing island republic as its own territory. The celebration marks the establishment of the Republic of China, which overthrew the Qing Dynasty in 1911 and fled to Taiwan as Mao Zedong's Communists swept to power on the mainland during a civil war in 1949. Taiwan was run under martial law until transitioning to full democracy in the 1980s and 1990s but maintains the original constitution brought from China and the ROC flag. President Lai Ching-te took office in May, continuing the eight-year rule of the Democratic Progressive Party that rejects China's demand that it recognize Taiwan is a part of China. The Nationalists adhere to a unification stance that recognizes both sides of the Taiwan Strait as a single nation. Thursday's commemorations were to include speeches by Lai and others, performances in front of the Presidential Office Building in Taipei, including an honor guard, military marching band and overflight by military aircraft, but no display of heavy military equipment as seen in years past. Maintaining its military pressure on Taiwan, China's People's Liberation Army sent 15 planes across the median line in the Taiwan Strait, prompting Taiwan to scramble jets, dispatch ships and activate missile systems.

title: Strange sea creatures can merge their bodies into one blob when injured
creator: Michael Irving
content: Imagine being horribly maimed and the only way to survive was to merge your damaged flesh with another injured human. Scientists have discovered this startling ability in comb jellies, which can fuse together to share a nervous and digestive system. Comb jellies, or ctenophores, are marine invertebrates with squishy bodies propelled by hair-like cilia. They’re relatively simple creatures, although they do have muscles, nervous systems and sensory organs. Because of their fragile nature, study has been tricky, so there’s still plenty we don’t know about them. That’s why scientists were surprised to discover their new superpower – and did so by accident. In a tank of comb jellies in the lab, the team one day noticed a particularly big and misshapen individual. But weirdly, it seemed to have two apical organs – a kind of sensory structure – instead of the usual one, as well as two anuses. The scientists suspected that this one was actually two, that had somehow fused together after being injured. To investigate, they removed part of the lobes from multiple comb jellies, and placed them in close pairs. And sure enough, 90% of the time the injured individuals merged to form one bigger comb jelly within just one night. The fusion appeared to be seamless, and when the researchers poked one lobe the whole body responded. This seems to suggest that they’d merged all the way down to their nervous system. “We were astonished to observe that mechanical stimulation applied to one side of...

title: همسرم با لباس مردانه سرقت می‌کند
creator: info@yjc.ir
content: چند روز قبل دختر جوانی خود را به پلیس رساند و از سرقت گوشی تلفن همراهش توسط دو مرد موتورسوار خبر داد. تحقیقات برای دستگیری سارقان موتورسوار آغاز شد و بازبینی دوربین‌های مداربسته حکایت از آن داشت که گوشی‌قاپ‌ها، صورتشان را با ماسک و کلاه پوشانده و پلاک موتورسیکلت‌شان را نیز مخدوش کرده بودند. بدین ترتیب سارقان هیچ ردی از خود به جا نگذاشته بودند. در حالی که بررسی‌ها برای دستگیری سارقان گوشی‌قاپ ادامه داشت، کارآگاهان با شکایت‌های مشابه مواجه شدند. بررسی‌ها نشان می‌داد چهار پسر جوان در غرب و شمال غربی پایتخت سرقت‌ها را رقم می‌زنند. باتوجه به سریالی بودن گوشی‌قاپی‌ها، تحقیقات ادامه یافت تا اینکه دختر جوانی با پلیس تماس گرفت و گفت: من یک مغازه موبایل فروشی در غرب تهران را می‌شناسم که پاتوق سارقان گوشی‌قاپ است. با این اطلاعات مأموران به محل رفته و فروشنده مغازه به نام اردشیر را تحت بازجویی قرار دادند. اما مرد جوان که خود را در محاصره مأموران می‌دید مدعی شد همسرش با همدستی سه مرد دیگر سرقت‌ها را مرتکب شده است. او در تحقیقات گفت: همسرم یکی از اعضای باند سرقت است. او از من خواسته تا گوشی‌های تلفن سرقتی را در مغازه‌ام به فروش برسانم. او لباس مردانه می‌پوشد و به همراه سه عضو دیگر باند، به صورت سریالی برای سرقت می‌روند. زمانی که با مخالفتم مواجه شد، مرا تهدید کرد که مهریه‌اش را به اجرا می‌گذارد. من هم که توانایی پرداخت مهریه میلیاردی او را نداشتم و می‌دانستم با شکایت او به زندان می‌افتم، قبول کردم که گوشی‌های سرقتی را در مغازه‌ام بفروشم. باتوجه به اظهارات اردشیر، کارآگاهان پلیس به سراغ همسر او رفتند، اما زن جوان منکر ادعا‌های همسرش شد و گفت: وقتی با اردشیر آشنا شدم او گفت دانشجوی...

title: [교육소식]한남대, 창업진흥원과 스타트업 해외전시회 협약 등
creator: 유순상 기자
content: [대전=뉴시스]유순상 기자 = 한남대학교 이승철 총장이 10일 교내에서 창업진흥원 최열수 원장직무대행과 스타트업 해외전시회 지원사업 대학생 서포터즈 운영을 위한 업무협약을 체결했다. 창업진흥원이 국내 유망 창업 기업의 해외 시장 판로 확대 및 글로벌 투자 유치 기회 등을 위해 해외 전시회에 참가하도록 지원하는 사업이다. 이번 협약에 따라 양 기관은 대학생 서포터즈를 운영한다. 한남대는 서포터즈 운영과 활동 관리를 총괄하면서 서포터즈 모집, 선정, 해외전시회 현장 서포터즈 인력안전 관리 등을 한다. (재)한남장학재단 이수민 이사장은 10일 교내에서 이승철 총장 등이 참석한 가운데 재학생 18명과 지역 초등학생, 대학원생 등 21명에게 장학금 2000만원을 전달했다. 한남장학재단은 지난 2006년 개교 50주년을 기념, 동문들이 5억여원의 시드머니로 기금을 조성, 2007년부터 장학생을 선발해왔다. 매년 20여 명 이상의 학생들에게 장학금을 지급, 누적 장학금액 4억7000만원, 누적 장학생 420여명에 달한다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: 찰리 푸스, 1년2개월 만의 내한 확정...12월 고척돔
creator: 이재훈 기자
content: [서울=뉴시스]이재훈 기자 = 미국 싱어송라이터 겸 프로듀서 찰리 푸스(Charlie Puth)가 1년2개월 만의 내한을 확정했다. 10일 공연기획사 라이브 네이션에 따르면, 푸스는 오는 12월7일 오후 7시 서울 구로구 고척스카이돔에서 국내 팬들과 재회한다. 2015년 데뷔 싱글 '마빈 게이(Marvin Gaye)(ft. Kehlani)', '이프 유 리브 미 나우(If You Leave Me Now)(feat. Boyz II Men)', '체인지(Change)(feat. James Taylor)' 등 화려한 피처링 라인업이 돋보이는 2집 '보이스노츠(Voicenotes)(2018)'는 '빌보드 200' 4위에 오르며 성공을 이어간다. 빌보드 '핫100' 7주 1위를 기록한 더...

title: 코웨이, '대한민국 100대 브랜드' 선정..."업계 최고 순위"
creator: 이승주 기자
content: [서울=뉴시스]이승주 기자 = 베스트 라이프 솔루션 기업 코웨이가 브랜드가치 평가회사 브랜드스탁이 발표한 올해 3분기 '대한민국 100대 브랜드'에 선정됐다고 10일 밝혔다. 대한민국 100대 브랜드는 특허 받은 브랜드 가치 평가 모델 BSTI를 기반으로 국내 230여개 주요 산업 부문의 1000여개 브랜드 중 가장 점수가 높은 상위 100개 브랜드를 선정하는 제도다. 코웨이는 이번 조사에서 BSTI 총 862.5점(1000점 만점)을 얻으며 전 분기 순위보다 2계단 상승한 30위를 기록, 정수기 부문에서 최고 순위를 달성하며 브랜드 경쟁력을 인정받았다. 코웨이는 누적 판매량 100만 대를 넘어선 베스트셀러 '아이콘 시리즈'를 앞세워 정수기 명가로서 브랜드 위상을 제고했다. 아이콘 정수기 시리즈는 컴팩트한 디자인, 사용 편리성, 관리 용이성 등 주방에 필요한 모든 혁신을 담아냈다는 점에서 소비자 호평을 받고 있는 제품이다. 특히 지난 5월 출시한 '2024년형 코웨이 아이콘 얼음정수기'는 얼음정수기 최초로 사용자가 원하는 대로 온수 온도와 출수 용량, 얼음 크기까지 제어 가능한 사용자 맞춤 기능을 탑재했다. 뿐만 아니라 코웨이 고유의 듀얼 쾌속 제빙 기술을 탑재해 제빙 속도를 기존 대비 11% 개선해 여름철 소비자의 높은 얼음 수요를 효과적으로 대응했다는 점에서 제품 경쟁력을 인정받았다. 코웨이 관계자는 "정수기 업계를 선도하는 기업으로서 고객에게 차별화된 정수기 및 얼음정수기 제품을 제공하기 위한 투자와 기술 개발을 지속해 왔다"며...

title: Fans of 'Culinary Class Wars' crash reservation app for 'Napoli Matfia' restaurant
creator: 윤승진
content: Fans of 'Culinary Class Wars' crash reservation app for 'Napoli Matfia' restaurant Published: 10 Oct. 2024, 15:45 Netflix's hit cooking show "Culinary Class Wars" winner Napoli Matfia, left, and runner-up Edward Lee [NAPOLI MATFIA'S INSTAGRAM ACCOUNT] Fans of Netflix's hit show "Culinary Class Wars" have temporarily crashed the popular reservation application "CatchTable" as they rush to book a table at the winner's restaurant. Over 110,000 users jammed the platform to secure a table at Matfia's Via Toledo Pasta Bar in Yongsan District, central Seoul, causing a 20-minute outage on Thursday morning when reservations opened at 10 a.m., according to the platform. Related Article 'Culinary Class Wars' winner Napoli Matfia and chef Edward Lee to appear on 'You Quiz on the Block' From maniac to 'matfia': Meet the Top 8 of 'Culinary Class Wars' (Part 2) The unprecedented traffic on the social media platform overwhelmed the system, causing sign-in failures and various technical glitches. As of 12 p.m. Thursday, all the seats available for October are booked, and the waitlists have also reached their capacity of 100. 'Napoli Matfia,' the winner of the show, expressed his surprise at the overwhelming response and apologized for the inconvenience caused by the outage through a post on Instagram Thursday. "I feel so sorry for the users. I will look for ways to resolve the issue such as expanding available seats." he said. The show also impacted other competing chefs of "Culinary Class...

content: [청주=뉴시스] 임선우 기자 = 충북 청주시는 이달 말부터 상당구 산간 낙후지역에 수돗물을 공급한다고 10일 밝혔다. 공급 대상은 산성동 것대마을과 산성마을, 낭성면 현암리 180여 가구다. 60억원을 들여 배수관로 8.7km와 1000t 규모의 현암배수지를 조성했다. 낭성면 삼산리·갈산리 일원 17.8km 구간은 내년 중순께 공급할 예정이다. ◇치매예방 야외 치유 프로그램 충북 청주시 흥덕보건소 치매안심센터는 상당구 남일면 더자람농장에서 야외 치유 프로그램을 운영한다고 10일 밝혔다. 8주간 매주 목요일마다 식물을 매개로 정서적 안정과 신체적 회복을 돕는다. 텃밭 가꾸기, 텃밭작물 수확하기, 농작물 음식 만들기 등의 프로그램을 추진할 계획이다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: دیدار روسای مجلس ایران و تاجیکستان در دوشنبه
content: استانبول/خبرگزاری آنادولو محمدباقر قالیباف، رئیس مجلس ایران که روز گذشته در راس هیئتی پارلمانی به دوشنبه سفر کرده با رستم امامعلی، رئیس مجلس ملی تاجیکستان دیدار و گفت‌وگو کرد. به گزارش «ایسنا»، قالیباف در این دیدار ابراز داشت: امضای نزدیک به صد سند همکاری سیاسی، اقتصادی، فرهنگی و پارلمانی میان تهران و دوشنبه و حذف روادید و آسان‌سازی مبادلات اقتصادی نشان دهنده اراده و عزم دو کشور برای گسترش همکاری‌هاست. رئیس مجلس ملی تاجیکستان نیز ابراز داشت: ایران برای گسترش همکاری‌ها و تعاملات با کشورهای منطقه به ویژه کشورهای دوست و برادر ارزش و اهمیت زیادی قائل است و آن را به سود ملت‌ها و دولت‌ها می‌داند. گفتنی است، سفر قالیباف به تاجیکستان به دعوت رستم امامعلی و محمدطاهر ذاکرزاده روسای مجالس ملی و نمایندگان تاجیکستان و با هدف تحکیم روابط پارلمانی و تسهیل ارتقای روابط اقتصادی، فرهنگی و سیاسی بین دو کشور انجام شده است. کنفرانس بین‌المللی پارلمانی تحت عنوان «سی‌امین سالگرد تصویب قانون اساسی جمهوری تاجیکستان» امروز و فردا در دوشنبه برگزار می‌شود.

title: Lindor’s Grand Slam Seals Mets Victory, Advances Team to NL Championship Series
creator: JoA
content: Francisco Lindor hit a grand slam in the sixth inning, his latest clutch swing in a season full of them, propelling the New York Mets to a 4-1 victory over the Philadelphia Phillies on Wednesday, advancing them to the National League Championship Series. Edwin Díaz struck out Kyle Schwarber with two runners aboard to end the game, as New York finished off the rival Phillies in Game 4 of their best-of-five Division Series. The Mets won the series 3-1, wrapping up a postseason series at home for the first time in 24 years. “I want to win it all. And ours will be a team that will forever be remembered,” Lindor expressed in the interview room, holding one of his young daughters on his lap. “This will be a team that comes every 10 years and eats for free everywhere they go. But the job is not done.” Outfielder Brandon Nimmo, with tears in his eyes, embraced Lindor as the Mets poured onto the field in excitement following the final out. In the jubilant locker room, they enjoyed the team’s first champagne-soaked clinching celebration in Citi Field’s 16-season history. The last time the Mets won a playoff series in their own ballpark was the 2000 NLCS at Shea Stadium. “This is the kind of stuff that I was dreaming about,” Nimmo said in a clubhouse interview shown on the giant videoboard in center field. “This has been a long time coming. We wanted it so bad for our fan base.” After their third bubbly clinching bash in 10 days, the Mets will open the best-of-seven NLCS on Sunday...

title: When Director Sudha Kongara Refuted Reports Of Making A Movie On Ratan Tata's Life
content: Renowned Padma Vibhushan awardee and former Tata Group chairman Ratan Tata passed away on Wednesday, October 9 at the age of 86. Ratan Tata had endeared himself to common citizens due to his kindheartedness and innumerable philanthropic activities, and his death had led to a shadow of grief overshadowing the festive season in the country. In the wake of his demise, it is notable that two years back, there were widespread rumours that a biopic on the life of Ratan Tata was in the works. In 2022, there were widespread reports that filmmaker Sudha Kongara, fresh off the success of her acclaimed film Soorarai Pottru, was set to direct a biographical drama based on the life of Indian industrialist Ratan Tata. The excitement around the project was fueled by her storytelling skills, which shone in Soorarai Pottru, a semi-biographical film inspired by the life of Captain GR Gopinath, founder of Air Deccan. At the time, Sudha Kongara was also occupied with directing the Hindi remake of Soorarai Pottru, starring Akshay Kumar in the lead role. The prospect of her collaborating on a biopic about Ratan Tata drew significant attention, considering his vast influence on Indian industry and philanthropy. Even the names of the likes of Suriya, R Madhavan and Abhishek Bachchan had surfaced to star in the film. However, Sudha Kongara put all rumours to rest, with a post on X, where she mentioned that although she was a huge admirer of the businessman and philanthropist, she did not intend to...

title: Oppo Find X8 Design and AI Capabilities Leaked Ahead of Launch: Expected Specifications
content: Oppo Find X8 series will launch on October 24 in China. Ahead of its anticipated debut, the smartphone's artificial intelligence (AI) features have been teased in a leaked video. The video also provides a glimpse at several design aspects of the upcoming handset, including a large circular camera module at the back. Notably, the Find X8 series is already confirmed to be powered by the company's latest operating system (OS) based on Android 15 and some of the leaked AI features will be tied to it. Oppo Find X8 Teased In a leaked video posted on YouTube, the Oppo Find X8 appears to have a flat frame with rounded corners. Its screen may have minimal bezels, maximising the viewing area. The rear panel of the purported handset is seen to sport a large circular camera module, similar in appearance to its predecessor, the Oppo Find X7. Oppo Find X8 is confirmed to be powered by the new MediaTek Dimensity 8400 chipset with an AI Engine, and its capabilities have been teased in the leaked video. The smartphone may be able to intelligently identify the user's schedule via their calendar and create a customised itinerary based on it. It will also come with generative AI features. The teaser suggests the inclusion of a generative AI-powered sticker generator that will use text-based prompts to create stickers which the user may be able to share in chats on instant messaging platforms. The AI Engine may also bring some sort of AI functionality to third-party applications although the...

title: Tata vs Ambani Net Worth: Why Is Mukesh Ambani Richer Than Ratan Tata? Know All About the Wealth of Tata Group and Reliance Industries
content: Mumbai, October 10: Following the demise of Ratan Tata on October 9 at the age of 86, at Breach Candy Hospital in Mumbai, the internet has been abuzz with questions comparing his wealth to that of Mukesh Ambani. Search terms like "Tata vs Ambani Net worth" and "Who is Richest, Ratan Tata or Mukesh Ambani" have surged on Google as people delve into the financial legacies of two of India’s most iconic business figures. Ratan Tata, the former Chairman of Tata Sons, was renowned for his philanthropic work and leadership of the Tata Group, a conglomerate spanning multiple industries. However, unlike Mukesh Ambani, his personal wealth is relatively modest due to his vast contributions to charitable causes. Mukesh Ambani, the Chairman of Reliance Industries, is currently India's richest man, with a fortune far surpassing Ratan Tata's. While the Tata Group is a larger entity overall, much of its wealth is channelled into trusts and charitable foundations, which significantly lowers Ratan Tata's personal net worth. In contrast, Ambani's wealth is largely tied to his ownership stake in Reliance Industries, one of the most profitable companies in India. Let’s look at how these two industrialists compare in terms of net worth and the dynamics that set them apart. Who Will Succeed Ratan Tata? From Noel Tata to Maya Tata, List of Front-Runners in Succession Race Who Might Take Reins of INR 3800 Crore Business Empire. Ratan Tata's Net Worth According to the IIFL Wealth Hurun India Rich...

title: XRP Poised for Bullish Breakout if it Surpasses Key Resistance Levels
creator: JoA
content: XRP price is currently stuck in a narrow range below the $0.550 level. For the price to initiate a fresh upward movement, it must surpass the resistance levels of $0.5450 and $0.5500. Despite being contained in this range, XRP remains well supported above the crucial $0.5080 level. Presently, it is trading near $0.5320, aligned with the 100-hourly Simple Moving Average. An emerging bearish trend line is forming with resistance around the $0.5340 mark on the hourly XRP/USD chart, suggesting potential challenges ahead. However, if the pair breaks through the resistance levels at $0.5360 and $0.5450, it could gather bullish momentum. XRP has managed to stay afloat above the $0.5080 support level, entering a consolidation phase above $0.5120. This is in contrast to the price movements of Bitcoin and Ethereum. During this period, XRP saw a minor uptick within the range and climbed beyond the $0.5250 resistance, making a slight move above $0.5320. Yet, the bears were quick to act near the 50% Fibonacci retracement level of the downward wave from the $0.5453 swing high to the $0.5211 low. At the moment, XRP is trading near $0.5320, with support from the 100-hourly Simple Moving Average. If the price attempts another increase, it might encounter resistance around $0.5340. This level is reinforced by a connecting bearish trend line on the hourly chart, posing a formidable barrier. Further resistance is anticipated at approximately $0.5460, aligning with the 61.8% Fibonacci...

title: Рубль сохраняет негативную динамику после тестирования многомесячных минимумов
creator: ru@themoscowtimes.com
content: МОСКВА, 10 окт (Рейтер) - Рубль в четверг утромсохраняет негативную динамику по достижении за последние суткиминимумов с лета-осени прошлого года, поскольку остается набортекущих отрицательных факторов, о которые разбивается поддержкароссийской валюте от увеличенных интервенций ЦБР и относительновысоких нефтяных цен. Индикативный курс LSEG доллара к рублю на 9.35 МСКбыл вблизи отметки 97,35, и российская валюта дешевеет на 0,4%от последних значений среды, в течение которой был достигнутуровень 100,30 впервые с 11 октября 2023 года. Евро к рублю котируется по 106,56, и здесьроссийская валюта также теряет 0,4%, отметившись накануне науровне 109,85 впервые с середины прошлого августа. В целом же по итогам среды рубль потерял четверть процента впаре с долларом, но сумел набрать 0,1% по отношению к евро. Рублевый внебиржевой курс юаня китайские банкикотируют по 13,66/13,89, на 1,4% выше последние значений среды ивблизи годовых пиков, согласно данным LSEG. Накануне биржевая пара юань/рубль завершила торги на отметке13,68, достигнув в ходе сессии пикового значения за год, 13,74.По итогам же торгов на Мосбирже рубль умеренно подешевел к юаню,на 0,2%, при рекордном за две недели объеме биржевых сделок в7,85 миллиарда юаней. Центробанк с учетом заключавшихся накануне сделок установилследующие официальные курсы: 13,69 рубля за юань, 96,95 задоллар и 106,42 за евро. Против рубля играет как относительно слабое предложениеэкспортной валютной выручки после уплаты...

title: Avoid garbage accumulation in nalas, expert tells HYDRAA
creator: Express News Service
content: HYDERABAD: The Hyderabad Disaster Relief and Asset Protection Agency (HYDRAA) Commissioner AV Ranganath held a review meeting here on Wednesday to identify the causes of flooding and discuss the relief measures to be taken during the calamity. Present at the meeting was the former director of the Karnataka State Natural Disaster Monitoring Centre (KSNDMC), GS Srinivas Reddy, who gave a PowerPoint presentation about the procedures being adopted in Bengaluru and other metropolitan cities across the country to create a better disaster response system. The measures include making the disaster management procedures in the city more efficient and effective through a coordinated approach. So, whenever emergencies arise people should be alerted and the machinery should be kept ready to deal with the situation. The presentation also pointed out making the citizens of regional level areas aware of the weather reports, including how much it might rain, flood forecasts, hail and thunder warnings. Information from division-wise weather stations in the Greater Hyderabad area should be collated from time to time, estimating the rainfall record and flood threat, the presentation said. It should be ensured that the rainwater does not flow over kilometres of stretches on the roads and that the rainwater should directly flow into the stormwater drains. The presentation added that during the heavy rains, people should be displaced to safer areas to ensure their safety. This apart, actions...

title: Suhana Khan In A Black Midi Dress Had Us Screaming Very Demure
content: Suhana Khan is a force to be reckoned with when it comes to making a fashion statement. From elegant sarees to boho chic dresses, the Archies star’s wardrobe is a treasure trove of event-appropriate fits. Her recent ‘demure look’ for launch of the luxury beauty brand Augustinus Bader’s in Mumbai once again showcased her unique sense of style. The event was a star-studded affair. Among the glitterati like Karan Johar, Manish Malhotra, and Neetu Kapoor, it was Suhana Khan who stole the limelight with her stunning OOTN featuring a strapless black midi dress. Suhana Khan rightfully grabbed the eyeballs in a timeless black dress from the shelves of fashion label Ralph Lauren. The strapless number came with a fitted bodice and voluminous skirt, skimming just a few inches above her ankles. A sleek golden Hermes belt wrapped around her waist delivered a cinched element, helping Suhana flaunt her petite frame. The outfit screamed minimally chic and stood as a testament to her love for basic ensembles. In terms of makeup, Suhana Khan went with a soft-dewy base which enhanced her natural glow. She dabbed the right amount of blush and highlighter on the high points of her cheeks elevating the allure. An intense stroke of winged eyeliner and mascara-coated lashes coupled with nude-tinted lips framed her face like a true wonder. For accessories, Suhana wore diamond-encrusted studs and statement rings that offered the perfect dazzle. For the final touches of elegance, the actress chose to...

title: 'Ratan Tata's legacy will forever inspire generations': Salman Khan, SS Rajamouli, Priyanka Chopra, other film stars pay tributes
creator: PTI
content: NEW DELHI: Salman Khan, Ajay Devgn, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Diljit Dosanjh, and SS Rajamouliwere among the prominent cinema personalities who mourned the death of Tata Group's chairman emeritus and legendary industrialist Ratan Tata. Tata, known for his philanthropy besides being a respected industry leader, died at a private hospital in Mumbai on late Wednesday night. He was 86. In a post on X, Salman said he was "deeply saddened" by Tata's passing. "Goodbye to The Titan... Fly high like you loved... and oh how you taught us to love," Kareena Kapoor Khan wrote alongside a picture of a younger Tata, who held licenses to fly both jets and helicopters, sitting in a fighter plane. Ajay, who was one of the first film stars to pay condolence, said the world mourns the loss of a visionary. "Ratan Tata's legacy will forever inspire generations. His contributions to India and beyond are immeasurable. We are deeply grateful. Rest in peace, Sir," he wrote on the microblogging site. Priyanka said Tata touched the lives of millions through his kindness. "Your legacy of leadership and generosity will continue to inspire generations. Thank you for your unmatched passion and dedication for everything you did for our country. You have been an inspiration to us all and will be greatly missed, Sir. #RatanTata," she said. Alia Bhatt said Tata taught multiple generations "what it is to give". Diljit, who is currently on the European leg of his 'Dil-Luminati Tour', paid homage to the entrepreneur...

title: Material damage reported after Israeli strikes on manufacturing, military sites in Syria
content: ISTANBUL The Israeli army carried out a series of airstrikes early on Thursday separately targeting a manufacturing site and a military facility in Syria, causing material damage, according to Syrian media reports. State-run news agency SANA reported that the Israeli strikes targeted a car assembly plant in the western city of Hassia in the rural Homs region, and a military site in the rural Hama region in central Syria. It quoted a military source as saying that the Israeli fighter jets' raids were launched from the direction of northern Lebanon. On Tuesday, seven civilians, including women and children, were killed and others injured in an Israeli airstrike on the Mazzeh neighborhood of the capital Damascus. Regional tensions have escalated due to Israel’s brutal offensive on the Gaza Strip, which has killed over 42,000 people, mostly women and children, following a Hamas attack last year. The conflict spread to Lebanon with Israel launching deadly strikes across the country, which have killed more than 1,323 people and injured over 3,700 others since Sept. 23. Despite international warnings that the Middle East region was on the brink of a regional war amid Israel’s relentless attacks on Gaza and Lebanon, Tel Aviv expanded the conflict by launching on Oct. 1 a ground invasion into southern Lebanon. *Writing by Ahmed Asmar

title: Hurricane Milton Marches across Central Florida, Destroying Homes
content: A flash flood emergency was in effect for the Tampa Bay area including the cities of Tampa, St. Petersburg and Clearwater, the hurricane center said, with St. Petersburg already receiving 16.6 inches (422 mm) of rain on Wednesday, Reuters reported. The eye of the storm landed in Siesta Key, a barrier island town of some 5,400 off Sarasota about 60 miles (100 km) south of the Tampa Bay metropolitan area, which is home to more than 3 million people. Governor Ron DeSantis said he hoped Tampa Bay, once seen as the potential bull's eye, could dodge major damage and that the worst of the predicted storm surge could be avoided thanks to the landfall coming before the high tide. Forecasters said seawater could still rise as high as 13 feet (4 meters). DeSantis reported Milton had also spawned at least 19 tornadoes caused damage in numerous counties, destroying around 125 homes, most of them mobile homes. "At this point, it's too dangerous to evacuate safely, so you have to shelter in place and just hunker down," DeSantis said upon announcing the landfall. At least two deaths were reported at a retirement community following a suspected tornado in Fort Pierce on the eastern coast of Florida, NBC News reported, citing St. Lucie County Sheriff Keith Pearson. His department did not immediately respond to a request for details. Pearson estimated 100 homes were destroyed in the county where some 17 tornadoes touched down, NBC said. More than 1.8 million homes and businesses in Florida...

title: Gugl izgubio spor protiv Evropske unije, mora da plati 2,4 milijarde evra
creator: urednik
content: Tehnološki gigant Gugl (Google) izgubio je spor koji je pokrenuo protiv kazne Evropske unije (EU) uvedene zbog načina na koji ta kompanija digitalno oglašava. Sud pravde EU potvrdio je odluku nižeg suda, odbacivši žalbu na kaznu od 2,4 milijarde evra koju je izrekla Evropska komisija, zbog toga što kompanija, u rezultatima pretrage, daje nezakonitu prednost svojim preporukama za kupovinu u odnosu na rivale. „Sud pravde odbacuje žalbu i time potvrđuje presudu Opšteg suda“, naveo je sud, prenosi AP. Komisija je optužila Gugl da bez prava u pretrazi usmjerava korisnike na svoj Gugl Šoping (Google Shopping) čineći štetu konkurentnim pružaocima istih usluga. To je jedna od tri kazne u iznosu od više milijardi evra koje je Evropska komisija nametnula toj kompaniji u posljednjih 10 godina. „Razočarani smo odlukom Suda, koja se odnosi na veoma specifičan skup činjenica“, kratko su se oglasili iz Gugla. Još 2017. godine kompanija je ustvrdila da je uvela izmjene u poslovanju kako bi se uskladila sa odlukom Evropske komisije, za koje navodi da su dobro funkcionirale. Evropska potrošačka grupa BEUC pozdravila je odluku suda, rekavši da ona pokazuje kako zakon o konkurenciji bloka „ostaje veoma relevantan“ na digitalnim tržištima. „Google je nanio štetu milionima evropskih potrošača tako što je osigurao da konkurentske usluge kupovine budu praktično nevidljive“, naveo je BEUC, prenosi Beta.

title: चंदौली में किसानों को मुआवजा देने की प्रक्रिया स्टार्ट:27 गांवों के 1790 किसानों को मिलेगी राहत, कराया गया सर्वे
content: चंदौली के सकलडीहा तहसील प्रशासन ने बाढ़ से प्रभावित गांवों के किसानों को मुआवजा देने की प्रक्रिया शुरू कर दी है। कुल 27 गांवों के 1,790 किसानों को चिह्नित किया गया है, जिनकी फसलें गंगा में आई बाढ़ के कारण बर्बाद हो गई थीं। एसडीएम अनुपम मिश्रा ने बताय सर्वे और बैंक डिटेल एकत्रित राजस्व कर्मियों ने प्रभावित किसानों का बैंक डिटेल एकत्र कर लिया है। गंगा तटवर्ती क्षेत्रों, जैसे दिया, प्रसहटा, नादी निधौरा, हसनपुर तिरगावा आदि गांवों के किसानों की फसलें पानी में डूब गईं थीं। लेखपालों ने मौके पर जाकर सर्वे किया और कुल 1,790 किसानों को चिन्हित किया। ऑनलाइन ट्रांसफर होगा मुआवजा एसडीएम ने बताया कि चिन्हित किसानों को मुआवजा राशि उनके खातों में ऑनलाइन ट्रांसफर की जाएगी। यह कदम किसानों की आर्थिक स्थिति को बेहतर बनाने के लिए उठाया गया है और राहत की उम्मीद जगाई है। सभी प्रभावित किसानों के खाते में जल्द ही मुआवजे की धनराशि भेज दी जाएगी।

title: Gigantyczna sensacja w Wuhan. Reprezentantka Chin eliminuje jedną z faworytek do tytułu
content: Zakończył się kolejny mecz trzeciej rundy podczas turnieju WTA 1000 w Wuhan. Doszło w nim do sporej sensacji. Z imprezą pożegnała się tenisistka rozstawiona z "2" - Jessica Pegula. Amerykanka musiała uznać wyższość doskonale grającej tego dnia reprezentantki Chin - Xinyu Wang. Tenisistka gospodarzy pokonała faworytkę 6:3, 7:5 i po raz pierwszy w karierze zameldowała się w ćwierćfinale imprezy tej rangi. W piątek zagra i miejsce w najlepszej "4" z Jekateriną Aleksandrową. Po tym, jak Jessica Pegula odpadła w 1/8 finału WTA 1000 w Pekinie, przegrywając wyraźnie z Paulą Badosą, Amerykanka liczyła na poprawę tego rezultatu w Wuhan. Podczas ostatniego tysięcznika w tym sezonie znów została rozstawiona z "2", przez co mogła liczyć na wolny los w pierwszej rundzie. Jej premierowe spotkanie w turnieju nie potrwało długo. Przy stanie 6:2, 2:0 30-0 dla finalistki US Open doszło do kreczu ze strony Anastazji Potapowej . Dzisiaj tenisistka ze Stanów Zjednoczonych rywalizowała o awans do ćwierćfinału. Jej rywalką okazała się reprezentantka gospodarzy - Xinyu Wang. Chinka dotarła do tej fazy turnieju po zwycięstwach z Caroline Dolehide i Lucią Bronzetti. Na tym się jednak nie zatrzymała. 23-latka sprawiła, że Pegula tylko i wyłącznie wyrównała swój wynik osiągnięty w stolicy Chin . Więcej informacji wkrótce... title: Bitcoin Struggles Below $62,000 Amid Bearish Trends and Intensified Challenges
creator: JoshuaS
content: Bitcoin continues to face significant challenges as it extends its losses, slipping below the $61,850 mark. The cryptocurrency is currently holding the $60,000 support level but remains vulnerable to further declines. The flagship digital currency is grappling to mount a fresh rally above the $62,850 zone. As of now, Bitcoin’s price is trading below $62,000 and is also beneath the 100-hourly simple moving average. A bearish trend line has emerged, offering resistance at $61,250 on the hourly chart of the BTC/USD pair. If Bitcoin experiences a close below the critical $60,000 zone, it could potentially gain bearish momentum. Recently, Bitcoin failed to initiate a new surge above $63,000 and instead entered another downward phase. The digital asset descended below the $62,500 and $61,500 levels, eventually breaking the $60,500 support threshold. The cryptocurrency hit a low point at $60,300 before beginning to consolidate its losses. There was a modest uptick above the $60,550 level, yet the price remains far below the 23.6% Fibonacci retracement level calculated from the $64,420 swing high to the $60,300 low. Currently, Bitcoin trades below $61,500 and the hourly 100 simple moving average. On the upside, resistance could be encountered around the $61,200 mark. Additionally, a bearish trend line with resistance at $61,250 is forming on the BTC/USD hourly chart. Key resistance lies near the $62,350 level, coinciding with the 50% Fibonacci retracement level from the recent...

title: Record-Breaking Powerball Jackpot Soars to $336 Million, Gallant Hopes Rise
creator: Ezra B
content: The Powerball lottery jackpot continues to swell after no one clinched all six numbers from Monday night’s drawing. The stakes have never been higher, so grab your tickets and prepare to see if you’re the latest to join the millionaire’s club. The winning numbers for Wednesday, October 9, Powerball jackpot, now teetering at an estimated $336 million with a cash option of $165.3 million, were 25, 32, 43, 53, 66, and the Powerball number was 10. The Power Play multiplier was 3X. As of now, results are pending, and no confirmation of a winner has been released yet. Even if matching one number might seem insignificant, in Powerball, it could still mean a prize. If that single matched number happens to be the Powerball itself, your ticket is worth $4. Furthermore, if one of the five numbers and the Powerball match, the ticket is similarly valued at $4. Powerball enthusiasts are keenly eyeing these golden numbers as their potential ticket to vast fortunes grows. As the anticipation builds, so does the jackpot, reflecting a staggering $336 million for the upcoming drawing. Scheduled thrice weekly at approximately 10:59 p.m. ET on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Saturdays, each drawing draws hopeful participants from across the nation. A single Powerball ticket costs just $2, with the option to add the Power Play for an extra dollar to potentially multiply winnings (excluding the jackpot). title: В Йошкар-Оле состоится внеочередная сессия горсобрания
content: В рамках подготовки головная комиссия по законности рассмотрела предложенный мэрией проект о внесении предложения о присвоении муниципальному образованию «Город Йошкар-Ола» – столице Республики Марий Эл почетного звания Российской Федерации «Город трудовой доблести». Почетное звание «Город трудовой доблести» присваивается населенным пунктам, жители которых своим трудом внесли значительный вклад в достижение победы в Великой Отечественной войне 1941-1945 гг. Сегодня его носят 63 города в России. Летом Йошкар-Ола подала заявку на получение звания. Российская академия наук заключила, что у города есть для него основания. Решение будет принимать организационный комитет «Победа», возглавляемый президентом России Владимиром Путиным. Теперь проект столичной администрации рассмотрят депутаты. Также на сессии планируется определиться с кандидатурой представителя городского округа в Ассоциации «Совет муниципальных образований Республики Марий Эл», сообщает ИА « МедиаПоток » со ссылкой на группу горсобрания . Напомним, недавно МК в Марий Эл рассказал, как парламенты Марий Эл и Кировской области обсудили формат взаимодействия .

title: Comet Tsuchinshan-Atlas Set for Bright Pass by Earth this Saturday
creator: LoriW
content: Prepare to spot a rare, bright comet. The space rock, Comet Tsuchinshan-Atlas, is hurtling toward Earth from the outer reaches of the solar system and will make its closest approach on Saturday. Clear skies permitting, this celestial spectacle should be visible through the end of October. While the comet is expected to be bright enough for naked-eye observation, binoculars or telescopes will enhance the view considerably. “It’ll be this fuzzy circle with a long tail stretching away from it,” explained Sally Brummel, the planetarium manager at the Bell Museum in Minnesota. Comets are essentially frozen remnants from the solar system’s formation billions of years ago. As they get closer to the sun, they heat up and release their characteristic streaming tails, making them a sight to behold. Earlier in 2023, a green comet that last visited Earth 50,000 years ago made a return, adding to a list of notable flybys including Neowise in 2020 and Hale-Bopp and Hyakutake in the mid to late 1990s. Discovered last year, Comet Tsuchinshan-Atlas is also designated C/2023 A3. It is named after the observatories in China and South Africa that first detected it. This comet originates from the Oort Cloud, a distant region of our solar system well beyond Pluto. After making its closest approach to Earth at a distance of about 44 million miles (71 million kilometers), Tsuchinshan-Atlas won’t return for another 80,000 years — that is, if it survives the trip. Though several comets are discovered...

title: Peti dan zaredom djeca zbog dječaka iz razreda ne idu u školu, roditelji zbog izjave o ‘balvan revoluciji‘ traže ispriku Fuchsa
content: Ni danas, peti dan zaredom, cijeli razred jedne zagrebačke osnovne škole zbog novog učenika ne ide na nastavu. Roditelji od mjerodavnih institucija traže da zajamče sigurnost njihove djece u razredu u koji je upisan novi učenik zbog čijeg se ponašanja iz prethodne škole ispisao gotovo cijeli razred. Traže javnu ispriku resornog ministra Fuchsa jer ih je prozvao za izazivanje balvan-revolucije, kako javlja HRT . Dio roditelja odlučio je i službeno prijaviti verbalno zlostavljanje sa seksualnim konotacijama. Za dječaka žele primjerenu pomoć. Zbog svega ovog danas će se sastati s pravobraniteljicom za djecu Helencom Pirnat Dragičević . - Spremni smo ići do kraja. Dok god se to ne riješi, rekli su roditelji. - Najvjerojatnije djeca i dalje neće u školu jer neće odustati. Naš odustanak bi značio da prihvaćamo nakaradnu situaciju i nakaradni sustav koji nas tjera da mi budemo žrtve i naša djeca da budu žrtve, dodaju.

title: ഓണാഘോഷം സംഘടിപ്പിച്ചു
content: ഇവിടെ പോസ്റ്റു ചെയ്യുന്ന അഭിപ്രായങ്ങൾ മലയാള മനോരമയുടേതല്ല. അഭിപ്രായങ്ങളുടെ പൂർണ ഉത്തരവാദിത്തം രചയിതാവിനായിരിക്കും. കേന്ദ്ര സർക്കാരിന്റെ ഐടി നയപ്രകാരം വ്യക്തി, സമുദായം, മതം, രാജ്യം എന്നിവയ്ക്കെതിരായി അധിക്ഷേപങ്ങളും അശ്ലീല പദപ്രയോഗങ്ങളും നടത്തുന്നത് ശിക്ഷാർഹമായ കുറ്റമാണ്. ഇത്തരം അഭിപ്രായ പ്രകടനത്തിന് നിയമനടപടി കൈക്കൊള്ളുന്നതാണ്.

title: Riley Keough Honors Late Mother Lisa Marie Presley with Completed Memoir
creator: Catherine W
content: Riley Keough quickly agreed to help complete her mother’s memoir, initially envisioning a collaborative effort reflecting on her extraordinary upbringing and life. However, following Lisa Marie Presley’s sudden death in 2023, the task transformed into a profound responsibility. Lisa Marie Presley, the only child of Elvis and Priscilla Presley and a recording artist herself, had begun the memoir years earlier. Finishing her mother’s work brought forth “all kinds of emotions,” Keough revealed in an interview with The Associated Press before the book’s release on Tuesday. “It just felt like a kind of duty that I had to complete for her,” Keough remarked. “I’m just happy that it’s done and that it’ll be in the world and there for people to read.” The memoir, titled “From Here to the Great Unknown,” nods to the poignant lyrics of Presley’s song “Where No One Stands Alone,” a duet Lisa Marie recorded with her father more than 50 years after its original release. The book captures themes of love, loss, grief, motherhood, and addiction. According to Keough, it was conceived as a means for Lisa Marie to share her personal narrative in her own words and create a connection with readers. Much of the memoir remains in Lisa Marie’s own words. Keough faithfully listened to recordings of her mother recounting memories and experiences, both significant and trivial. The book candidly addresses events like the day her father died, her relationships, her marriage to Michael Jackson, her...

title: Cidco : प्रकल्पग्रस्त शेतकऱ्यांना डावलत धनाढ्य बिल्डरांसाठी सिडकोची लॉटरी? माहिती मिळताच शेतकरी आक्रमक, शिरसाट म्हणाले...
creator: विनायक पाटील, एबीपी माझा, नवी मुंबई
content: नवी मुंबई : नवी मुंबई शहर, उरण येथील जेएनपीटी बंदर प्रकल्पग्रस्तांच्या जमिनीवर उभारण्यात आले. मात्र. ज्यांच्या जमिनी घेवून कित्येक अब्ज रुपये कमावणाऱ्या सिडकोला या गरीब , गरजू शेतकऱ्यंचा सोईस्कर विसर पडल्याचं चित्र आहे. सिडकोडून काढण्यात येणाऱ्या लॅाटरीत धनाढ्य बिल्डर्स, अधिकारी, राजकीय नेत्यांच्या भुखंडांचा समावेश असून शेतकऱ्यांना मात्र डावलण्यात आले आहे. या विरोधात आता प्रकल्पग्रस्त शेतकरी तीव्र आंदोलनाच्या पवित्र्यात आहेत. यासंदर्भात संजय शिरसाट यांच्याशी संवाद साधला असता, असा निर्णय होणार नसल्याचं म्हटलं. शिवसेनेचे नेते संजय शिरसाट यांची सिडकोच्या अध्यपदी नियुक्ती झाल्या नंतर त्यांनी शहरातील धोरणात्मक निर्णय घेतले जातील असे जाहीर केले होते. यानुसार जमिनी फ्री होल्ड करणे आणि हस्तांतरण शुल्क रद्द करण्याचा महत्वपूर्ण निर्णय घेत नागरिकांना मोठा दिलासा दिला आहे. त्याच बरोबर लाडका उद्योगपती धोरण आणत सिडकोतील काही अधिकाऱ्यांनी 13 हजार करोड रूपयांची जमीन अल्पदरात नामवंत उद्योगपतीला देण्याचा घाट घातला होता. मात्र चौकस असलेल्या संजय शिरसाट यांनी याला ब्रेक लावत सिडकोची जमीन वाचवली आहे. त्यामुळे संजय शिरसाट यांच्या निर्णयाने ‘ बोले तैसा चाले ‘ हे प्रत्यक्षात खरे झाले होते. एकीकडे सिडकोच्या जमिनी वाचवणारे संजय शिरसाट दुसरीकडे बिल्डर धार्जिणे निर्णय घेणार का असा प्रश्न निर्माण झाला आहे. कारण आहे सिडको बोर्ड मिटींग मध्ये देण्यात येणाऱ्या लॅाटरीला मंजुरी. आचारसंहिता जाहीर होण्यापूर्वी भुखंडाची सोडत काढण्यात येणार असली तरी या मध्ये धनाड्य बिल्डर , राजकीय नेते आणि शासकीय अधिकार्यांचे लागेबंधे असलेल्या भुखंडाचा समावेश असल्याचे विश्वसनीय सूत्रांकडून सांगितले जात आहे. 40-50...

title: Mısır ithalatına gümrük vergili kota
creator: NTV
content: Cumhurbaşkanı kararıyla mısır ithalatına yıl sonuna kadar geçerli olmak üzere 1 milyon ton yüzde 5 gümrük vergili tarife kontenjanı (kota) tanımlandı. Mısır ithalatına tanımlanan tarife kontenjanının dağıtımına ilişkin esasları belirleyen tebliğ de söz konusu karar ile birlikte Resmi Gazete 'nin bugünkü sayısında yayımlandı. Yerli üretimin tüketimi karşılamada yetersiz kaldığı miktarın sadece 1 milyon tonluk kısmı için 31 Aralık 2024 tarihine kadar kullanılmak üzere yüzde 5 oranında gümrük vergili tarife kontenjanı açıldı. "ÜRETİCİ ZARAR GÖRMEYECEK" Ticaret Bakanlığı'nın karara ilişkin açıklamasında, düzenleme ile mısır üreticisinin zarar görmeyeceği ve arz-talep dengesinin sağlanacağı belirtildi. Bakanlık açıklamasına göre ilgili dönemde 1 milyon tonun üzerinde ithalatta gümrük vergisi yüzde 130 oranında uygulanmaya devam edilecek. EN YÜKSEK KOTA 10 BİN TON Mısır ithalatında tarife kontenjanı uygulanmasına ilişkin tebliğe göre, tarife kontenjanının dağıtımı beyanname sırasına göre tahsis yöntemi ile yapılacak. Gümrük beyannamesinin tescili esnasında ilgili muafiyet kodunun seçilmesi suretiyle tarife kontenjanından yararlanılacağının beyan edilmesi başvuru niteliğinde olacak. Bir gümrük belgesi kapsamında en fazla 10 bin ton kota kullanılabilecek.

title: Nintendo Switch Online se prepara para un gran cambio en su concepto
creator: Ángel de la Iglesia
content: Con esta iniciativa se pretende añadir una nueva función a Nintendo Switch Online Nintendo prácticamente ha estado toda la generación de Nintendo Switch con su propio servicio de suscripción online , el cual es conocido como Nintendo Switch Online y que, en esencia, permite el guardado del juego en la nube, jugar con amigos online, acceso a una biblioteca de juegos de consolas pasadas, así como acceso a algunos DLCs y a juegos de Nintendo 64 y Game Boy Advance en el caso de contar con la versión que añade el Paquete de Expansión. Ahora bien, esto no se ha mantenido estático todo este tiempo, sino que cada poco se ha hecho pública la ampliación del catálogo de juegos , como dos de Game Boy Advance que se han añadido recientemente a la par que estar suscrito también permite descargar avatares especiales . Ahora bien, parece que se viene un cambio bastante relevante. Nintendo Switch Online: Playtest Program es la prueba que hará Nintendo a su servicio de suscripción Como sorpresa durante esta madrugada y a través de las redes sociales, se ha anunciado que Nintendo efectuará la Nintendo Switch Online: Playtest Program , la cual consiste en esencia en probar una nueva función por tiempo limitado . Para ello, será necesario inscribirse en la página web entre el jueves 10 de octubre a las 17:00 y el martes 15 de octubre a las 16:59, logrando con ello acceso anticipado a una nueva función de Nintendo Switch Online . Eso sí, habrá que cumplir una serie de...

title: RRB NTPC Recruitment 2024: Registration Deadline Extended For UG And Graduate Posts, Check New Dates
content: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has extended the registration deadline for the Non-Technical Popular Category (NTPC) recruitment 2024 for both graduate and undergraduate level posts. As per the new schedule, for RRB NTPC UG, candidates can apply till October 27; while for graduate posts, the last date to apply is October 20 through the official website:rrbapply.gov.in. According to the official notification, candidates applying for graduate-level posts will be allowed to pay the fees by October 22 and make changes to their applications till October 30, whereas for UG vacancies, the candidates can pay their application fees till October 29 and edit their details till November 6. Note that details filled in the ‘create an account’ form and the choices of RRBs can NOT be edited during the correction window. Follow these steps to apply for RRB NTPC 2025 UG/Graduate Posts: Step 1: Open the official website,rrbapply.gov.in. Step 2: On the homepage, look for the ‘Apply’ button and click on it. Step 3: Enter the required details and generate your User ID and Password. Step 4: Log in to your account and fill in the application form. Step 5: Upload all the necessary documents in a suitable format. Step 6: Pay the application fees and click on proceed. Step 7: Submit the form and take a hard copy of it for future reference. title: Galatasaray'da gergin divan!
content: Galatasaray'ın ekim ayı olağan divan kurulu toplantısı dün gerçekleşti. Galatasaray Denetim Kurulu üyesi Ömer Çirkin, mali raporlarla ilgili yapılan incelemeleri aktarırken enflasyon düzeltmesi yaptıklarını ve böylece sarı-kırmızılı kulübe ait aktif malvarlıklarının 21.5 milyar liraya yükseldiğini belirtti. Kulübe ait gayrimenkullere ilişkin de konuşan Çirkin, Florya'nın 8 milyar lira, Mecidiyeköy'ün 2,2 milyar lira, Kemerburgaz'ın üst kullanım hakkının da 2,2 milyar lira değerinde olduğunu açıkladı. Çirkin ayrıca Galatasaray Adası'nın 1,6 milyar TL'lik değerinin bulunduğunu ifade etti. Futbolcu transferlerine ilişkin borçlarda 2 milyar liralık artış olduğuna vurgu yapan Çirkin, "Kur farkı 1,4 milyar lira civarında. Sporcu satışı ve gayrimenkul değerlemeleri gibi yatırım faaliyetlerinde 3,6 milyar lira kar var" ifadelerini kullandı. Çirkin ayrıca kulübün konsolide net kârının 5.2 milyar lira olduğunu da açıkladı. Toplantıda üyelerin konuştuğu bölümde ise gerilim arttı. Florya Projesine yönelik eleştiriler yükselirken Dursun Özbek de Süheyl Batum'a yanıt verdi. TFF'yle gerçekleşen toplantıya ilişkin konuşan Özbek, "TFF'ye gidip ne dediğimi nereden biliyorsunuz? Yanımda mıydınız? Ayrıca Florya Projesi hasılat projesidir. Adnan Polat'ın açıkladığı rakam, asgari rakamdır. Asgari kelimesini koskoca profesörün anlamadan konuşması doğru değil" ifadelerini kullandı. Özbek'in bu sözleri üzerine tekrar kürsüye gelen...

title: Milton kasırgası Florida'da hayatı felç etti! 2 milyon kişi elektriksiz kaldı
creator: Haberler
content: Milton Kasırgası, Çarşamba gecesi Florida'nın batı kıyısını şiddetli bir şekilde vurdu. Saatte 193 km hıza ulaşan rüzgarlar ve tehlikeli su baskınları, bölgede büyük hasara yol açtı. Ulusal Kasırga Merkezi'ne göre, Milton 3. kategori fırtına olarak Sarasota İlçesi'ndeki Siesta Key yakınlarında karaya çıktı. Fırtına, körfezde ilerlerken zaman zaman 5. kategoriye kadar yükselmişti. Sarasota ve çevresinde su seviyeleri 2,4 metreyi aştı. Bölgede 1,5 metreye varan fırtına dalgaları kaydedildi. Perşembe sabahı itibariyle 2,2 milyondan fazla kişi elektriksiz kaldı. Fırtına, eyaletin doğu kıyısında da etkili oldu. Fort Pierce'de bir emekli topluluğunda can kayıplarına neden olan hortumlar görüldü. St. Lucie İlçesi'nde toplam 17 hortum kaydedildi. Tampa Körfezi, fırtınanın merkezinden kıl payı kurtuldu. Uzmanlar, fırtınanın körfezin kalbine vurması durumunda, ABD tarihindeki en tehlikeli fırtına dalgalarından birine yol açabileceği konusunda uyarmıştı. Bölgede 3 milyondan fazla kişiye tahliye emri verildi. Tampa Belediye Başkanı Jane Castor, kalanları sert bir dille uyardı. Milton, oluşumundan sadece bir gün sonra tarihin en güçlü ikinci Körfez kasırgası olarak kayıtlara geçti. Fırtınanın gücü, 2005'teki Kasırga Rita'nın hemen arkasında yer aldı. Ulusal Meteoroloji Servisi, Milton'ın Perşembe günü boyunca orta Florida'yı etkilemeye devam edeceğini, ardından Atlantik'e açılacağını bildirdi. Yetkililer, sel ve hortum tehlikesine...

title: Diddy Combs to Address Sex Trafficking Charges in Spring Trial
creator: Aleksandar K.
content: Sean “Diddy” Combs aims for a trial on sex trafficking charges next spring, his attorneys revealed to a judge on Wednesday. The hip-hop mogul’s legal team, along with prosecutors, conveyed his preference for an April or May trial in a joint letter. This communication served to inform the judge about expected discussions for an upcoming hearing on Thursday in Manhattan federal court. Prosecutors confirmed their availability for trial but did not specify a preferred date. Combs, now 54, has been incarcerated since his September 16 arrest, facing accusations of physically and sexually abusing women over several years. He has entered a not guilty plea. The indictment details that Combs allegedly coerced and mistreated women, leveraging a network of associates and employees. Tactics reportedly included blackmail, violent acts such as kidnapping, arson, and physical beatings to silence victims. Marc Agnifilo, Combs’ lawyer, has argued that the prosecution is attempting to criminalize consensual sexual acts. Agnifilo asserted that Combs plans to clear his name through the trial process. The letter, addressed to Judge Arun Subramanian, the anticipated trial presider, did not broach the subject of Combs’ continued detention without bail. Previously, two judges in separate rulings determined that no bail conditions could adequately safeguard the community if Combs were released. On Tuesday night, Combs’ legal team petitioned the 2nd U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals in Manhattan to...

Las lesiones siempre han estado presentes en el fútbol, pero los cifras se están disparando y el aumento del en los equipos es un tema que . No sólo por una cuestión de salud de los jugadores, también porque y pone en riesgo los objetivos deportivos de los clubes, con lo que eso supone a nivel económico, el motor de la supervivencia de todos ellos. Las luces de alarma se han encendido hace tiempo y los datos siguen avalando la preocupación que existe. Son ya casi que acumulan los 20 equipos de Primera desde la pretemporada, (coincidiendo con el primer arreón del calendario), o 10 los equipos que superan el listón de las 10 lesiones.
